GSP29nvtp1_1u:5: viśvārādhya ityatra viśvaśabdena saṃsāricetanavargo vivakṣitaḥ, tasyaiva tadārādhakatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:15: ata eva na tatra śarīrāntarāpekṣā, sākṣātprayantānadhiṣṭheyeṣu hi sā syāt daṇḍādivat /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:17: pinākīti tu viśiṣṭaśastradhāradhamittaka nāmasaṃkortanena prārabdhavighnasya protsāraṇameva samīhitamiti sūcayati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:19: yathāvasthitayojanāyāṃ tu arthapaunarūktyaprasarktā stutitvameva samādhānamadhyavaseyam iti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:37: etāśca vacasāmaviśuddhīḥ chalajātinigrahasthāneṣu sūtrakāra eva prapañcayiṣyati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:38: so 'yaṃ na tatheti bhavati vāgviśuddhīnāṃ nidhiḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:40: evaṃ parāparagurūn natvā śiṣyabuddhisamādhānāya samāhitavaiśiṣṭyaṃ darśayati--grantheti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:41: nanu tātparyaṭīketi vadatā pravṛttipāṭavārthaṃ granthasaṃkṣepo darśitaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:42: na ca śiṣyāṇāṃ kathantāsaṃboghavidhurāṇāṃ rāddhāntamātraparigrahaḥ saṃkṣepato vivakṣitaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:47: dūṣaṇāni ca nirasyānīti punarapi granthagauravamityata āha--granthavyākhyācchalenaiveti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:48: nanu cirantare 'smin nibandhe mahājanaparigṛhīte bahavo nibandhāstathāvidhāḥ santīti kṛtamanene ityata āha-- icchāmīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:49: nanu yadi granthakārasaṃpradāyavicchedena te nibandhāḥ, kathaṃ kunibandhāḥ?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:51: kathaṃ tavāpīyaṃ vicchinnasaṃpradāyā tātparyaṭīkā sunibandha ityata āha--atijaratīnāmiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:54: kiṃ nāmātra trilocanaguroḥ sakāśādupadeśarasāyanamāsāditamamūṣāṃ punarnavībhāvāya dīyata iti yujyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:55: na ca kunibandhapaṅkamagnānāṃ taddātumucitamatastasmādutkṛṣya svanibandhasthale sanniveśanarūpasamuddharaṇameva sāṃpratamityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:56: tatra bhagavato 'kṣapādasya muniṣu madhye pravaratvaṃ śrutyādibhya eva suprasiddham kimanena saṃkīrtanena?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:59: tenāpi kiṃ prakaṭitena? svanibandhasya tadviṣayatāpi tadvyākhyānādeva labhyata iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:60: kiṃ tayāpi kathitayā? na cāsya nyāyamahodadherūttānatāpratibhāsa evāgrataḥ kartumucitaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:64: taditi digrāgādisamutthāpitaṃ śāstrācchādakaṃ kuhetusaṃtamasamapaneyatvena parāmṛśatā śāstrasyaivāyaṃ nibandha iti darśitam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:65: bhāṣyasya ca tadvivaraṇarūpasya śāstraśarīrarūpatayā na śāstrādādhikyaṃ manyate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:68: etena śāstrasya yo nibandho bhāṣyagranthaḥ sa kutārkikājñānanivṛttihetuḥ kariṣyata iti vyākhyānaṃ ṭīkāvirodhenopekṣaṇīyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:70: na hīdamanūdya kiñcid vidheyaṃ pratiṣedhyaṃ veha vidyate ityata āha--sūtreti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:71: atha svanibandhasya prayojanavattāpradarśanena kiṃ siddhyatītyata āha--prekṣāvaditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:73: ato vyutpādanapravṛttau vyutpattirevāmīṣāṃ prayojanamiti kimapareṇa prayojanenetyata āha--vyutpādamātrasyeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:74: dvividhaṃ hi prayojanaṃ mukhyaṃ gauṇa ca /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:77: tatra mukhyārthinaḥ tatsādhānamabhyarthayamānāḥ tatra pravartanta iti tadapi prayojanamevati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:78: ato mukhye prayojane sati gauṇaṃ prayojanam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:80: na ca svātantryeṇaivāsya mukhyaṃ prayojanamastītyato yasyedamaṅga tasya mukhyaṃ prayojanamastīti darśite prekṣāvān pravarttito bhavatītyabhisandhiḥ vārttikakṛta ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:83: na hi bhāṣyasya svātantryeṇa mukhyaṃ prayojanamasti yena vārttikaṃ tadaṅgatāmiyāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:85: nanu karmendriyaniyamaḥ śama iti suprasiddhaṃ śānto dānta ityādi upaniṣatsu, na cāsau puruṣārthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:86: ato na mukhyaṃ prayojanamityata āha--atra ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:88: na tāvat kaścit jagadupacikīrṣuḥ kvacit pravartate yato munerapi tathātvaṃ saṃbhāvayāmaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:93: tasya ca rūpāṇi śamadamādisaṃpattiḥ nityānityavivekaḥ aihikāmuṣmikabhāgavairāgyaṃ mumukṣutā ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:94: yastu anadhikāryeva pravartate karmakāṇḍa iva brahmakāṇḍe sa na phalabhāg bhavati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:96: na tāvadupeyaviṣayeyamadhikāracintā, tasya puruṣaprayatnāviṣayatvāt, iṣyamāṇatāmātrasya cāniṣadhāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:97: kiṃ nāma upāyaviṣayā, tasyaiva śāstraviṣayatvāt, puruṣapravṛttiviṣayatvācca /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:98: iha cāpavarga iva tadarthatayā tattvajñānamapyupeyameva, asiddhatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:100: na ca vedādhyayanavadanumānasya pratyakṣasya copādānaṃ śūdrādikaṃ prati niṣiddham,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:102: tathā sati dhūmādapi vahimadhigacchan pratyakṣād vā pratyavāyī syāt, adhīyāna iva vedam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:103: na cātmagocare pratyakṣānumāne śūdrāderviśeṣato niṣiddhe snātasya caṇḍāladarśanamiva brāhmaṇādeḥ prāyaścittānupadeśāt pratyuta
GSP29nvtp1_1u:104: striyo vaiśyāstathā śūdrā ye cānye pāpayonayaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:106: tasmād yathā sa eva viśiṣṭaḥ svargo vaidikayāgādyanadhikṛtenāpi upāyāntareṇa traivarṇikaśuśrūṣādinā sādhyate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:107: tathopāyānteṇānumānādinā yadyātmādhigamaḥ kriyate śūdreṇāpi, tadā kīdṛśo doṣaḥ?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:113: tasmādāgamaikavākyatayā pravṛtte śāstre tadadhikāryevādhikārīti śūdrādayo 'nadhikṛtā iva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:116: santyeva hi kecit karuṇāmṛdumanaso yeṣāṃ jagadeva mitram /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:119: sā ca yathaikaṃ duḥkhita paśyato bhavati, tathā jagadeva duḥkhita paśyataḥ kiṃ na syāt?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:122: na hi badhireṣu gāyano gāyatītyata āha--tatra yadi na kaściditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:123: na hi rogī mandabhāgyatayā carakādyupadeśe na pravartata iti tadarthatā tasya nivartata ityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:126: kāruṇikatayā paśyannapi pravartate cet, pramādī syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:127: tathā ca paralokādabibhyato 'sya vacane kaḥ śraddhāsyatītyata āha--na ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:128: yadyapi prahīnamohatvādevāsya pāpapuṇyayorutpattireva nāsti, vakṣyati hi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:130: tathāpi kleśahānerdurūhatvāt pratyavāyotpattimabhyupagamya tadabhāvāya tapaḥprabhāva uktaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:133: na hi gāḥ paṅkamagnāḥ paṅkapralepabhayādanukampāparavaśāḥ samarthā noddharanti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:136: tathā cet kathamanadhikṛta ityabhisandhāyoktaṃ prapañcayati--tapaḥprabhāva eva hīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:137: yathā hi teṣāṃ tapaḥprabhāvādevaṃvidhāḥ pāpmāno vilīyante,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:138: tathā tapaḥprabhāvādeva satyasaṃkalpatayā anadhikāriṇo 'pi phalabhāgina iti na kaścid virodhaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:141: anadhikṛtena tu kṛtaṃ karma viguṇaṃ sanna phalāṃya paryāptamityapi na,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:143: yājaka eva tvayājyaṃ yājayan pratyavāyamāsādayet, rājñaḥ pratigṛhṇanniva vidvān /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:144: sa ca tīvratadeṇa tapasaiva vilīyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:145: tarhi mahājano yena gataḥ sa panthāḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:146: iti nyāyena vayamapyanadhikṛtān vyutpādayāma ityata āha--na ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:147: nanu kutārkikāṇāmajñānaṃ nivartayatā kimanena śāstrasyopakṛtaṃ syādityāha--kutārkikairiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:149: iha karmārambhe prārabdhasyāntarāyaviraheṇa parisamāpti kāmayamānā abhīṣṭadevatā namaskārapūrvakaṃ prekṣāvantaḥ pravartante /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:150: dṛśyate ca tatra tatra bahuśoṃ vyabhicāraḥ kṛtanamaskārasyāpi samīhitāsiddheḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:156: tasmādar thakāma iha vaṭe prativasantaṃ yakṣaṃ pūjayeditiva daprāmāṇikaprasiddhivijṛmbhitametadityabhisandhāya kimu na kṛto vāttikakṛtā iṣṭadevatānamaskāra ityata āha--avigīteti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:157: pratyakṣamivāvigītaśiṣṭācāro 'pi śrutisadbhāve pramāṇameva, nirmūlasya ca śiṣṭācārasyāsambhavāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:162: yadyavaṃ kimanena na kṛta ityata āha--parameti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:163: yadi kṛtaḥ tat kimindraluptena gataḥ, yena na dṛśyata ityata āha--na niveśita iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:167: na ca tanniveśanavyatirekeṇa te grāhitāḥ syurityata āha--maṅgalyāntara vaditi //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:170: nanu daṇḍakasūtrasyānuvādo nāstītyata uktaṃ saṃkṣepata iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:180: na hi vācakād vācyapratītervācyasya niṣpattiḥ, yato mumukṣurvācake pravartatām /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:183: nanu nātra śāstram, tasya niḥśreyasahetutvaṃ vā śrūyata ityata āha--pramāṇādīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:185: yadyapi śiṣyate anuśiṣyate pramāṇādikamaneneti śāstramiti vyutpattyā atrāpi kāraṇatā gamyate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:189: anyathā pramāṇādīni tattvato jñātvāpi tāvanna mucyate
GSP29nvtp1_1u:192: nanu hetutvakaraṇatve na viṣayabhedena bhavitumarhata ityata āha--teneti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:194: kiṃ tu padārthatattve jñāpakatayā niḥśreyase tadvyāpāravataḥ karaṇatayetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:196: evaṃ ca sati śāstrasya niḥśreyase karttavye padārthatattvajñānasya nirūktibalena vyāpāratve darśite vyāpāravyāpāriṇoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:197: tathā vyāpāravatā śāstreṇa vyāpāraviṣayasya pramāṇādeḥ pratipādyapratipādakabhāvaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:198: tathā vyāpāraviṣayeṇa pramāṇādinā vyāpārasya tattvajñānasya viṣayaviṣayībhāvaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:199: tathā vyāpāreṇa tattvajñānena vyāpārulasya niḥśreyasasya kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:204: tadvacāpāraviṣayo veti pajcasu vaktavyeṣu upalakṣaṇārthaṃ dvayamāha--śāstrapramāṇāditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:205: enameva vyutpattilabhyaṃ vyāpāramabhipretya tattvasya jñānamiti karmaṇi ṣaṣṭhī
GSP29nvtp1_1u:207: nanu śiṣyācāryaśāstratadvyākhyānānāmapi saṃbandhāḥ kaiścit samānatāntrikaiḥ pradarśitāḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:210: kiṃ nāma? yāvatyapratipādite prekṣāvatpravṛttirna syāt, tāvat pradarśyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:211: na ca śiṣyācāryādisaṃbandhāḥ prekṣāvatpravṛttyaṅgam, teṣāṃ pravṛttiphalatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:217: tasmāt prayojanamabhidhayaṃ tayoḥ saṃbandho 'bhidheyastaddvārā śāstrasya prayojanena saṃbandha ityetadarthatveme prathamasūtrasya nyāyyamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:218: nanu yasya mithyājñānaṃ saṃsāraṃ pratanoti tasyaiva tattvajñānaṃ niḥśreyasahetuḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:221: tathā ca na niḥśreyasasaṃbandhaḥ ityata āha--yatpadārtheti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:222: nanu pramāṇādipadārthatattvajñānasya yadi niḥśreyasahetutā śāstrapravṛtteḥ pūrvameva pramāṇasiddhā niṣprayojanaṃ śāstre prayojanābhidhānam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:233: tridhā hi puṃsāṃ cittavṛttayaḥ, anubhava icchā prayatnaśceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:235: icchā tu puruṣārthe svarasotthitā, tatsādhane ca tathātvānumānotthāpyā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:239: phalagocarā vā icchā pravṛttiḥ, cena tayorapi prayojananiścayāpekṣā syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:243: nāpi mumukṣuṇānapekṣite svarge yāgādikaṃ tatsādhanatayā nānubhūyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:244: puruṣārthasādhane tvicchālakṣaṇā vā prayatnalakṣaṇā vā pravṛttirna svarasasiddhā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:245: na hi kaścit kṣudhī duḥkhaprahāṇaṃ tṛptisauhityasukha vā ananusaṃdhāyānnamattumicchati prayatate vā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:246: tasmād yatra yaḥ pravartayitavyaḥ sa tatsādhyamarthaṃ daśayitvā,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:247: yataśca yo nivartayitavyaḥ sa tatsādhyamanarthaṃ darśayitveti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:249: tattu śrotā kathaṃ śraddhāsyati, aśraddadhāno vā kathaṃ pravartsyatītyavaśiṣyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:251: yadyapi munerāptatvāvadhāraṇe prayojanānabhidhāne 'pi prayojanasāmānyaniścayo bhavatyeva prayojanavadidaṃ śāstramāptoktatvāditi ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:255: sa ca prayojanaviśeṣo vacanādevāvasīyata iti sārthakametadabhidhānam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:260: tadidaṃ prayojanasya pravartakatvamuddeśyatayā, na tu pravṛttiviṣayatayā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:266: nanu saṃśayānasya kathaṃ prekṣāvataḥ pravṛttiritya āha--na khalviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:267: yadyapi ca sasyādhigamasya kṛṣyādisādhyatayā saṃśayo nāsti, tathāpi bhaviṣyattayā astyeva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:270: yathā ca tatra śataikāṃśikaḥ phalābhāvaḥ phalakoṭistūtkaṭā tathātrāpi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:276: yadvacanena hi yaḥ pravartate sa tadvacanādeva viśeṣasmṛtimapekṣate, na svātantryeṇa /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:277: na hi rogārto mamedaṃ roganivṛttisādhanaṃ bhavenna veti yatra tatrocchṛḍkhalaḥ svayamutprekṣya pravartate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:283: athābhimatasyāpi śakyasyāpi prayojanasya laghīyasyupāyāntare satyapi gururayamupāyaḥ pipāsuṃ prati gīrvāṇataraḍgiṇītīrasamīpakūpakhananopadeśavat /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:286: na hi kaścid vaidyavacanādeva māśaḍkya nivartate yathā
GSP29nvtp1_1u:290: iha dvividhaḥ pramāṇaśabdasyārthaḥ--pramīyate 'neneti ca pramāṇam, pramitiḥ pramāṇamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:293: nanvidindrayādīnāmajñāyamānānāmeva svaviṣayaparicchedajanakatvaṃ paśyannapi kathamevaṃ brūyādityata āha--na hīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:294: pramāṇatvenājñāyamānaṃ pramāṇaṃ svaviṣayaṃ paricchinatti, na tvavadhārayati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:298: yadyapi niścayākārameva jñānamādhatte tathāpi tathābhūtasyaiva bhūyo bhūyaḥ prameyaviraholabdherviśeṣānupalabdheśca saṃdehastadavaskandatītyarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:301: tathā pūrvapakṣiṇaḥ kvacidapi viniścayo nāstyevetyādikaścābhimāno viruddhyetetyata āha--api tviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:302: yadi kvacit prameyatattvāvadhāraṇaṃ paramārthaḥ, tadā pramāṇatattvāvadhāraṇadvāreṇaiva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:306: evaṃ copadhidvayāvacchinnāyāḥ sattāyā upādhibhedād bhinnāyā ivaikasminnarthe samavāyaḥ kṛtakatvānityatvayoriva na viruddhaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:308: pramāṇyāvadhāraṇaṃ tarhi kkopayujyata ityata āha--tadeva hīti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:320: na hi tadapyaupādhikaṃ yenopādhyanavadhāraṇe naivāvadhāryetetyata āha--tathā hīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:323: svato vetyasya svātmanā vā svagrāhakeṇa vetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:328: yo hi yad gṛhṇāti sa taddharmamapi gṛhṇīyāditi saṃbhāvyetāpi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:329: yastu dharmiṇameva nākalayati, tasya dharmagrahaṇavārtāpi kva?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:330: yadyapi ca śabdagandhādayo vyomabhūmyādyagrahe 'pi gṛhyante, tathāpi na taddharmatayetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:332: taddhi mānasaṃ vā syāt laiḍgikaṃ vā?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:333: ubhayamapi manaso jñātatālakṣaṇāt liṅgād vā aviśiṣṭāt jāyamānaṃ kathamiva tadābhāsaviśiṣṭaṃ gṛhṇīyat?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:334: viṣayaviśeṣāt tu tathātve apramāṇyasyāpi svata eva grahaṇaprasaṅgāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:336: pramāyāḥ prāyikatayā tadvāsanāyāḥ samutkaṭatvādapramāpi samutkaṭatvādapramāpi prametyeva gṛhyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:338: śuktikāyāṃ śuktikātvamiti yadi tathāpyāsaṃjakasyāpi yadyāsaṃjakatvamavagataṃ kathaṃ na svato 'prāmāṇyagrahaṇaprasaṅgaḥ?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:340: na ca kṛtrimaṃ rūpamaparibhūya grahaṇaṃ grahaṇāmityucyate, saṃśayenābhibhūtatvāt
GSP29nvtp1_1u:343: yadi tu daivād gṛhyate, tadā jñānamityeva; na tu pramāṇamapramāṇaṃ vetyarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:344: nanu yadi svīyāt svata iti na nirvahati,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:349: na hi tatra kiñcidanavasthādikaṃ paśyāma ityata āha--eteneti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:351: kadācit pramāṇavyavahārasauṣṭhavāt svīkriyetāpi yadyayaṃ tena nirvahet, na tvetadasti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:352: yathā hi pramāṇaṃ svātmānaṃ gṛhṇat prāmāṇyamapi gṛhṇāti tathā tadābhāsamapi tadābhāsatva gṛhṇīyāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:363: prātyakṣike ca vahnijñāne prātyakṣikameva vahnijñānāntaramiti yāvat /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:367: evaṃ śābde 'pi śābdajñānānantaraṃ tadāptaśabdajamāptāntaraśabdajaṃ ceti samānajātīyasaṃvādo darśitaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:368: arthakriyetyādinā kāryaliṅgakaṃ tadgocaretyādinā cākāryakāraṇaliṅgakamanumānatrayaṃ vijājīyasaṃvādarūpaṃ darśitam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:370: āptopadeśajamapi saṃvādakaṃ jñānaṃ bhavatyeva jñānaṃ bhavatyeva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:371: so 'yaṃ pramāṇye niścetavye saṃvādo yadyapi vyadhikaraṇastathapyarthatathātvamava dhārayannarthavattvaṃ pravartakasyāpyavadhārayatītyetāvatā tathaivopavarṇitaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:373: evaṃ pramātvasya duradhigamatvamāpādya tadāyattāvadhāraṇe pramāṇānāṃ pramāṇatve yojayati--yadā ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:375: tadā saiva sārvalaukikī svata ityādivikalpān phalgūkariṣyati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:376: atha tadavadhāraṇavyatirekeṇāpi pravṛttirapratyūhā tadā māvadhāri prāmāṇyam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:378: vaidikaṃ vyavahāramadhikṛtya cedaṃ śāstraṃ pravṛttam, na laukikamityabhisandhiḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:388: yadyapi deśāvasthābhede kālabhedo 'pyarthasiddhastathāpi yathākathañcit kālabhedamātraṃ vivakṣitamatreti jñāpanārthaṃ tadgrahaṇam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:389: tathā hi dūrasthe sthāṇau puruṣarpatyayasya kālāntare 'pi visaṃvādo nāsti yāvat
GSP29nvtp1_1u:391: pratyetavya eva vā yāvanna nediṣṭhaḥ syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:392: evaṃ svapnāvasthāyām arthapratyayasya kālabhede 'pi tāvanna visaṃvādo yāvanna jāgarāvasthānubhavaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:393: na ca vācyamevaṃ sati kiṃ kālabhedagrahaṇeneti,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:394: deśāvasthayorabhede 'pi kālakrameṇāpi kvacid visaṃvādadarśanād yathā sunipuṇanibhālanādāpātajātasya kāmāturakāminījñānasya bhede 'pi kvacit kālāntare visaṃvādāt tadupagrahaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:395: tadanenendriyādīnāṃ kālakramabhāvinaḥ sahakāribhedāḥ sphuṭatarapratītihetavaḥ sarva eva saṃgṛhītāḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:396_0: yadyapi ca pramāraviṣayāveva visaṃvādāvisaṃvādau saṃbhavavyabhicāralakṣaṇau tathāpyavisaṃvādasya
GSP29nvtp1_1u:398: yadyapi samarthapravṛtti tvādityuktesamañjasaṃ tathāpi pravṛttiryasyeti sambandhe ṣaṣṭhī /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:399: sa ca pramāṇapravṛttyorjanyajanakabhāva eveti sa eva
GSP29nvtp1_1u:401: nanu na tāvat pramāṇyasamarthapravṛtti janakatvayoravinābhāvaḥ pratyakṣeṇa śakyagrahaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:408: siddhau vā kimanumānena, anumānantarasiddhatve tvanavasthaivetyata āha--yadi punariti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:410: vyatirekī ca sarvatra sapakṣābhāvamabhyupetya pravartata iti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:412: na ca vācyam etasyaivānumānasyārthavattvānavadhāraṇe kathaṃ pramāṇānāmarthavattvasiddhiḥ?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:415_1: pramāṇānāṃ pramāṇaphalatvalakṣaṇaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ sādhyata iti sarvaṃ sundaram //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:416: etenaitadapi nirastam yat prāmāṇyānavadhāraṇe aprāmāṇyānavadhāraṇamapi katham?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:418: tadanavadhāraṇe tu vyatirekaniścayo 'pi katham, vipakṣasya tathātvāniścayāditi?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:420: nanu nāstyevāsau vādī yaḥ prāmāṇyāniścaye 'pi vipratipadyeta /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:421: na hi prāmāṇyaṃ svīkṛtya tanniścaye vipratipattiḥ, svīkārasya niścayamūlatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:424: aniścite ca prāmāṇye tadatadrūpasaṃdeho 'pi kvacid durlabhaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:429: na ca vikalpanirmite na saṃśayādivyavahāraḥ samasti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:430: nahi vājiviṣāṇaṃ veti kaścit sandigdhe, nāpi naraviṣāṇamiti kasyacid viparyayaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:434: tat kathaṃ kevalavyatirekyanumānam ityāśaḍkya saṃpratipattirūttaram--anvayavyatirekī veti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:437: svata iti ca taditarasyāpi, svataḥ parataśca prāmāṇyasiddheriti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:438: nanu samarthapravṛttijanakatvādityetāvataiva sādhyasiddheḥ pramāṇator'thapratipattāvityasamarthaviśeṣaṇaṃ vayadhikaraṇa cetyata āha--pravṛttijanakatvaṃ tviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:439: prāmāṇyādyabhidhānadvārā hi śāstrasya niḥśreyasena saṃgatiḥ, na tu svarūpeṇa /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:440: tato yathā pramāṇāditattvajñānaṃ sādhyatayā prayojanaṃ pratijñāyate tathā pramāṇādyabhidheyatayāpi pratijñeyaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:442: iti dharmasya vyākhyeyatvenaiva pratijñā samānatantre na ca tadabhidheyatāpratijñānamatra /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:443: tasmādabhidheyattvāpratijñānānna pramāṇādayaḥ śāstreṇābhidhīyanta iti śrotṛbuddhacanurodhenāśaḍkya sūtrakārahṛdayānurodhena vārttikamuttarayatisyādetaditi //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:444: śiṣyākāṅkṣākrameṇa hi śāstramidaṃ pravṛttam, anapekṣitābhidhāne anavadheyatvaprasaṅgāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:445: na ca śiṣyākāṅkṣā kiṃ vakṣyati bhavāniti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:448: tataḥ kathamiti? tataḥ ke, kati, kiṃlakṣaṇāḥ pramāṇādayaḥ iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:453: uktāboddhāraṃ prati tu vyākhyātāro bhavanti, yata
GSP29nvtp1_1u:455: tadanubhavasiddhamapi pramāṇādyabhidhāyakatvaṃ yaḥ kutaścid vyāmohānna pratipadyate taṃ prati vyākhyātā śāstrasya puruṣaśreyo 'bhidhāyakatvādityāhetyarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:461: tarhi śreyaḥ punaḥ sukhamahitanivṛttiriti kimityata āha--yadyapīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:462: yadyapi śāstra punaḥ puruṣaḥ punaḥ śreyaḥ punariti pratipadaṃ gṛhītvā vivaraṇaṃ prakṣayeṇetyantena sphuṭāvabhāsam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:465: na hi rāgādimantaṃ prati śāstraṃ na sasādhanaṃ śreyo 'bhidhatte /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:466: na ca taṃ prati na tat śreyo yena vītarāgo vivicya gṛhyatām /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:468: tasmāt tat śāstraṃ puruṣaśreyo 'bhidhatta iti madhyapatitopasaṃhāra eva vivaraṇavicchedabhramo mā bhūdityetadarthamavacchinatti--upabhogāt prakṣayeṇetyanteneti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:469: nanu samūho vyūhaviśiṣṭa ityasaṃgatam, paryāyatvādityata āha--vyūha iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:470: te khalvamī samūhāḥ praṇetṛpuruṣecchānurodhinaḥ svārthānurodhino vetyata āha--eka-smṛtīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:472: padamityetāvadeva lakṣaṇaṃ tathāpyetadeva lakṣaṇaṃ kṣaṇabhaḍgurāṇāṃ kathamityetaduktam--ekasmṛtisamārūḍhā iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:478: gauraścaḥ puruṣo hastītyāderapi vākyatvaprasaṅgādityata āha--evaṃ svārtheti samūho veditavyaḥ sūtratveneti śeṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:481: śāstrameva sūtrasamūharūpaṃ prakaraṇamiti prāptamityata āha--evaṃ kvaciditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:506: nanu ca tatra ekaprakāro 'pi na darśitaḥ, kathaṃ tatra tatra veditavyamityata āha--etāśceti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:507: nanu śāstrasya sasādhanapuruṣaśreyo 'bhidhāyakatvaṃ pratijñāya śāstrasvarūpadarśanaṃ kkopayujyata ityata āha--tadevamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:509: nanu pratītisiddhaṃ pramāṇādīnāṃ ṣoḍaśatvaṃ kimityanūdyata ityatastannirākaraṇīyām āśaḍkāmāha--nanviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:520: pratyakṣānumāneti pramāṇadvayopanyāsaḥ svasiddhāntaviruddho vāttikakṛta ityāha--pramāṇādaya iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:525: tathāpi na tena te sākṣād viṣayīkriyante pramāṇādaya ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:526: nanu yadi sākṣādupamānasya prakṛtānupayogādanabhidhānam, tarhi śabdo 'bhidhīyatām /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:529: āgamo hi yatra pravartate tadviṣayameva pratyakṣamanumānaṃ vā apekṣate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:530: te tu samūle api na sviṣayapravṛttaṃ pramāṇamapekṣete /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:531: tato mūlāsaṃplutaviṣayatvāt te eva darśite ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:532: vainayiketi viśiṣṭo nayaḥ śāstraṃ nyāyaśāstram, tajjanyabuddhivirahiṇa ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:537: vipratipanno 'pi kathāmārabhamāṇo 'pyamumukṣurgalite 'haṅkāre na sāpekṣo bhavatītyato niṣphalo jalpavitaṇḍārambha ityata āha-- śiṣyamāṇasyeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:546: te 'bhī durlalitāḥ śiṣyā yadi mokṣādāvapi indriyādyapekṣante, tadā kathaṃ pratipādyā ityato
GSP29nvtp1_1u:552: nanvetāvatāpi sāpekṣā anenaiva śāstreṇa pratipādyāḥ pratyakṣānumānābhyāṃ ceti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:554: paramapuruṣārthasādhanaṃ tu jijñāsava iti śeṣe nyāyeneti śeṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:555: iha yadyapi sukhaṃ dṛṣṭameva vidhāyakapramāṇagocara eva ahitanivṛttiradṛṣṭaiva niṣedhakapramāṇagocara eveti yathāsaṃkhyamapi saṃbhavati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:556: tathāpi śreyaḥ punaḥ sukhamahitanivṛttiśceti ato na kiñcidadhikamuktaṃ bhavatīti pramāṇāviśeṣasaṃbandhakathanameva param /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:558: na cābhimataśreyoviśeṣanirdhāraṇe kartavye vidhiniṣedhagocaratvopavarṇanamupayujyata ityabhisaṃdhāyānyathā vyācaṣṭe--tatrāpīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:559: tacchreyaḥ sukhamahitanivṛttiśceti tacchabdena dvayamapi śreyastvena parāmṛśyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:584: nanu yadi nivṛttiriti nanu yadi nivṛttiḥ prāgabhāvo duḥkhasya, sa kathamātyantikaḥ?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:586: prāgābhāvasya ca tathātve prāgityeva na syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:588: sa ca sarva evātyantika iti kuto nivṛtterātyantikatvavyutpādanamityata āha--ātyantikatvamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:597: atha śarīrādiṣu nivṛtteṣvapi dukhaṃ kiṃ na bhavet? mā bhūd duḥkham, sukhaṃ kiṃ na bhavet? na
GSP29nvtp1_1u:599: tathā cānuṣaḍgāsukhinivṛttiḥ kimupavarṇyaya ityata āha--na hīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:601: atḥ śarīrādiṣvasatsu duḥkhavat sukhamapi na bhavati, tasyāpi tatkāryatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:611: nanu viṣayā apyanitaretarasādhanasādhyāḥ pajcaiva vibhāge parīkṣāyāṃ ca siddhāḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:619: sukhaduḥkhayostu duḥkhahetutvameva nāsti, sukhasya vijātīyārambhakatve 'pi rāgamātrāmbhakatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:621: icchādveṣaprayatnāstu pratīyamānā eva sākṣād duḥkha janayanti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:623: mumukṣustāvadicchāmi dveṣmi yogābhyāsādanyatra prayata iti pratītyaiva duḥkhī bhavati,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:625: anyo 'pīṣyamāṇālābhe bubhukṣito 'smi pipāsito 'smīti pratītya duḥkhī bhavati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:626: hitamevāhitamupalabhya dviṣato nivṛttabhramasya hitameva dveṣmi, dhiḍ māmiti duḥkham /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:627: evamaniṣṭa evārthe iṣṭabuddhyā prayatamānasya nivṛtte bhrame tathā alasasya prayatnamupalabhyaiva duḥkhamityetāvataita eva manaso viṣayatvena nirdiṣṭāḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:634: iha yadyapi anuṣaḍgo 'vinābhāva iti vakṣyati vāttikakāraḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:638_0: ata eva ādhārasyopalabdhisādhanasya ca sāmye 'pyekatarasya kāraṇābhāvenābhāve 'pyanyatarasabhdāvenāvinābhāva
GSP29nvtp1_1u:647: tadapi duḥkhahetuḥ, iṣṭaviyogo hi duḥkhaṃ janayatīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:648: kṣayitvaṃ kāme satīti tu vyākhyānaṃ duḥkhahetava iti bahuvacanaviruddham,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:652: na hi sukha tatsādhanaṃ vā anicchataḥ sukhaṃ nāma sukhasādhanaṃ ca /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:670: dvitīyā tu viṣayasya piriṇativirasatvād duḥkhameva prasūte,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:675: indriyādīnāṃ punardeṣapravṛttyabhāve 'pi duḥkhaṃ prati vyāpāro jīvanmuktasyāstyeva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:678: na hi bhāvini janmāntare śarīrendriyāviṣayabuddhisukhaduḥkhānyāhatya vyāpriyante yathā dharmādharmau //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:679: etadevābhisaṃdhāya kāraṇarūpadharmādharmocchedakrameṇa kāryarūpaikaviṃśatividhaduḥkhasyocchedovārttikakṛtā darśita iti tathaiva vāttikamavatārayati--uktaprakāreti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:693: nyāyo mārga iva nyāyamārgaḥ, niḥreyasabhūmeḥ prāptihetutvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:697: tadevaṃ pūrvoktena nyāyena mokṣamāṇasya śāstre pravṛttiḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:705: yadyapi ca yāvaccharīrādibhāvinī pravṛttistathāpi doṣānuṣaṅgasahakārivirahānnāsau pravṛttiḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:708: yadyapi yathānādau bhāvaparamparāyāṃ karmāṇi pracīyante tathāpacīcante 'pi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:713: bhogastu nāstyeva taccharīraṃ yatra nāsti, bhogasya tadāyatanatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:718: tathāpyāgamaprāmāṇyāt kāyayaugapadyasyāpi prasaṃkhyānaphalatayā siddhatvādanantāmaniyatavipākasamayatāṃ cābhyupagamyaiva parihṛtam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:720: yogardhiprabhāvasampanno vividhaphalabhogino vicitrasvabhāvānekadaiva bahūn kāyān icchāmātreṇaiva nirmimīta ityatra daṇḍakāraṇyasṛṣṭirūdāhaṇamiti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:721: iha kecid āhuḥ, duḥkhanivṛtti puruṣārtha eva svarūpato na bhavati sopādhitvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:722: sukhaṃ duḥkhābhāve satyeva bhavatīti sukhasādhanāntaravat duḥkhābhāvo 'pi mṛtyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:723: na nu sa eva puruṣasya samīhita iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:726: na tu vaiśeṣikī muktiṃ gautamo gantumicchati //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:730: bhojanādisukhe satyeva hi bubhukṣādiduḥkhaṃ nivartata iti duḥkhanivṛttyarthameva bhojanādisukhaṃ mṛgyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:731: na punastadeva tasya samīhitamiti kiṃ na kalpayate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:736: tasmād yadyapi duḥkhahānau sukham, sukhe ca duḥkhahānirniyatā, tathāpi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:738: anyastvāha--bhavatyeva hi duḥkhahāniḥ puruṣārthaḥ, kiṃ tvanubhūyamānatayā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:739: na hi viṣādijanyamohāvasthāyāṃ duḥkhanivṛttiriti tadarthaṃ prekṣāvantaḥ pravartante /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:743: na hi mūrcchādyavasthārthaṃ pravṛtto dṛśyate sudhīḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:748: na hi paradāreṣu śāstraniṣedhāḍkuśanivāritāḥ prekṣāvanto na pravartanta iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:749: na tatra kāmaḥ puruṣārthaḥ, api tvalpīyaḥ sukhaṃ mahānanartha iti nivṛttiḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:751: mahīyān pravartata iti na te pravartanta iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:752: iyameva hi prekṣā yat puruṣārthatve 'pi lokaśāstravirodhaparāmarśaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:755: tatra vyādhyādiparipīḍitāḥ prayāgavaṭaprapātānaśanādināpi dehaṃ tyajantaḥ prekṣāvanto dṛśyante /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:756: na hi kaścid duḥkhanivṛttimanubhaviṣyāmīti tatsādhane pravartate, api tu duḥkha hāsyāmīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:759: ādyaścet, tuṣyatu durjanaḥ carame janmanyanubhūyata eva samādhiprabhāvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:762: tathātve vā viṣayāntarasaṃcārābhāvaprasaṅgāt, nivṛtteḥ sarvadā tādavasthyāditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:763: tasmāt sarvadānanubhūyamānāpi yathā kaṇṭakādijanyaduḥkhanivṛttiḥ puruṣārthatayā puruṣaṃ prayojayati,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:772: yathā hyatrānarthasya bhūyastvamarthasya tu kṣudratvam, na tathāpavarge 'pīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:775: tathā sukhaśabalatayā duḥkhamapyupādeyaṃ kiṃ na syāt?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:780: yastu ghanataraduḥkhatimiranirantarāt saṃsārakāntārāt sukhakhadyotikāsu dyotamānāsvapi bibheti taṃ prati ayaṃ nirastatamaskatayā sugamo mārga upadiśyata iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:783: tathā ca jagataḥ śamāyetyanena virodha ityata āha--avivekināmapīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:784: yadyapi kasyacidapravṛttāvapi na sarvārthatā asya hīyata iti prapañcitamadhastāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:785: tathāpi heyaṃ heyatvenāgṛhṇanto mandāḥ kāruṇikeṇa grāhayitavyā ityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:787: vairāgyācca śāstre pravṛttiriti durūttaramitaretarāśrayatvamityata āha--śāstre pravṛttīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:788: duḥkhādudvijato bhogavaimukhyamātramiha vairāgyaṃ vivakṣitam, na tu rāgābhāva evetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:791: na hi kaścit sukhaṃ prāptumiva duḥkhamapyāptuṃ pravartate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:792: nāpi kaścit duḥkhahānāyeva sukhahānāyāpītyata āha--puruṣabhedo rāgavairāgyābhyāmiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:793: nanu sukhasya heyatvameva kuta ityata āha--prāptavyasyeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:808: idaṃ śuklabhāsvararūpaṃ śuktikādravyaṃ na rajatamiti jñānamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:812: tadevaṃ paricchedadvāreṇa paricchedakamunnīyata iti paricchedasyaiva sāmānyaviśeṣayoḥ paricchedatvāparicchedatve darśite /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:819: tataśca saiva buddhiḥ svarūpāvasthitenārthena nirūpyamāṇā pramā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:826: evaṃ ca pravṛttisāmarthyāsāmarthyasaṃdehe 'pi yadi tajjanakamapramāṇamasamarthaiva sā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:831: siddho vyatirekaḥ, ki cāta ityata āha--tathā ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:833: nanu tasyā ityatra kathamanantaratvena prakṛtāmasamarthāṃ vihāya vyavahitvenāprakṛtāpi samarthaiva pravṛtti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:839: saṃdehādapi pravṛttestatra tatra darśanāt nirūcchvāsamākṣepamujjīvayati--na tāvaditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:854: iha ca dvidhā pravṛttiḥ, aihikaphalā āmuṣmikaphalā ca /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:860: tatrāpyasau svahetubalādāyato na pravṛttiṃ prati prayojakaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:861: anyathaikāntikavijayāniścaye prāmāṇyākṣepaka eva vijigīṣuḥ kathāyāṃ na pravarteta //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:862: na hi jalpato vitaṇḍayato vā avaśyamaikāntiko vijayaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:863: tasmādarthāniścaye 'pi pravṛttirityubhayavādisiddhaṃ hṛdi nidhāya siddhāntamupakramate--tatra brūma iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:866: te hi pramāṇatayā pravṛtteḥ prāgava niścīyante /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:869: sa ca viṣayagocarastannāntarīyakārthagocaro vā tajjātīyatvāvadhāraṇopāyo yatra svarūpato 'pi nāsti tatra pravṛttisāmarthyādeva tadgocarasya prāmāṇyāvadhāraṇam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:871: yatra tu svarūpābhyāso 'styeva tadgataṃ tu śreyaḥsādhanamabhyastam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:873: yathā angiḥ pākādisamartha iti saṃbhāvitāptatvasya vacanādupalabhya svayaṃ pacataḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:874: yatrāpi śreyaḥsādhanatve 'bhyāsaḥ svarūpe tvanabhyāsastatrāpi svarūpagocarasyaiva prāmāṇyaṃ pravṛttisāmarthyādavasīyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:878: tadamī saṃśayānā apipravartamānāḥ phala iva svarūpaśreyaḥsādhanatvayoriti śeṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:887: tathāpi tajjātīyatvalakṣaṇenaiva liḍgena pravṛtteḥ prāgevāvadhārite prāmāṇye tatpramāturūttarakālaṃ pramitsaiva nāsti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:889: yadi punaḥ pramitsānapekṣameva samarthapravṛttijanakatvaṃ parāmṛśyate, tadā kā kṣatiḥ?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:892: nanu kimidaṃ tajjātīyatvam? na tāvat pramāṇajātīyatvam, sādhyāviśiṣṭatvaprasaṅgāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:898: liḍgaṃ ca tasya prāmāṇyaikaniyatasya yadyasti tadā prāmāṇyameva tenānumīyatām,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:904: tatrāpi pravṛtteḥ prāgeva prāmāṇyāvadhāraṇaṃ syāt, vyāpterapi prāgeva pratītatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:905: na hyayaṃ kvacidapi tajjātīyatvena prāmāṇyaṃ nānumitavāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:908: abhyāsadaśāpanneṣu tajjātīyatvena prāmāṇye 'numīyamāne pravṛttisāmarthyānumitaprāmāṇyasya sādhanavikalatayā dṛṣṭāntābhāsatvaprasaṅgāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:911: tathāpi jñānasya viṣyanibandhanatvāt tattadviṣayopādhaya eva te te jñānopādhayastaistairūpādhibhirūpādhīyamānaṃ jñānameva tajjātīyaṃ tasya bhāvastattvaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:912: te copādhayaḥ pratibhedaṃ svasaṃjñābhirabhidhātumaśakyā iti tajjātīyatvamityanayā vācobhaḍgyā darśitāḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:916: tatra dharmisvarūpeṇopadhīyamāno 'nubhavaḥ pramaiveti tena rūpeṇānubhūte tasmin pramātvamevānubhūtaṃ bhavatītyagre sphuṭībhaviṣyati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:919: tatra svarūpaprakāreṇopahitamanubhava vivektuṃ viśiṣṭāḥ prakāropādhayo bhavanti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:920: te ca niyamena vibhramaviṣayavirodhitayā nirdhāritasvabhāvabhedā guṇādaya eva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:922: yadā tvapratyakṣe lakṣye lakṣaṇena jñānaṃ janyate tadānumānaṃ taditi tasyānyathaiva gatirbhaviṣyatīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:926: karmaṇi tu avātulena tiṣṭhatā tīvravegāsaṃskṛtena calajjalādisvacchavilokanādivirahiṇā yad dravyaṃ calatītyupalabhyate tat tatheti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:927: evaṃ teṣu teṣu viśeṣeṣu te te viśeṣā vyabhicāravirodhino na pratipadamanukramituṃ śakyante /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:930: yatra tu sa evārtho bhūyo bhūyo 'bhyastaḥ, tatra saṃvādakatvameva tajjātīyatvam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:934: abhyāsadaśāpannatvaṃ punaretasya bhūyodarśanena mantrāyurvede tajjātīyatvāya prāmāṇyāvinābhāvasiddhiḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:936: yathā ca prāmāṇyaṃ pravṛttisāmarthyenāvadhāryate anabhyāsadaśāpanneṣu tathāprāmāṇyamapi pravṛttiviparyayeṇa /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:947: atha phalajñānasyaiva prāmāṇyaṃ kathamavadhāraṇīyamityatra keṣāñcinmatamāha--na ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:950: phalajñānaṃ hi phalasya siddhāvasthasya sādhanānarhatayā niṣprayojanībhūtatvād vā na parīkṣyet tattajjātīyajñānasya sarvāsvavasthāsu arthāvyabhicāritayā niḥśaṅkatvād veti?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:955: siddha eva hi phale parīkṣite tatsādhanasya tathātvasiddhāvuttarottarulābhisandhiḥ syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:956: nāpi dvitīyaḥ, phalajñānasyāpi bhūyo bhūyaḥ spapnādyavasthāsu vyabhicāra darśanāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:957: svasthāvasthasya phalajñānaṃ na vyabhicaratīti cet--evaṃ tarhi pirīkṣitameva phalajñānaṃ syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:958: tathā hi yat svasthāvasthasya phalajñānaṃ tadavyabhicārīti vyāptisiddhau yatraiva tathābhūtajñānatvaṃ paśyati,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:960: asyāpyabhyāsadaśāpannatvaṃ prāmāṇyāvināmūtaliḍgopalambhastathā tajjātīyatvaṃ punaḥ svasthāvasthasya phalajñānatvameva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:962: nanu yadvijñāna dṛṣṭāntayitavyaṃ tasyāpi prāmāṇyaṃ kathaṃ sādhanīyam?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:963: evaṃ tattatsādhanasyāpi dṛṣṭāntaparamparāyāḥ kathamityata āha--na ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:965: tajjātīyatvena liḍgena prāmāṇye sādhiyitavye yadyad dṛṣṭāntīkriyate tasya tasyeti mantavyam //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:966: yadyavam, pravṛttisāmarthyamanavakāśameva, na hyasti tadvijñānaṃ yat sarvathaivāpūrvaviṣayam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:967: tathā ca pramāṇator'thapratipattipravṛttisāmarthyayoḥ kathamanāditvamāha--vārttikakāra ityata āha--eteṣu ca madhya iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:969_0: yadyapi phalaṃ na pravṛttiviṣayastathāpi tatsādhanagocarāyāḥ tatsaṃtānagocarāyā eva
GSP29nvtp1_1u:969_2: svasya narāntarasya vā pravṛttisāmarthyaṃ phalajñānasya draṣṭāvyam //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:970_1: samarthya tadubhayopapattaye samānanyāyatayaiva āntarapratyakṣajñāneṣu madhye phalajñānaprāmāṇyaṃ samarthitam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:973: tasya cānumānasamānanyāyatayā anumānaprāmāṇyasamarthanānantarameva samarthanaṃ kariṣyata ityabhiprāyavānāha--anumānasyeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:975: sā ca vyāptipakṣadharmatāgrāhakaireva pramāṇairapanīyata iti bhavati nirastasamastavyabhicāraśaṅkamanumitijñānam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:976: tasyaivaṃbhūtasya svata eva prāmāṇyaṃ niścīyata iti śeṣaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:977: nanu pramāṇatvāviśeṣe 'pi kathamanumitereva svataḥ, na pratyakṣāderityata āha--anumeyeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:990: na tvavadhāraṇātmakatayeti na tayoḥ svataḥ prāmāṇyagrahaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:991: atha daivādayogavyavacchedātmake evotpadyete anuvyavasīyete ca, tadā ca niyāmakamantarbhāvyaiva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:992: tadabhāve tvaviśeṣādavadhāraṇātmakatvaṃ paribhūya tadatadrūpasādhāraṇamevāvatiṣṭheta ityāśayavān niyāmakābhāvamevāha--pratyakṣajñānaṃ tviti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1001: etena śaḍkāmātramapanīyate jñānāntarairiti yaduktaṃ kaiścit tannirastam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1004: tathā ca jñānasvarūpagrāhiṇaḥ kauṇṭhye pratyakṣādyantarābhāve cānumānamevopāya iti tadāha--pravṛttisāmarthyamiti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1005: syādetat, yadi pratyakṣaśābdajñānayoḥ parataḥ prāmāṇyam, tat kimidānīmanuvyavasāyasyāpi parata eva?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1006: tathā ca liḍgaṃ niścitameva niścāyakamityanena nyāyena liṅgāntaraparamparājñānamanavasthāmavatārayatītyata āha--jñānagateti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1012: na ca śuktikākāre jñāne rajataṃ jānāmīti syāditi tadidamuktam--tādṛśasyeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1014: sabāhyabhyantaraṃ dharmi mātragocaramapi pratyakṣaṃ svata eva pramāṇam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1022: santi hi tatrāpi yathāyogaṃ liṅgasādṛśyajñānasamutthatvādīni tajjātīyatvaliṅgāni tathāpi koṣṭhagatyā svata eva prāmāṇyagraho 'tra na svayamiti sa eva darśitaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1023: vipratipannaṃ prati tu parata eva sādhanīyaṃ taditi paramārthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1027: na hi phalayathārthatvamevāmīṣāṃ prāmāṇyamityata āha--sevadanasya ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1033: tathendriyādyapyarthavyabhicāriṇaṃ tathāvidhasahakāryupabṛṃhitaṃ tenārthena saṃbandhāt tadarthāvyabhicāri jñānaṃ janayedityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1034: tadetatprāmāṇyaṃ nāvaśyaṃ sarvatrāvadhāryate, tadā śrayasyaiva saṃvedanasya sarvatrānavadhāraṇāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1035: tathā sati cānavasthāyā viṣayasaṃcāro na syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1036: tasmāt tīvrasaṃvegitayā yattu saṃvedanamavaśyaṃ saṃvedanīyam, yatra yatra cāparo viśaṣataḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1037_0: sāmānyato vā vipratipadyate jijñāsate vā tatra tatra prāmāṇyamuktenāpāyenāvadhāraṇīyamityato
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1038: nanvarthāniśvayenāpi pravartamāno na hi tatsādhanatāmanumāya pravartitumarhati arthitvābhāvāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1040: na ca so 'pi pravṛtti vineti tadavasthamevetaretarāśrayatvamityata āha--arthasyeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1041: yadyapi prāmāṇyāniścayavadapekṣitopāyatvāniścayenāpi tatra tatra pravartate tathāpyapekṣitopāyatāṃ pākṣikīmapyurarīkṛtya pravṛttiḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1048: nanu pramāṇasya prayojanavattvamākṣiptaṃ vā samādhīyeta jijñāsitaṃ vā jñāpyeta? na tāvadādyaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1049: na hyasti puruṣo yaḥ pramāṇaṃ niṣprayojanamiti brūyāt, tanmūlatvāt sarvapuruṣārthasiddheḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1050: yasya tu puruṣārtho nāsti sa nirūcchvāsa eva śīryeta /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1051: nāpi dvitīyaḥ, tasya saṃśayādivat sūtrapāṭhānantarameva jñāpayitumucitatvādityata āha--tatredamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1054: śāstrārthaubhūtasya paramanyāyasya niḥśreyasaṃ prati gurupāyatve manyamānena laghīyati pravṛttyupāyaṃ vidyamāne śāstrārambha evākṣipyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1059: ādigrahaṇena tu tadupāyabhūtāḥ pravṛttayo yamaniyamāsanaprāṇāyāmadhāraṇālakṣaṇa gṛhyante /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1065: śaḍkāmukvā bhāṣyamuttarayati--tatredamupaniṣṭhata iti tathāpi nyāyasya gurupāyatve na parihṛtam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1068: nanu ubhayorapi tulyatve kuto viśeṣāt pramāṇameva vyutpādyate na pravṛttiparītyata āha--tathāpīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1069: śravaṇamanananididhyāsanasākṣātkāralakṣaṇāyā pravṛtteḥ svarūpataḥ phalataśca pramāṇāntarbhūtatvāt tadvyutpādanameva pravṛttivyutpādanam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1070: na ca pravṛttivyutpādanena pramāṇaṃ vyutpāditaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1071: na hi pravṛtteḥ phalaṃ pramāṇaṃ tatsvarūpaṃ vetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1073: na hi pramāṇaṃ śāstrarthaḥ, api tu nyāya ityata āha--sāmānyābhidhānaṃ ceti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1075: tat kimaparamavaśiṣyate yadarthaṃ lokavṛttamanūdyata ityataḥ prathama tātparyamanusmārayanneva vārttikamavatārayati--prāmāṇyeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1076: apramāṇenetyatrāpi yadyapi vāñmanasavisaṃvādaḥ niṣedhavidhyupāya eva hi pramāṇam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1078: tathāpi vyāmohādapyupapatterevaṃbhūtābhiprāyasthairye 'pi nāsmākaṃ kācit kṣatirityetāvatā anujñaivāttaraṃ dattam--vāḍmanasayorvisaṃvāda iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1080: tataḥ pramāṇenetyevaṃ vadato 'vaśyaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ manasi viparivartate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1083: nanu pramāṇena khalvayaṃ jñātetyādi, bhāṣyaṃ lokavṛttānuvādo 'stu /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1087: tasyāvaśyābhyupeyatayā tadupāyo 'pyavaśyābhyupeya ityanenābhisandhinā sopāyameva tadanūdyata ityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1088: āgāmibhāṣye heyādīnāṃ sphuṭatvāt tasyedānīmakṣarārtho vyākriyata iti mā śaḍkiṣṭhā ityāha--asyaiveti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1091: amidheyānāṃ paurvāparyaniyamāya guṇapradhānabhāve jijñāsyamāne abhidhānarūpasya śāstrasya kaḥ prastāva ityata āha--śāstraśabda iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1092: evaṃ tarhi heyādīnāṃ śāstrārtharūpatayā na pṛthakkoṭitvam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1093: tathā caikakoṭikatayā kimapekṣya guṇapradhānabhāvacintetyata āha-atra ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1094: kathaṃ punaranena pramāṇādicaturvargo 'tra labhyate iti vārttikamanuktopālabhbho mā bhūdityata āha--teneti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1099: yadyapi ca hānasyāpi pramāṇarūpasya pratītirastyeva, tathāpi pramāṇādeveti taditaretyuktam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1101: jñānāt tu yasmāt tasya pramāṇāyattatvameveti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1105: nanu pramātrādīnāmapi prayojanavattvādarthavadityanena kiṃ pramāṇasyādhikyamāhitamityata āha--atiśāyane matuciti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1106: nanvasya caturvargadvayasya niḥśreyasādhigamaṃ prati vikalpaḥ, samuccayo vā?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1107: ubhayamāpyanupapannamabhinnatvāt tathā hi ya evārthaḥ pramātā prameyaṃ pramitiriti sa eva heyo 'dhigantavya iti ya evārtho hānopāyāviti sa eva pramāṇamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1108: saṃśayādīnāmapi nyāyaparikaratayā nyāyaśarīratvāt tasya ca pramāṇatvāditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1111: na hi bhavati tarūṇā vā vṛkṣeṇa vedaṃ sādhanīyaṃ tarūvṛkṣābhyāṃ vetyata āha--vivakṣābhedenati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1114: tathāpi yathā pramāṇtvena pramāṇaṃ jñeyaṃ tathā hānatvenāpi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1118: yathā ca svarūpeṇa saṃśayādayo jñeyāḥ pramāṇaparikaratayā tathā hānopāyatayāpi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1122: yathā ca śarīrādayo daśa prameyatayā jñeyāḥ tathā heyatayāpi, anyathā aheyāḥ syuḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1125: yathā cāpavargaḥ prameyatayā jñeyaḥ, tathā adhigantavyatayāpi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1129: yathā cātmā prameyatayā adhigantavyaḥ, tathā pramātṛtayāpi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1133: yathā ca buddhirbuddhitvena tathā tabhdedaḥ pramititayāpi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1134: anyathā pramityantaramanuśriyeta, niṣphalaṃ vā pramāṇaṃ syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1136: tasmāt ta eva pramāṇādayaḥ ubhayathā jñāyantāmiti vivakṣitvobhayacaturvargopādānaṃ kṛtamityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1144: adhigantavyamārogyamityataścaturṣu vaktavyeṣu ṣoḍaśapadārthavarṇanaṃ kkopayujyata iti tadāpi nirastam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1146: vivakṣābhedasya copapatti pratipadaṃ bhāṣyakāra eva darśayiṣyati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1151: kasmāt pramāṇāditi nābhihitam? evaṃ hyasaṃdigdhaiva pañcamī syādityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1153: pañcamyāḥ taseḥ prayogaṃ darśayitvā pañcamīvyatirekeṇa taseḥ ākṣepasamādhāne asaṃgate ityākṣepaṃ vyākhyāyāvatārayati--vacanavyāptyarthamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1156: viṣayaikatāmātra saṃplavaḥ, na tu kāraṇānāṃ samuccayaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1159: tathā sati vyāpārabhedo na syāditi jñāpanārthamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1161: evakāraḥ sādhakatamāntaraṃ vyavacchindan tasya vyāpāraṃ phalaṃ ca vyavacchinatti,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1164: kasmāt punaḥ karaṇārtho gamyate? prakṛtipratyayayoḥ katarasmādityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1166: yadi tṛtīyayā karaṇatvamabhidhīyate kiṃ prakṛtisthena lyuṭpratyayena?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1170: prātipadikādeva sākṣātkaraṇatvamarthato hetutvaṃ gamyata iti kiṃ vibhaktivyāptyetyata āha--atra ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1171: na ca vācyaṃ karaṇabhāvenāpi pramāṇaphalayostādātmyaṃ pratiṣedddhuṃ śakyam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1179: cānuvādakatvaṃ śabdābhyāsasya prayojanavattāvyatirekeṇa sidhyatītyataḥ prayojanaṃ darśayati--pramākārakāntarebhya iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1180: laukike tu prayoge saṃkhyābhidhānādvibhakteḥ sārthakatvaṃ draṣṭavyamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1182: agnyādiviśiṣṭe parvatādau pratyakṣānumānayoḥ saṃplavādityata āha--viśiṣṭo bhinna iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1185: tat kiṃ hetutvameva viṣayalakṣaṇam? netyāha--sa eva cārtha iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1189: nanu yadyapi pratyakṣaṃ na sāmānyarūpamavagāhate tathāpi yadyanumānamapi svalakṣaṇamavagāheta tata eva tāvatāpi saṃplavaḥ syādityata āha--na ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1190: nanu bhavatvanumānaṃ sāmānyamātraniyatam, pratyakṣamapi hyatra pravartsyati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1191: bhaviṣyati ca sāmānyamapi sattvādākārādhāyakamato 'pi saṃplavasiddhirityata āha--na ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1194: tat kiṃ sāmānyasyāsattvāt svalakṣaṇe ca pratibandhagrahāsaṃbhavādanumānaṃ nirviṣayamevetyata āha--tadidamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1197: kathaṃ ca tadavisaṃvādakam? kathaṃ ca bādhitākāraṃ pramāṇatayā vyavahiyata ityata āha-tasmāditi //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1198: nanu pramāṇāntareṇa saha saṃplavo bhaviṣyatyanayorityata āha--na ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1203: na hyasatā sāmānyena paramārthasat svalakṣaṇaṃ tadvad bhavitumarhati,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1205: so 'yaṃ gahanaḥ panthā ityāśayavān āha--yathā caitaditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1206: viśeṣa ityatra yadi karmakārakaṃ na ca
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1207: tatastadvannāmāparo 'stītyata āha--viśeṣa iti saṃplavamamṛṣyamāṇa idamāha mīmāṃsaha iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1213: na ca vācyaṃ smṛtisaṃtatiradhigatisaṃtatirvā astu vyavahārapravartinī na kaścidviśeṣa iti,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1216: smṛtisaṃtateścāvaśyaṃbhāvitayā tata eva vyavahārisiddhāvadhigatisaṃtatikalpanāyāṃ kalpanāgauravaprasaṃgādityāśayavān piṣṭapeṣaṇamevopasaṃharati--adhigatamiti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1217: nanu anyatheti vārttike yadi kāraṇagatamanyaprakāratvaṃ vivakṣitaṃ tadā kāraṇagataprakārabhede 'pi na kaścid viṣayagato viśeṣaḥ piṣṭapeṣaṇaparihāropayogī darśitaḥ syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1218: atha viṣayagata eva pramārabhado darśitaḥ, tadā anadhigatārthagantṛtayā kutaḥ saṃplavaḥ?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1219: na ca viṣayābhede 'pi pramāṇabhedāt kaścit phalaprakārabhedaḥ prakṛtopayogavānastītyata āha--ayamabhisandhiriti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1227: na ca viṣayādhigamaḥ pramākāraṇavirodhī, yena tasmin, satceva pramākāraṇamakāraṇaṃ bhavet /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1228: tasmādālocya svayameva nivarterat yadi cetayeran, na caitadastītyarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1251: eve tarhi vārttikārthaḥ ka ityata āha--sa eva ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1253: sa evānena kiṃ na pradarśyata ityata āha--yadyapīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1256: sa kathaṃ tenaiva pratibodhanīyaḥ? parapratibodhaśca prakṛtaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1258: evaṃ siddhaṃ pramāṇaṃ hṛdi kṛtvā saṃplavavyavasthe vicārite /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1261: yadi niścayo 'bhimataḥ syāt tasya nāvaśyaṃ saṃśayapūrvakatvamiti sandigdhasya praśna upapannaḥ syādata āha--avadhāryata iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1262: tathā ca vicārasya parīkṣāyā avaśyaṃ saṃśayapūrvakatvādagre
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1267: na ca sādhyasiddhau tajjātīyasya sādhakatamatvamasti, chinne vṛkṣe paraśoriva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1268: tasmād yathaivācchinnaviṣayatayā vyāpriyamāṇaḥ paraśuḥ chedanaṃ tathā pramite viṣaye vyāpriyamāṇamindriyādikaṃ pramāṇamiti momāṃsakāḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1271: na hi pramāṇasyārthe pramātiriktamapi kiñcit kartavyamasti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1277: arthamapi tadeva vyavasthāpayati yadarthapratītiṃ tadīyatayā niyamayati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1278: tathātvenāniyatāyāṃ tu tasyāṃ na kasyacit sā pratītiḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1279: sarvasya veti nārthena niyatā pratītiḥ syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1282: na hi cakṣuṣā janitatvādeva nīlasya nīlavijñānam, pītajñānasyāpi tathātprasaṅgāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1284: tasmādarthākāra evabuddhigato buddhiṃ tadīyatā vyavasthāpannarthamapi tathā vyavasthāpayati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1285: tataścārthavyavasthāpanahetutvāt sa eva pramāṇaṃ yadāha--arthasārūpyamasya pramāṇam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1288: na cābhinnātmani karaṇaphalabhāvo virudhyate, tatra kāraṇabhavasyaiva virodhāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1289: sa hi vyāpāravyāpāribhāvo vā, gamyagamakabhāvo vā svīkriyate eva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1290: vṛkṣādibhiḥ saṃyujyamāna eva hi paraśuḥ saṃyogena vyāpāreṇa karaṇamiti vyavahniyate loke /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1291: na ca saṃyogo nāma vigrahavānanyaḥ saṃyujyamānāt paraśorasti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1292: gamyagamakabhāvo 'pi svaprakāśe vijñāne bāhye ca vṛkṣe śiśapayā gamyamāne dṛṣṭa eva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1293: na hi śiṃśapātaḥ kaścidanyo vṛkṣo nā vṛkṣād vā śiṃśāpā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1294: vaikalpike tu vyavahāre yathātra vyāvṛttibhedastathā ākāratadvatorapīti na kaścid viśeṣa iti sautrāntikāḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1306: bhāvapraśnavyākhyānena bhavitṛpraśno vyākhyāta iti tu sahetyaśyāhṛtya kecid vyācakṣate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1307: kecit tu bhāvapraśnavyākhyā boddhavyā anena bhavitṛpraśno vyākhyāta iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1308: anye tu bhavāpraśnavyākhyānena hetunā bhavitṛpraśno vyākhyāto bhāvapraśnaṃ vyākhyātuṃ bhavitṛpraśno vyākhyātaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1314: nanu sthāṇurvā puruṣo vetyatropadarśitayorantaraḥ prāpyata eva, tat kathaṃ visaṃvādakatvam?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1316: yato na prāpyate, ata eva nārthakriyāsūpayujyate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1324: anāgate tu so 'pi nāstītyata āśaḍkitaṃ jñāpakatayeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1326: tasyāpi taramparayā arthakāryatvamarthajñāpakatvaṃ ca sākṣāt samānamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1332: tathā hi, na tāvad asya smṛtitvameva pravṛttinamittam, anubhavasyāpramātvaprasaṅgāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1336: nāpi pramātvaṃ nāma sāmānyaviśeṣaḥ samasti jñānagatasya sāmānyaviśeṣasya manomātragrāhyatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1338: kiṃ ca yadi pramātvaṃ sāmānyaviśeṣaḥ syāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1339: tadā tadabhāvavati tadviruddhasāmānyavati vā viparyayajñāne na samaveyāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1340: tathā ca viparyayajñānaṃ dharmiṇyapi na pramāṇaṃ syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1342: sāmānyaṃ ca sāmānyāntareṇa saha parāparabhāvena ekasyāṃ vyaktau samāviśet /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1347: sākṣātkāritve ca yadi paraṃ tadā asākṣātkāravatyo 'numitiprabhṛtayo na pramāḥ syuḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1352: tenaivāyaṃ pramāṇaśabdo yathārthajñānamātre niyataḥ kṛta iti cet--na,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1357: na hi yādṛśor'thaḥ smaryate yadā tādṛśa evāsau tadā, pūrvāvasthāyā vartamāne nivṛttatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1359: na ca nivṛttapūrvāvasthatayaiva tamarthaṃ smṛtirālambate, pūrvāvasthānivṛtterananubhūtatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1361: nanu samānaviṣayatvepi smṛtyanubhavayoranubhavo yathārtho, na tṛ smṛtiriti kṛta etat?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1363: nanu pūrvaṃ tāvattadavastha evāsāvāsīt, etāvataiva jñānamastu yathārtham /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1365: nanvatītaḥ śyāma iti pratyayaḥ tatra yathārtha eva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1372: yathā rajjuṃ bhujaṅgatayā anubhūya vidrutasya tathaiva smṛtiḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1375: tasmādubhayathāpi smṛteranyasyānubhavatvaikaniyataṃ yathārthatvameva pramāpadasya pravṛttinimittaṃ loko 'vadhāritavān /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1376: kathamanyathā tatraiva pramāśabdaṃ prayuḍkte nānyatreti yadyapi,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1377: tathāpi dharmiṇyapi smṛteḥ pramāṇyaṃ mābhūdityāśayavān prāguktayuktikaṃ lokaprayogamavāśritavān /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1383: na hyasti saṃbhavo mīmāṃsakasyāpi yathārthānubhavo na ca prameti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1384: tallakṣaṇe tvasmākaṃ kuto vipratipattirityata āha--anadhigatārthagantṛtvaṃ ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1388: yadi na pratyakṣeṇānumānopadeśābhyāmapi anityeṣvapi prāyaśaḥ upalabdhānāmevopalambhācca /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1392: bhūyastaṃmādiṣvanubhūyamāneṣu na kaścid guṇaprakāraḥ pratikṣaṇalabdhajanmāpavargaḥ paribhāvyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1395: na ca catuḥpañcakṣaṇāvasthāyinyapi tasminnekamevajñānaṃ janayitvendriyādikamudāsīnam anāgatakarmādijanma pratīkṣate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1396: tataśca sarvajanmāntaropalambhādanye taduttarakālapratyayā dhārayā vicchedena vā bhavanto na pramāṇaṃ syurityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1398: yadyapi svarūpasya prakārasya vā tathāvidhasya tādavasthyam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1400: na ca kramabhāvināmeka eva vartamānaḥ kālo viṣayaḥ, nānāpramātṛvajjñānayaugapadyaprasaṅgāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1402: tasmāt pūrvapūrvajñānairanākalita eva vartamānor'tha uttarottarairavasīyata ityanadhigatārthatvameva tatrāpītyarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1404: na tāvat pratikṣaṇavartamānatvaṃ saugatavad vastunaḥ eva svarūpotpādaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1405: nāpi saṃkhyavad vasturūpasthairye 'pi pariṇatibheda eva mīmāṃsakaiḥ svīkriyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1409: na ca kālaḥ pratyakṣagocaraḥ, nāpi bhinnasvabhāvaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1412: tatra na tāvat pratīyamānastaṃmādisaṃsṛṣṭā upādhayaḥ saṃbhavantītyuktam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1415: na tāvat stambhādiṣu taditarasaṃsargiṇaḥ kṣaṇabhaḍgurāḥ kecanāvaśyaṃ tajjñānasaṃsargabhājo bhavanti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1416: kvacid bhavantyapīti cet, tatraiva taddhiyāṃ pramāṇatā syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1417: yatra tu tadekajñānasaṃsargiṇa upādhayo na santi tatra dhārāvāhikabuddhīnāmapramāṇatvameva syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1418_0: tathāvidhā eva ca vicāraviṣayatvenābhipretā jñānāntaragocarā viṣayāntarasaṃsargiṇa
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1418_1: upādhayo bhaviṣyantīti cet--evaṃ tarhi dhārāvahanabuddhayo na syureva iti lābhāya
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1419: na khalu pramāṇāntareṇa indriyāntareṇa tenaiva vā taddharmiparityāgāddharmyantare anubhūyamāne vivakṣitaikaviṣayabuddhidhārasaṃbhavaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1420: iṣṭa evāyamarthaṃ iti cet--na, apūrvāpūrvopādhyupanipātaniyame pramāṇābhāvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1422: ata eva ghaṭo 'yaṃ ghaṭo 'yamiti buddhisahasrasyāpi na viṣayakṛtaṃ viśeṣamūpalabhāmahe /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1432: tasmāt kālatadupādhipratyakṣatve 'pi na sarvatra sūkṣmopādhisaṃsargaḥ, nāpi tatpratītiḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1435: na hi sādhakatamasya tathātvaṃ sādhākatamāntarāpekṣayā, kiṃ tu pradhānakriyākārakāntarāpekṣayā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1436: anyathā yatra karaṇānāṃ samuccayastatra parasparāpekṣayā anatiśayitatvādakaraṇatvāpatteḥ karaṇānāṃ samuccayaḥ kvacidapi na syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1440: na ca jñāte 'pi jñānāntarāsaṃbhavo yenātrāpyaphalatvādevākaraṇatvaṃ bhavet,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1445: pravṛttiṃ prāptiṃ ca janayadeva vijñānaṃ pramā, tadarthameva pramāṇānusaraṇāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1457: nanu tathāpi prathamādevāpekṣitasiddhaḥ puruṣasya kiṃ dvitīyādinetyata āha--puruṣeti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1466: na tāvat tadīyatayā niyatāṃ pratītaṃ janayan, svātmani kriyāvirodhāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1473: atha nīlamahaṃ jānāmītyarthakarmakapratītyanuvyavasāya iti cet--tat kiṃ buddhāvaniścitāyāmevākāro niścitaḥ?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1475: niśrvīyata eva, paraṃ na tadīyatayeti cet--atha keyamarthākārādanyā tadīyatā nāma?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1477: omiti cet--hanta, hataṃ tarhi pāmarapratyakṣamatiriktamarthamanumāpayatā ākāreṇa vyavasthāpitatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1478: api ca yā kriyā yatkaraṇaphalatvena vivakṣitā, janayadeva tāṃ tatkaraṇamiti lokasiddham /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1479: na hi chidāmajanayanto 'pi cakṣurādayastanniścāyakatāmātreṇa chedanatayā vayavahniyante /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1480: api tu aniścāyayanto 'pi janayanta eva kuṭhārādayaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1482: na tu tāmajanayanniścāyako 'pyākāraḥ, evaṃ ca loke 'nukūlatā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1483: anyathā tu piribhāṣāṃ kurvatā loko 'pratipāditaḥ syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1485: etena śaktiḥ pramāṇamiti pratyuktam, śakteḥ śakayaniṣṭhatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1489: nanu yadi pramāṇa siddham, kiṃ tatra pramātrādinā kartavyam? na hi siddhena siddhameva sādhyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1491: athāsiddham, kathaṃ pramāṇam? na hyasiddhaṃ kārakaṃ nāma /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1500: na hi pramātṛvat tenāpi pramākaraṇamutpādyate vyāpāryate vetyata āha--prameyasya tviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1503: tatra phalaviṣayatvamasya na karmatvaṃ prati prayojakam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1506: karaṇavyāpāraviṣayatvāt tu karmatvam, na hyasti saṃbhavaḥ karma ca, na ca karaṇavyāpāraviṣaya iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1507: tatra karaṇasya vyāpāraviṣayatvābhāvāt vyāpāra eva na nirvahediti tannirvāha evāsya caritārthatvamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1511: nāpi phalaviṣayaḥ, taduddeśena karmaṇaḥ kartrā avyāpāritatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1512: phalasya tannirūpaṇādhīnanirūpaṇatvāt, yena karmavadasya caritārthatvaṃ kalpyeta /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1523: tadanena kārakāntare 'caritārthasya hetutvameva karaṇatvamiti karaṇalakṣaṇaṃ darśayatā kartṛvyāpāragocaraḥ karaṇamityapi karaṇalakṣaṇaṃ sūcitam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1526: akaraṇā pramāṇotpattiḥ prasajyeta kartuḥ karaṇe caritārthatvāditi kiṃ kena saṃgatamityata āha--nākaraṇa iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1527_2: ityāśayavataḥ samādhānam--na pācakaśabdādivadityādinā iti ṭīkāyāṃ vikṣiptasya vārttikatātparyasya saṃkṣepaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1528: tulyavaditi tulayā saṃmitamiva na nyūnaṃ nātiriktaṃ vetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1529: tadanena prapajcena pramāṃ pramātṛprameyayorakāraṇatvameva darśitamati bhramo mā bhūdityupasaṃhāravyājenāha--tatpramāṇamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1537: yadyapyayogavyavaccheda evātiśayaḥ, tathāpi tulyatve satyapyatiśayānatiśayau tasyaiva cintyete /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1538: na tu vaidharmyamātramatiśaya ityabhisaṃdhāyānyayogavyavacchedo 'pi darśitaḥ ayogānyayogavyavacchedābhyāmiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1540: nanu yathā kartrādau sati phalaṃ nāvaśyakam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1541: tathā karaṇe 'pi sati kadācinna bhavet, kārakatvāviśeṣāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1543: na hi paraśau sati chidā bhavetyevetyata āha--pramātṛprameye hīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1557: tathāpi paramparāvyāpāryeṇāpi karmaṇā vyabhiyāro mā bhūdityāśaḍkya prakṛte 'vadhāraṇaṃ saṃbhavaprācuryāt kṛtam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1562: karmaṇaḥ svātantryamasaṃbhavi, tato viśeṣaniṣedho 'nupapanna ityata āha--akatṛtvamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1571: pramāṃ prati kāraṇānā sādhāraṇatvāsādhāraṇatve nirūpyamāṇe puruṣaviṣayasya sādhāraṇyasya kimāyātamityata āha--aśeṣa iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1578: tadebhirnimittaiḥ karaṇavyavahāre vyavasthāpyamāne yadi karmādivyavahāranimittasamāveśāt tadvyavahāro 'pi bhavati,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1584: teṣāṃ ca nimittānāṃ bheda eveti nātiprasaṃgaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1586: evaṃ ca satyagre arthyata iti vyutpattirapi tātparyaparatayaiveti manatavyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1591: tat kiṃ pravṛttisāmarthyābhāvādapramāṇameva tadityata āha--na ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1593: na tāvat sarvo viṣayaḥ sarvatra sarvasya sarvadopakṣaṇīyaḥ, nirmāṇavaiyarthyaprasaṅgāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1594: tathā cānupekṣaṇīyatādaśāyāṃ pravṛttisāmarthyena tadviṣayasya jñānasya prāmāṇyamavadhārya gṛhītena tajjātīyatvenopekṣaṇīyatādaśāyamapi prāmāṇyaṃ sugrahameva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1595: yatrāpyāhatya pravṛttirna bhūtā tatrāpyasaṃbhavadvādhasaṃvāditvaṃ prātyakṣikamānumānikamaupadeśikaṃ vā tajjātīyatvamavaseyamityakṣarārthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1597: sākṣāt janakatvaṃ gṛhītvā vyadhikāraṇatvaśaḍkā mā bhūdityavaśyaṃ darśanīyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1599: kathamayamartho vārttikāllabhyate ityata āha--pramāṇasya viśeṣa iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1601: nanu tavāyamāśayo na tu vārttikakṛta ityata āha--tadidamuktamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1610: tathāpi tadabhyupagame vyāghāta eva sphuṭa iti sa evoktaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1611: sa ca śāstrāvatāreṇa yadi hyapavargaḥ sukhaduḥkhataddhetutayā heyaḥ svīkṛtaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1617: pramāṇaṃ tu pramāṇāntareṇa heyaṃ sadanavasthāṃ sāvakāśayati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1618: tataśca saiva pramāṇavyaktiḥ tenaiva pramāṇena hātavyā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1621: tasmādubhayathāpi svātmani kriyāvirodhena paramapuruṣārthahetutvena ca pramāṇaṃ na śakayahānam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1629: tator'thaśabdena viṣayo 'bhidhīyamānaḥ tathāvidha eva vaktavyo 'taḥ prakaraṇaviśeṣaniyama evādhikāra itayarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1630: ekadeśyupālambhe pūrvahetubhiḥ saha hetvantarasya samuccayaṃ darśayannāha--na kevalamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1633: tadabhāve vā kathaṃ sattvavyavahāra ityata āha--na tāvaditi //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1634: anavasthāprasaṅgalakṣaṇaṃ tarkaṃ darśayatā tadviparyaye mānasameva pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇamādarśitaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1641: avaśyaṃ vā vijñāsyeta tadā jñānaparamparālakṣaṇā anasthā syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1645: bhāṣyagrantheneti vadatā na kevalamarthavirodhaḥ granthavirodhaścetyapi pratipāditaṃ draṣṭavyam //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1647: nanvarthaśabdasya prayojanavattave 'pi virodhavyadhikaraṇatve tadavasthe evetyata āha--candanādīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1649: atha kimabhipretyāprastutameva bhāṣyakṛto idaṃ prastūyata ityata āha--evaṃ kileti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1650: na pramāṇaprayojanaṃ bhavitumarhantīti pramāṇasya bhūtārthatvādita bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1651: tathā ca pramāṇadīnāṃ śakyājñānatve 'pi tadvyutpādakaṃ śāstramanārambhaṇīyameva,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1654: sarvasādhāraṇanīlādivaidharmyeṇa hi kālpanikatvaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvasya vyutpādayatā nīlādi paramārthikameva svīkartavyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1656: na ca kāryakāraṇabhāvasyāpāramārthikatve nīlādi pāramārthikaṃ bhavitumarhati, nityatvaprasaṅgāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1657: tasmād yo nīlādi paramārthikamicchati, tena kāryakāraṇabhāvo 'pi paramārthika eva eṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1661: tatsvabhāvatvāditi yadi tadotpatterārabhya kuryādaviśeṣat tatrāha--nivedayiṣyate hīti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1667: aniyataḥ candanāt sukhameva kaṇṭakād duḥkhameveti niyamarahitaḥ, aniyata hetukatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1673: yathā keṣucit kāladeśāvasthāsahakāriṣu satsu meghāḥ salilamudvamanti,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1674: keṣucit tu satsu ta eva salilaṃ pibanti,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1675: tathā candanādayo 'pi keṣucit satsu sukhamupajanayanti keṣucicca duḥkhamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1677: nanvarthavati ca pramāṇe pramātrādīnyarthavanti bhavanti jñāyanta
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1680: na ca vācyam, vaidikī pratipattirarthāvyabhicāriṇī āptopadeśajapratipettitvāditi śakayata eveti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1683: tathāpi loke tāvadevamastīti cet? ata āha--adṛṣṭārtheti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1684: yadyapi tatsamavāyaḥ pramāsamavāyaḥ pramātṛtvamiti prakṛtopayogi syādeva,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1685: tathāpi vārttikakṛtā praśnopalakṣaṇābhyāṃ khātantryamupakrāntam--sāmānyanyāyena viśeṣo 'pi labhyata ityabhisandhāyātastathaivavyācaṣṭai--kārakāmidhāneneti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1688: tena pacatītyādau sarvatrātiraścīnapākādivyāpāravato devadattādereva kartṛtvaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1689: pācayatītyādau tu prayojyavyāpārapratītāvapi tasyānyatiraścīnatvāt na tadvataḥ kartṛtvam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1694: svavyāpārāpekṣayā na karaṇādivyavahāraḥ, kiṃ tu pradhānakriyāpekṣayetyabhiprāyaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1696: pradhānakriyāpekṣayā ityetadeva kuta ityata āha-- avāntareti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1698: asti hi kāñcit kriyāmuddeśya pravartamānānāṃ kārakāṇāmavāntaravyāpārayogaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1700: nanu na sarvo vyāpāraḥ pradhānakriyā vā puruṣamāśrayate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1701: tat kathamāha--puruṣa itītyata āha--puruṣa iti prakṛtāpekṣam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1710: etena sa cāsau prayoktā ceti vā tasya cetanasya
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1711: prayoktṛtvaṃ dharma iti vā vigraha ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1714: etāvataiva lakṣaṇe parisamāpte itarāprayojyatvamityanena cetanaprayukti prati svātantryamitareṣāṃ vyavacchindatā parasparaprayojanakatvamapi vyavacchinnam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1716: tathā ca yathā kāryaṃ kartradhīnaṃ tathā kārakāntarādhīnamityubhayavyāptāt kāryādekatarāpāye 'pyanyatarāpāya iti darśitam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1718: acetaneṣu tu kartṛvyavahāraḥ kathamityavaśiṣyate tatrāha--acetanasya tviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1720: tattvaṃ hi pramāṇavyāpyatvaṃ pramāṇavyāpāraviṣayatvamiti vadataḥ karaṇavyāpāraviṣayaḥ karmeti karmalakṣaṇa saṃmatam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1722: prakṛte ca pradhānavyāpāraḥ pramitilakṣaṇa iti vibhāgaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1724: anena vārttikasthasya viniyogasya viṣayaniṣṭhatvaṃ darśayatā yogyatāpi viṣayagataiva draṣṭavyetyapi darśitam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1727: tenāyamarthaḥ viniyogo vārthagatastadyogyatājñānaṃ vā caturvargasya paryavasānamiti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1743: nirjaraṇaṃ nirjaraḥ tapaścaraṇam, nigaḍakaṭakābhyāmivāyaṃ baddho 'svatanatro jīva ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1750: tacced bhavadabhimate abhāve 'pyasti so 'pi sadvyavahāraviśayaḥ prasakta iti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1756: na hyasti saṃbhavaḥ saditi vyavahniyate, na cāstipratyayaviṣaya iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1757: asaditi vā vyavahniyate na ca nāstipratyayaviṣayaḥ iti prakāraṇārthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1764: tathāpyabhāvidhau kimāyātam? na hi nīlaniṣadhe pītādividhiravaśyamityata āha--nīlapītau hīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1767: santyeva hi kecid vādino ye vipakṣadaṇḍamapaśyantaḥ pratyakṣaparikalitamapahnutya śaḍakāmutthāpayanti,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1768: tān sāṃkhyādīn prati ayaṃ prakāra ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1772: nanu yadyasadbhedāḥ prakṛtānupayoginaḥ, tadā anupayogādeva nocyanta ityucyatām /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1774: pāratantryeṇa pratibhāsanāt nocyanta iti kkopayujyata ityata āha--niṣedhyeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1777: tadidamuktaṃ gamyanta iti nāktā ityartha iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1779: tarhi prameyādayo 'pi pramāṇapratipādanenaiva pratipāditā iti kiṃ tatkathanenāpi?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1781: hanatāsadbhedā api upayuktāstathā kiṃ netyata āha--atha veti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1782: nanu bhāvaprapañcavadabhāvaprapañce 'pyuddiṣṭo veditavya iti pratijñāter'the caturvargānantarbhāvāditi heturbhāgāsiddho viruddhaścetyata āha-niḥśreyaseti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1784: tadadhikāraṇatayā tathābhūta eva bhāvaprapañco dṛṣṭānto nocyata iti sādhyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1788: ata evoddiṣṭo veditavya iti anupalabdhibādhitaṃ manyamāna uttaragranthamavatārayati--atheti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1794: saṃśayasya jñānarūpatvādasadrūpatā na saṃbhavatīti tamullaḍghyātidiśati--evaṃ prayojaneti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1798: asmākaṃ ca yathā bhābhāvastamaḥ [vai. sū. 5.2.19] ityevamādiḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1809: tat kataradatra pāramārthikamityata āha--dvitīye tu kalpe pāramārthikaṃ iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1811: sacca khalu ṣāḍaśadhā vyūḍhamupadekṣyata iti tātparyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1813: tāsāṃ khalvāsāmityavatārabhāṣyasya, na tu sūtra pāṭhasya /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1822: tatrāpi sādharmyavaidharmyavipratipattijanyānāṃ saṃśayānāṃ parasparanirapekṣāṇāmeva nyāyapravartakatvamiti tātparyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1828: avayavānāṃ tu yadyapyekasmin vākyārthe pratipādayitavye mithaḥ sāpekṣatvam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1832: yatra tu nirdeśo nāsti tatra lakṣaṇe yathāvacanaṃ vigrahaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1835: arthaśabdaḥ pradhānakriyāvacano na kvacid dṛṣṭa itya āha--yaduddeśeneti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1836: kārakāṇāmavivakṣetyetāvataiva susthe pradhānakriyāyā avivakṣā kimarthamityata āha--kārakagrahaṇeti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1837: nanu kārakāṇāmavivakṣā śeṣalakṣaṇa tadā syād yadi tatra kārakatvaṃ saṃbhavet,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1843: tasyāsvatantratvāt pramāṇādayo gamyanta iti kiṃ kena saṃgatamata āha--bhāvasyeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1844: na pramāṇādimātramucyate tattvaśabdena atha ca nārthāntaraṃ tattvamiti parasparavyāhatamityata ekadeśinaṃ kiñciduddīpayati--abhede 'pītīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1845: anāropitarūpeṇa svarūpataḥ pratīyantāṃ pramāṇādaya ityetadarthamanatiriktārthamapi tattvagrahaṇaṃ kṛtamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1847: vyavahāragativastugatyoḥ samānayogakṣematvaṃ manyamāno hyabhāvamapahnotuṃ na śaknotyeva,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1853: nanu dṛṣṭāniḥśreyasadūṣaṇe kiṃ tātparyam? na hi tadasmānna siddhyatītyata āha--etaduktaṃ bhavatīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1872: ātmanyeva ca santuṣṭastasya kāryaṃ na vidyate //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1890: anumānamevātrārthe pramāṇamiti vipratipannaṃ pratipipādayiṣatāmiti śeṣaḥ upaniṣadāpi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1893: santānānumānasya ca pṛthagupadeśācca prameyasya pramāṇādibhyaḥ prathamasūtre etadvivaraṇādvacavacchetturagranthamevāvatārayati--yadi ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1899: nanu dvitīyasūtrārtho nātroditaḥ, tat kathaṃ tatrānūdyata ityata āha-- niḥśreyaseti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1900: atra ca hetvādyanuvādatrārttikaṃ nāstyevetyanāśaṅkanīyam, ṭīkākṛtā siddhavadutthāpitatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1904: tadabhiprāyaṃ tena taccaitaduttarasūtreṇānūdyate ityasyānuvādānantaramavyākhyāne 'pi na doṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1905: evaṃ cārthaṃ dvitīyasūtra ityādinā pūrvameva vyākhyātatvāt tu nehedaṃ vyākhyātamityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1906: nanu dveṣaḥ kiheya eva na vā pravṛttiheturityata āha--upalakṣaṇamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1908: tat kathaṃ tattvajñānamityucyata ityata āha--hīyate hīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1913: arthapadānīti bhāṣyagatasyārthapadasya tvanyathārtho bhaviṣyatīti yaduktaṃ tadāha--puruṣārthasthānānīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1916: prasthānaṃ prakāra itthambhāvaḥ tathā cetthambhūtatvādānvīkṣikyā iti yadyapyabhimatameva,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1917: tathāpi nirūpapattika itthambhāvaḥ syādityata āha--prasthānaṃ vyāpāraḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1919: pratyayārthastu saṃśayādibhiḥ padārthaiḥ pṛthak prasthāpyate iti vadatā bhāṣyakāreṇaiva darśitaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1920: tadetaduktaṃ bhavati, nyāvyutpādane vyāpāravattayā hi iyamānvīkṣikī vidyāntarād bhidyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1922: tato 'syāḥ saṃśayādayo 'pi viṣayabhūtāḥ tānantareṇa nirviṣayatayā vidyaiva na syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1925: na hyanyā vidyāḥ svaṃ svamarthaṃ pratipādayantyo 'pi kathametadityaśraddhāmalamapanetumīśate vinaināmānvīkṣikīmityāśayavān pariharati--etasyā eveti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1929: nāpi pramāṇapravṛttiviṣaya upalabdho bhavannirṇota eva bhavedityata ākṣepturabhiprāyantaraṃ darśayati--pañcarūpa iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1930: yathā pratyakṣamāgamo vā ajñāte 'pyavatarati, tathā asandigadhe 'pi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1931: anumānaṃ tu yathā nājñāte tathā asaṃdigdhe 'pi tasmādasyānyaiva rītirityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1933: samāmānādhikāraṇyaṃ na samarthayasa iti, na tādātmyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1935: na tu tādātmyamityabhipretya parihāraṃ vivṛṇoti--sāmānya viśeṣayoriti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1936: saṃdigdhe pravartave ityasya yogyatāparatāṃ darśayati-asaṃdigdha iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1942: nanu kiṃ punaḥ prayojanamiti praśne yena prayuktaḥ pravartata ityuttaraṃ vaiyātyādityata āha--sphuṭataramevaitaditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1945: na cāparitoṣabījamupalabhāmaha ityatastadvījaṃ praśnapūrvakameva tāvad darśayati--tatreti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1947: tathā ca dharmādiviṣayastātsādhanaviṣayo vā kāmastatrāpi pravartaka ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1953: tenaitaduktaṃ bhavati, na hi dharmādiṣu dharmatvādikameva pravṛttiṃ prati prayojakam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1956: nanu yathāśrute ko doṣo yena viṣayeṇa viṣayiṇaṃ pratyayamupalakṣayatīti vyākhyetyata āha--asatyoriti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1960: iha phalajñānamanyatra pravartavat tatsādhana eva pravartayatīti ato nātiprasaṅga ityevaṃ yadyapi śaṅkitumucitam, tathāpi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1970: etadeva ca tasya sākṣātpravartakatvaṃ yat sākṣāt prayatnajananasamarthāmicchāṃ prasūte /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1972: uddeśyajñānaṃ tu tadviṣayāmicchāṃ janayat tathābhūtatatsādhanajñānajananadvāreṇa ityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1974: nanu parīkṣāśabdasya vicāraṇārthatve prayojanāpekṣitvaṃ kadācid yujyate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1975: sa cet nyāyārthastasya ca vyutpattibalena pramāṇamātramarthaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1976: tasya ca na prayojanāpakṣeti sarvaṃ samākulamityākṣepāvatāraṭīkārthāḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1978: nanu avayavairarthasya parīkṣaṇamadhigatiryadi nyāyaḥ, tarhi kiṃ tasya phalamityata āha--arthasya
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1982: atha yathā pramāṇamūlairavayavairliḍgāṃ pratipādyate tathānumeyameva kiṃ netyata āha--na tviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1986: tathā cārthasya liṅgasya parīkṣādhigatirna pramāṇphalaṃ syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1988: na sākṣādityādinā liṅgādhigatāvavayavānāṃ svātantryaṃ nirākurvatā adhigaterapramāṇaphalatvamapāstam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1990: pramāṇatvāviśeṣai'pi tasyaiva vipratipannapuruṣapratipādakatvaṃ nānyasyetyatrāpi hetuṃ paraḥ prakṣyatītyatastathaivāha--samasteti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1991: tadayaṃ vārtikārthaḥ so 'yamitthaṃbhūtasamastapramāṇopakaraṇātmā yatastasmāda vipratipannapuruṣapratipādakaḥ tataśrva parama iti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1997: nyāyamūlaphalayorekaviṣayatvaṃ vastutaḥ, taccāvirodhe sati nirvahati nānyatheti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2003: sa cātra pratyakṣeṇa sphuṭatara eveti kimartha praśnaḥ kaḥ punarityata āha--idamatreti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2008: nanu yadi rūpatrayasaṃpattireva avinābhāvaḥ tadā kathaṃ bādhayā saha saṃbhavaḥ?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2011: ato na ca sapakṣetyādiśaḍkā na niravakāśā bhavati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2012: yatredaṃ tatredamityākāreṇa pakṣasyāpi sādhanavataḥ sādharmyavattāpratītiḥ sarvopasaṃhāraḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2013: ayaṃ ca yatra nedaṃ sādhyamasti tatrāpyetat sādhanamabhimatamastītyetāvanmātreṇaiva bhajyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2014: eṣa ca vyabhicāraprakāraḥ pakṣe 'pi na nivārayituṃ śakya ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2015: na bādhasya svātantryeṇa dūṣaṇatvaṃ vyabhicārāt pakṣadharmatāvirahiṇi tadabhāvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2019: anumānāviṣaye prayoga iti yathāśrute vārttike parābhimatamapakṣadharmatvameva sphuṭamapakṣasyaivānumānāviṣayatvāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2028: nanu kṛtakasya tejaso baddhau viparivartānatve yo yaḥ kṛtakaḥ sarvo 'nuṣṇa iti sarvopasaṃhāro na saṃbhavatyeva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2030: na hi yadyatra na sphurati tadapi tasya viṣaya ityata āha--sāmānyena yo yaḥ kṛtaka iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2032: na tu viśeṣākāreṇa vyāptigrahaṇaviṣayatāmagniragādityata āha--na tu nirvimajya viśeṣato jñātvā tejo 'vayavini eva saṃbandho 'vadhārita ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2033: atha sāmānyākāreṇāpi tejo 'vayavinaḥ kimityavakāśo deyo yāvatā pṛthivyādāveva vyāptiravadhāryatāmityata āha--na hīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2034: na hi samānyākāreṇa vyāptaugṛhyamāṇāyāṃ pratyakṣabādhāt prāgeva tejo 'vayaviparityāge kācidupapattirasti, anyatrādarśanāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2035: tathā ca na kevalaṃ sa eva na dṛṣṭaḥ, pṛthivyādayo 'pi kecinna dṛṣṭā eveti te 'pi parityājyāḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2037: adṛṣṭeṣu vyabhicārāśaṅkayā na vetyubhayathāpi sarvānumānocchedaprasaṅga ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2038: svayameva paraḥ pakṣaṃ gṛhṇātvityabhisandhinā sukumāraprakāramāha--na tāvaditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2039: na hi vyāptyanapavāde vyabhicārāvakāśaḥ samastīti hṛdayam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2041: iha vyāpterapavādaḥ pakṣatāmaparibhūya, tatparibhave vā? tatrādyaṃ tāvad dūṣayati--neti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2043: tatpratirodhaṃ tu viparītapratyakṣaṃ na cet karoti, ko 'paraḥ kariṣyatītyāśayaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2044: nanu yadi pakṣe 'pi vyabhicāraḥ saṃbhavati, sa nodbhāvya iti kasyāyaṃ daṇḍa ityata āha--anyatheti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2045: na na pakṣadharmatāmaparibhūya pratyakṣeṇa vyabhicāraḥ śakyagrahaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2046: na hyasti saṃbhavaḥ saṃdigdhasādhyadharmā dharmo tadviraheṇa nirṇotaśceti śūnyahṛdayaṃ prati tu pratibandirityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2051: anyathā viparītapramāṇapravṛttāvapi yadi sādhakaṃ na nivartate tadā tadāyattaṃ sādhyamapi na nivarteta,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2052: tadanivṛttau tu na pakṣatvakṣatiriti na vyabhicārāvakāśa
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2055: nanu yadi nāmānumānanivṛtteḥ pūrvamapakṣadharmatvaṃ vyabhicāro boddhārayituṃ na śakyastathāpi taduttarakālaṃ tāvacchākyata eva,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2058: yāvaddhi pratyakṣavirodhenānumānaṃ na dūṣyate, tāvad vyabhicārādyavakāśo nāstyeva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2061: tena ced dūṣitamanumānam, kimābhyām? na hi mṛto 'pi māryata iti siddhāntasaṃkṣepaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2062: nanvaśrāvaṇaḥ śabda ityevaṃ bruvāṇaḥ kathaṃ śabdāsattvamabhipreyāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2064: atha tatra virodho 'sti, tat kiṃ svarūpāpalāpe sa nāsti?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2065: tasmādabhiprāyaḥ parasya niyantuṃ na śakyata ityata āha--na hīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2080: tadihobhayathāpi saḍketabalādanvayayogyatābalād vā na naḥ śabdapadena saṃbandha iti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2082: śrūyamāṇasya naḥ śrāvaṇapadenaivāstu saṃbandhaḥ, śabdaniṣedhastvarthādāpadyata ityata āha--nāpīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2083: śrūyamāṇo hyartho yena vinā nopapadyate sa tenākṣipyamāṇor'thād āpadyata ityucyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2089: tathā ca nāsattvādhikaraṇatvayorvirodha ityata āha--na ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2093: nanu yadi saṃbandhaḥ, kathaṃ vārttikakāro vṛttirityāhetyata āha--vṛttiriti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2098: sa eva naraśīrṣamaṃpasaṃdadhāra iti viparitaiva śrutiḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2100: yadyapyasminnarthe na sākṣāt śrutiḥ pratīyate, tathāpi tanmūlā smṛtireva sphuṭatarā pramāṇam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2105: kutaḥ punarasya nirghṛṇasya kapālaśaucābhimāna ityata āha--avigītā hīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2108: na ca vācyaṃ sārvatriko vyavahāraḥ pramāṇam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2113: atha śreyohetutaivāsyāḥ kuto nāvasīyata ityata āha--na khalviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2114: yadyapi śakyata evaitadāpātataḥ, tathāpi nirmūlatvaśaḍkālakaḍkitatvenānuṣṭhānaparyantatāṃ na yāyāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2117: kimuktaṃ bhavati śucītyanena punaruktatāṃ pariharannāha--api ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2119: na ca vācyam, yāvati vivādastāvānevārthaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2125: na hi pūrvapravṛttena yadeva tadeva bādhyate, aniyamaprasaṅgāt, ata uktam--tabdalabhāvīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2128: svasādhakena bādhitaṃ tu yathaikasantatipatitāni jñānāni ekapratipattṛvirahe 'pi pratisandhānayogyāni kāryakāraṇabhāvādityapi draṣṭavyam //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2137: tat kimidānīṃ satpratipakṣatā nāstyevetyata āha--na hīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2147: nanu yathā agṛhyamāṇaviśeṣāvasthāyāmanumānayoḥ satpratipakṣatvaṃ tathā pratyakṣānumānayorapyastu tataḥ kva bādhyabādhakabhāvaḥ?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2148: atha viśeṣeṇa gṛhīte pratyakṣamanumānasya bādhakamiṣyate, anumānamapyevamiṣyatām /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2156: na hyananyathāsiddhaṃ tattvena bādhituṃ śakyate aviśeṣāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2158: na cānanyathāsiddhenāpyanyathāsiddhaṃ bādhyatāmiti yuktam, tasyānyathāsiddhatvenaiva dūṣitatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2159: na ca yatra pratyakṣamanyathāsiddhaṃ tatrānumānenāvaśyamanyathāsiddhena bhavitavyam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2161: dustaraṃ vyasanamāsādayet, tatastadapi tenaiva paribhūtam, kiṃ tatra pratyakṣabādhayeti vācyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2163: tasmād yāvat pratyakṣasyānanyathāsiddhatvaṃ nāvadhāryate, tāvatkālameva tatra
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2168: anyaprakāravyavasthāpanaṃ ca viṣayasekocamātreṇa na bādhakaṃ vinā bhrāntatvenāpi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2174: tadā tathābhūtau pratyakṣāgamāvevābādhitau satpratipakṣitau vā syātām /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2176: tasamād yathā tābhyāmanumānamapanudyate tathā tadutthāpitaphalaśarīreṇopamānenāpīti ṭīko pabṛṃhitasya vārttikasyārthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2178: vādajalpau saprayojanāvityādibhāṣye yadyapi prayojanamaṅgatayā śrūyate tathāpyaḍgi pratyetavyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2181: vitaṇḍāṃ tu vyāpnoti na veti cintyata iti vivaraṇārthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2183: tayoreva tu prayojanavattvaṃ kena bhāṣyeṇa pratipāditamityata āha--tatra śabdārthamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2184: vakṣyati hi pṛthagupadiṣṭa upalākṣaṇārtham, upalakṣitena vyavahārastattvajñānārthaṃ bhaviṣyatīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2185: sa ca vyavahāro hetvābhāsebhyo hetovivecanalakṣaṇo 'vāntaraprayojanamapi asādhāraṇatayeha tatraśabdena bhāṣyakārasya vivakṣitamatastadeva vārttikakṛtā vyākhyātamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2186: nanu tathāpi tatra nyāye vivecayitavye iti yuktaṃ ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2187: na hi nyāyābhāsa eva viveka pradhānamityata āha--nyāyāmāsa iti tu sannidhānāditi //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2193: yadyapi parapakṣadūṣaṇenāpi prayojanena vitaṇḍāyāḥ saprayojanatva siddhacati,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2195: iti vacanāt, yadi ca parapakṣadūṣaṇamapi nādhikuryāt tadā vaitaṇḍika eva na syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2196: tathāpyetadeva svayaṃ kiñcidapyanabhyupagacchato na syādityataḥ pāriśeṣyādapi svapakṣasiddhim abhisaṃdadhānasyaiva pravṛttiryuktetyāśayaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2198: nāstyevāsau vādī yaḥ kiñcidapi nābhyupagacchet, antato narthasyaivābhyupagamāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2203: anena hi parapakṣo nāmyupagamyate na punaḥ parapakṣapratiṣedho 'bhyupagamyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2209: nanu na hi yadeva pratyeti, tadevābhyupagacchati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2210: tathā sati prativādivacanārthaḥ pratītaścedabhyupagataḥ syādita matānujñā nigrahasthānam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2221: atha lakṣaṇasūtravyāghāta eva kasmānna bhavati, yāvatā tadapi pratyakṣāpratyakṣasādhāraṇamityata
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2225: nanvanumānāt ko 'paro nyāyo yenānumānāśrayatāmuktvāpi nyāyāśrayatāṃ dṛṣṭāntasya pṛthagāha bhāṣyakāraḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2234: evaṃ ca satyanumānanimittatvāt pakṣasyāpi pṛthagabhidhānaṃ syāditi na codyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2241: yattu tatpramāṇye tadviṣayagocarānumānābhiprāyeṇa dṛṣṭāntāpekṣā āgamasyāpyastīti kaiścid vyākhyātaṃ tat pūrvaṃ jñātaṃ cārthaṃ parasmā ācaṣṭa iti vadatā vārtikakṛtaiva apāstam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2248: vyavasthāśabdo na puruṣaviśeṣe abhyupagamaniyamamāha--kiṃ tarhyanabhyupagamasamuccayaṃ nirākurvan svarūpaniyamamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2249: nanu vādādipravṛttyarthaṃ pratitantrasiddhānta evopayujyate, tat kimaparairityata āha--tatheti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2250: nanu yata eva sarvatantrasiddhānta na vipratipattiviṣayaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2256: kimāśrayaśrva nyāyaḥ syāt? asati sarvatantrasiddhānta iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2258: sādhyasāmānyavyāptaṃ sādhānasāmānyamiti sādhanaviśeṣāt sādhyaviśeṣaḥ kathaṃ gamyeteti yojanā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2260: adhikaraṇasiddhāntena hi phalena viṣayeṇa vā pakṣadharmatā phalavatī viṣayavatī vā syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2261: tadabhāve tu sā niṣphalā nirviṣayā vā,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2262: tathā ca vyāptirapi sāmānyaviṣayā satī kevalā sāmānyamātramupanīya pakṣe kathaṃ vyavasthāpayet?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2267: tasmādadhikaraṇasiddhānto 'pi pakṣadharmatāphalaviṣayatayā avaśyaṃ vyutpādanīyo yena vyāptirapi tatsahāyā satī phalavatī syāditi //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2275: tathāpi na samūho vyutpādita ityata āha--tadaneneti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2276: nanu viśeṣapratyayahetavo 'vākyabhūtā api santīti anenābhiprāyeṇa pṛcchati--ka iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2277: pratyayasya prādhānyaṃ nirākurvanneva pratyayapadopādānaprayojanamāha--na ca taditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2279: athānubhava eva kasmānna bhavati? na hyantyapadaṃ nānubhūyata eva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2280: tathā sati smaryetāpi kathamityata āha--na hīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2281: tathāpyevaṃbhūtasyāpi tadasya smṛtiranubhūtimantareṇa na syādityata āha--saṃbhavanti tviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2282: astu tarhi tadanubhava evārthapratītyaṅgamityata āha--na caita iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2287: yadi tu varṇānāṃ nirantarotpādavatāṃ nirantarā evānubhavāstadā vinaśyadavinaśyadavasthayoḥ upāntyāntyānubhavayoreva sahabhāvaḥ śaṅganīyaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2290: kāraṇasamuccayavaśād viṣayāsamuccayavataḥ pratyayasya svarūpasamuccayaṃ parasvīkṛtaṃ śaṅkate--na ca pūrveti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2293: tathāpi na yaḥ kaścit pratyayaḥ tasya sahakārī,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2295: nāpi saḍketaviśeṣasmaraṇe padaikadeśavarṇānubhavastatsaṃskārasya sahakārī, tathā satyatiprasaṅgāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2298: tathā caikapraghaṭṭakenāpi vicitrajñānena viṣayīkṛto varṇāḥ khaṇḍaśaḥ padabhāvena pratisandheyāḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2303: sa eva padapratisandhānotpādātmā samayasaṃskārodbodhaḥ saṃbandhasmaraṇasyotpadyamānatā saṃskārodbodhād vicitrapratyayasya vinaśyattetyekaḥ kālaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2304: atha saṃbandhasmaraṇotpādaḥ vicitrapratyayasya vināśaḥ padatvānusaṃdhānasya vinaśyattetyekaḥ kālaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2312: tathā ca pūrvavarṇāṇāmunabhūtatvena padatvānusaṃdhānasaṃbhave 'pi antyavarṇasyānanubhūtatayā nāntyapadapratisaṃdhānasaṃbhavaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2315: yadā padārthapratyāyane 'nubhavo na kāraṇamiti tadaupayikasmṛtyutpattau tu kāraṇameveti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2317: prakaraṇādayastu yogyatāviśeṣatvāt tatraivāntarbhūtā iti tata eva vākyārthapratīterūpapatteḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2320: kiṃ tu padāni krameṇāpi nānubhūtānītyata uktam--nirantareti,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2325: nanu pratyekaṃ vyabhicāre hi parasparānugrahaḥ syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2326: na ca padakadambakapratisaṃdhānavat tadarthasmṛtirapi tathāvidhāṃ vākyārthapratyayotpatti prati vyabhicaratītyata āha--etaduktaṃ bhavatīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2327: ayamāśayaḥ, na tāvat tadārthā eva vākyārthe pramāṇam, sarvadātatpratītiprasaṅgāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2328: nāpi ta eva smṛtāḥ, prakārāntareṇāpi smṛtānāṃ tathābhāvaprasaṅgāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2329: nāpi ta eva padaiḥ smāritāḥ, padānāṃ padārthasmaraṇamātropayoge pūrvavat pratītiprasaṅgāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2330: vākyārthapratītyupayoge tu teṣāṃ kathaṃ na taddhetutvam /
