GSP29nvtp1_1u:2333: tadarthānāṃ tu atītānāgatādirūpatayā kāraṇatvameva nāsti, kuto 'sādhāraṇatm?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2334: ata eva na smṛtisteṣāṃ vyāpāraḥ, kiṃ tu kāraṇībhūtānāṃ padānāmeva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2335: tathā ca vyāpārāvyabhicāramādāya nirvyāpārāvasthāyā vyabhicāravatāmakāraṇatvābhyupagamo bahuvyākulayatīti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2339: na hi pratijñāvacanaṃ niśvāyakaṃ viśiṣṭasyeti śeṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2351: saprayojanaśca bhavati niḥśreyasena prayojanena prayojanavāṃśca jñāto bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2355: tat khalu hetuvacanamanumānapratipādakaṃ parāmṛśyamānaliṅgapratipādakaṃ yadi syāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2357: na ca tasya parāmṛśyamānaṃ liṅga viṣaya iti bhāvaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2358: nanu yadeva dṛśyamānaṃ liḍgaṃ hetuvacanasya viṣayaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2363: dvitīyadaśanaviṣayaliḍgaṃ pratipādakaṃ na parāmṛśyamānaṃ liḍgaṃ pratipādakamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2372: nanu pratyakṣaviṣayasya smṛtitaḥ punarūpadarśanāditi vaktavye kuto viparītamabhihitamityata āha--yatreti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2374: tathāpyudāharaṇakāle tayāsmṛtyārūḍha eva vyāpriyata ityetāvatā tathaivoktamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2377: pratyakṣamapi hi vipratipatti paribhūya vyāptiviṣayatayā dṛṣṭāntaṃ smārayati--tadvacanamapīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2379: nanu yathā śabdatadarthayorūpanaye vārtāpi nāsti, tat kathamāha---yathā tatheti?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2383: na ca tatra catuṣṭavijātīyaṃ pramāṇamastītyatastadvyākhyānāt pūrvameva paramatvopapādanāya samastapramāṇaviniveśanamāha---so 'yamiti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2385: adhyāropo viniveśanaṃ vā bhrāntirvā na saṃbhavatītyata āha--adhyāropa iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2388: tadanena kiṃ punaḥ samarthyamiti pṛcchato 'bhisandhiḥ darśitaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2394: bhago vāṃ vibhajatu, pūṣā vāṃ vibhajata, aryamā vāṃ vibhajatu ityādi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2398: syonaṃ te sadanaṃ kṛṇomi ghutasya dhārayā suśevaṃ kalpayāmi ityādi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2403: nanu yadi vipratipannaḥ vākyenaiva paraḥ pratibodhayituṃ śakyate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2404: atha vākye tadarthe vā vipratipadyamānaḥ kenopāyena bodhanīyaḥ?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2414: tatra viśeṣaḥ ka ityata uktama--dharmaviśiṣṭo dharmoti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2415: vākyāddhi sādhanadharmaviśiṣṭo dharmo sākṣāt pratīyate sādhyarūpadharmaviśiṣṭastu taddvāretyubhayamapi vivakṣitvā saṃmugdhamuktamiti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2416: nanu pramāṇāntaratve 'pi tarkasya pramāṇapadena saṃgraha eva sāmānyena viśeṣasya saṃkalanāt, tat kimityāha--na
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2418: ata āha--pramāṇapadena hīti dṛṣṭo hi sāmānyaśabdenāpi kasyacidasaṃgrahaḥ kutaścit kāraṇādityabhisandhiḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2419: ata eva pramāṇāntaratvaśaḍkāyāṃ saṃgṛhītebhyo viśeṣebhyo 'nyatvamuktvā prameyaṃ dṛṣṭāntatvenopāttam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2426: tarko hi pramārūpaṃ vā pramāṇaṃ syāt liṅgadarśanavat,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2433: tadviparyayasya tu tena saha svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandho 'sti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2435: na hi viparyayāparyavasitaṃ kvacidapi kṛtārthaṃ prasaṅgamīkṣāmahe //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2436: nanvevaṃ tarhi pramāṇasyāpi kevalasya na kvacidapi kṛtārthatvam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2437: tathā ca sati prasaṅgatadviparyayapiṇḍa eva pramāṇyaṃ paryavasyet /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2449: nanu bhavatīti pramāṇavyāpārāt prāgeva yadi niścitam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2450: tadā tarkaḥ pramāṇameva syādityata āha-- saṃbhavatīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2457: tadviṣayapramāṇānukūlyena tarkasyāpi tadviṣayatvamiti bhrāntimāśaḍkya nirākaroti--na ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2462: nanu na hi yadeva vidyate tadeva dṛśyata ityasti niyama ityata āha--tena saheti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2463: tasmāt nāstīti phaladvāreṇa tarkasyānugrāhyaṃ pramāṇaṃ darśitam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2467: tadevamabhāvaviṣaye pratyakṣe 'pi tarkaṃ darśayatā anupalabdhiliṅgakānumānasya sādhyo 'bhāva iti saugatamatamapāstam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2476: vipratipannaṃ prati tu parīkṣakaistarkaḥ sahāyatvenopaneya iti ramaṇīyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2478: yajetetyatra samānapadopāttatvād bhāvyatvācca dhātvarthaḥ sādhyo bhavatu,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2480: vā puruṣārthatvāt svarga iti saṃśaye tarkasyāvatāraḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2482: tadopadeṣṭurāptatvaṃ vidheśceṣṭopāyatvaṃ vākyasya tadabhidhāyakatvaṃ prekṣāvatā ca pravṛttirna syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2485: na hi yāgabhāvanāyāḥ svargaphalatve dhātvarthasyātatphalatve samānapadopāttattvabhāvyatvayoḥ kaścid vidodhaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2488: nanu pramāṇānugrahāya yuktatvāyuktatve vivecayati tarko na tu niścinoti iti kuto viśeṣādityata āha--na ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2490: kriyātipattiḥ pratyayopasthāpite ghaṭasattvadhātvarthasādhyatve eva kriyātipattiśabdena vivakṣite,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2491: na hyevaṃbhūtapratyayāviṣayo ghaṭo vā sādhyatayā dhātvartho vāstītyarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2493: yasminnāśraye tulyopalambhayogyatvena duḥkhatvena vā aniṣṭaprasaṃjakena hetunā upapannastarko yuktāyuktaviṣayaviścayasādhanaṃ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2495: tadanena prasajyamānasyāśrayāsiddhisādhanāsiddhī dirśite, pūrvaṃ tu svarūpāsiddhirdarśitā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2497: niyatasaṃbaddhasvaviṣaye viparyayāpekṣitve tu pāratantryāt na pramāṇamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2499: nanu tarkapramāṇayorabhimataṃ bhedaṃ mīmāṃsāyā vedādabhedavādo virūṇaddhītyata āha--pramāṇeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2505_0: vicitranimittatve sādhye bhedavatvāditi hetuḥ svarūpābhiprāyeṇānaikāntikaḥ syāt svarūpabhedavatāmapi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2508: na hi nimittaṃ kiścid vicitram astītyetāvataiva dharmādharmasiddhiḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2509: dharmādharmalakṣaṇavicitranimittasādhanena tu nānvayo na vyatireka ityata āha--pramāṇamuktveti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2510: nimittasya vaicitrye janmano vaivitryagrasaṅgaḥ nimittasyāvaicitrye janmano 'vaicitryaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2515: emistarkaiḥ pakṣadharmatāmupajīvya pravṛttairanugṛhyamāṇaṃ sāmānyavyāptibalapravṛttaṃ vaicitryānumānaṃ viśeṣavirodhaṃ paribhūyābhimataṃ viśeṣaṃ sādhayatītyarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2518: nanu nirṇayopādānaprayojane vaktavye nirṇītaprayojanasya tarkasya punarāvṛttau kiṃ tātparyamityata āha--saṃkalayyeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2521: nanu yadyapi sarvatra jalpe nirṇayāvasānatvameva nāsti kvacidanirṇaye 'pi puruṣāparādhataḥ kathāvicchedāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2523: na tato jalpādanyatarādhikaraṇanirṇayāvasānatvena vādo vyavacchetuṃ śakyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2527: sā ca vivadamānayoḥ tattvabubhutsutayā tamuddhiśya pravṛttiḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2529: tadayamarthaḥ, tattvanirṇayamuddhiśya tayoḥ sādhanadūṣaṇavacanasaṃdarbho vāda iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2531: jalpaḥ punaḥ kīdṛśa ityata āha--jalpe tviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2533: tadayamarthaḥ, bhavatu nāma kvacita jalpato 'pi tattvanirṇayaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2539: kathaṃ ca parasparaviruddhayoḥ sāmānyaviśeṣabhāvo 'pītyata āha--viśiṣyete iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2541: pūrvaṃ vādavyākhyānāvasare bhede heturuddeśyaviśeṣābhisandhiruktaḥ tadapekṣayā aparamapīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2542: yau tau vādajalpayoḥ prayoktātau tāvekatrāvijigīṣayā anyatra vijigīṣayā viśeṣitau vādajalpau parasparato vyavacchindāte ityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2543: dūṣayitum ekadeśivyākhyānaṃ tanmatena vyācaṣṭe iti yojyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2545: yadyapi vyabhicārādarśane 'pi avinābhāvo na sidhyati pṛthagabhidhānasya puruṣecchādhīnatvāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2547: tathāpi vyabhicārasya sphuṭatvāt sa eva darśitaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2548: tasmād vāde codanīyā bhaviṣyantītyanena pṛthagabhidhānaprayojanamātraṃ pratipāditam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2555: tadā kimiti na kvacit śāstrapradeśe svayameva darśitavānityata āha--etāvāneveti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2559: nanvagrevāde codanīyatvameva pratipādayati, iha tu vidyāprasthānabhedajñāpanārthatvaṃ varṇayati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2560: tat kuto na virodha ityata āha--vādajalpavitaṇḍā ityādi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2563: yadi vidyāśabdenāsya vādādayo na vivakṣitāḥ kathamagre vādavyāpāraṃ darśayitvā jalpavitaṇḍayoḥ sarvāṇyeva nigrahasthānāni vyāpāratvenāha?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2564: tad yadayameva brūte nūnamayamasyārtho vivakṣita iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2568: tasmāt svarūpavad vyāpāraphalabheda apyamīṣāṃ pratipādanīyā bhavanti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2572: na tu teṣāmasti saṃbhavati prayoga iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2575: tat kuto lakṣaṇatantrtvamityata āha--lakṣyata iti lakṣaṇamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2576: nanu yadi pṛthagabhidhānenaiva vāde codanīyatvaṃ pratipādyate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2578: athānyathāpi teṣāṃ tad gamyata eva tadā hetvābhāseṣvapi sa eva prakāro 'sta,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2581: na hi hetvābhāsāḥ pṛthagabhihitā ityeva vāde codanīyatvaṃ teṣāṃ gamyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2586: ayameva ca nyāyo viśeṣataḥ pṛthagabhidhānena sūcitaḥ sūtrakāreṇa /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2589: evaṃ ca vyavasthite vārtikakṛto 'pi praśno nāprāstāvika ityāha--tatra pṛcchatīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2591: atha na tadarthatvaṃ tayoḥ, kiṃ tadavatāreṇa?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2595: taccāpratibhādyudbhāvanaṃ vinā na syāditi tattvaṃ pratipipādayiṣatā kartavyamevedamityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2596: nanuc chalādīnāṃ parijñānaṃ na sākṣānniḥśreyasa upayujyate ātmādivat /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2599: na ca parijñānameva phalam, apuruṣārthatvādityata āha--parijñānasya ca phalamuktamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2601: svayaṃ ca sukaraḥ prayoga iti granthasya pratyakṣasiddhatvāt kimuktaṃ bhavatīti tatsvarūpapraśno 'saṃgata ityataḥ pūrayati--anena bhāṣyeṇeti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2603: kiṃ tu tadanuguṇam evetyāśayavān sautraṃ prayojanamanuvadati--sūtrakāreṇeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2608: ato niḥśreyasasya paramapuruṣārthasya tanmūlatāyāṃ viparyayaśaḍkaiva nāsti,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2614: pramāṇavyavahāra sadbhāve tu kimānvīkṣikyā tatra prakāśayitavyam?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2616: vyutpāditena pramāṇādīnā tatra vyavahārastadvyutpattistvita eva, na tu tata ityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2617: nanu praṇetṛśrotrapramāṇopajīvanamānvīkṣikyāmapi samānamato na vidyāntarād viśeṣa ityata āha--na tu pramāṇādīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2618: pramāṇopajīvane samāne 'pi yathaitadvyutpādyamupajīvanti tāḥ, naivaṃ tadvyutpādyamiyamapītyarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2619: nanu upajīvakatāsāmye 'pi parasparopajīvyopajīvakabhāvaḥ kva nāma dṛṣṭa ityata āha--yatheti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2623: na tūpajīvakānumānamapekṣya pratyakṣādi, anumānāntaraṃ tu svaprāmāṇyavyutpādakamapekṣate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2625: kiṃ tu prāgeva ityabhiprāyeṇa vyutpādyasajātīyāpekṣānirākaraṇāyoktam--na pratyakṣādiviṣayamapi tadānīmeveti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2628: tasya grahaṇaṃ pramāṇādigrakāśitamarthamitarā vidyāḥ pratipādyante iti vārttikena /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2632: tadevaṃ svarūpeṇāpekṣāṃ darśayitvā viṣayagatā apekṣā bhāṣyakṛtā darśitā--upāya iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2634: nanu vidyāntarāṇāṃ śabdātmakatayā pramāṇatvāt tasya ca svapratipādye 'napekṣatvāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2636: pramāṇasya sataḥ svapratipādye pramāṇāntarāpekṣā nāsti, na tu svetikartavyatābhūtatarkāpekṣāpi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2638: atha tarkamanapekṣamāṇasya kiṃ syādityata āha--mā bhūditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2644: tathāpīha gobalīvardanyāyena pramāṇasya svapadopāttatvāt prayojanajijñāsātarkā eva vivakṣitāḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2647: arthatattvaṃ padārthatattvaṃ vākyārthatattvaṃ vā, avadhārya pramāṇāntarādarthavādādeva vā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2649: evaṃ ca daṇḍanītyāṃ yathā yamo rājā kubero vā rājatyādi,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2650: vārttāyāṃ māghe parikarṣitā bhūmiḥ suvarṇamayaṃ phalamādhatta ityādi tarkānapekṣayā viphalāyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2652: viṣayamiti śeṣa ityatrāpi vidheyatayā niṣedhyatayeti śeṣaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2685: ataḥ sādhye saṃśayaḥ kiṃ vidhipadasamabhivyāhṛtapadatvādagnihotrādivadvidhiviṣayo bhavatu svargo 'dhikārivad vā neti pūrvapakṣamādarśayanneva tatrāniṣṭaprasaṃgamāha--tatra yadīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2686: na ca śyenādisādhyāyā hiṃsāyā vihitatvenārthatvameva bhavatu kā kṣatiriti vācyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2687: vidhirhi pravartakaḥ svajñānena icchāmantarā kṛtvā prayatyanotpādakaṃ iti yāvat /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2688: sa ca prayatno na sādhyaviṣayaḥ kartuṃ śakyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2689: upayo hi prayatnaviṣayo na tu phalam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2690: tasmāt prayatnaviṣayatvāt sādhanetikartavyate eva vidhīyete na tu sādhyam, tadaviṣayatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2691: na hi jñāpakatvamātraṃ vidhitvam, api tvicchāprayatnaviṣayajñāpakatvamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2692: tasmāt śyenādisādhyā hiṃsā anarthabhūtaivārthaḥ syād yadi vidhiviṣayaḥ syāditi sādhūktam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2693: siddhānte pramāṇamādarśayanneva sādhyapadasamabhivyāhārastarhi kvopayujyate ityāśaḍkāmapanayati--atha sādhyāṃśamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2698: nanu bhavatvevaṃ tāvat tathāpyānvīkṣikyā kimāyātamityata āha--tadiheti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2700: yathā ābhikhyāyāḥ prayojakatvaṃ kṣīrahomasthāne tadviniveśanād rasādisāmyāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2703: sarvā vidyā iti vidyaśabdena taddharmān lakṣayatīti na bhāṣyavyākhyāvirodhaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2715: jalpādayo hi madādihetavaḥ parābhibhavopāyatvāt dravyaśarīrasaṃpattivaditi prayogaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2719: kiṃ tu pratipannasya tattvapratipattipālanārthaṃ duravaliptapratipādanārthaṃ ca tayoradhikāraḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2725: anvayavyatirekābhyāmeva tu siddhacatvityata āha--madamānādihetutvaṃ ca heturasiddha iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2726: sati ca tattvavidāṃ na saṃbhavantīti vadatā yathāśrutasya
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2734: apratītasvarūpasya prayojanāmisaṃbandhasya parīkṣā na yujyate, rirāśrayatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2749: cātra vacana eva sākṣāt saṃśayaṃ darśayati, tathāpi taddvārā artha eva draṣṭavya iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2750: saṃbandhini ca prayojane tattvajñānakāryatayā parīkṣyamāṇe saṃbandha eva kāryakāraṇabhāvalakṣaṇaḥ parokṣito bhavatīti tadeva parīkṣyatayā nirdiśyate--tat khalu vai niḥśreyasamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2756: nanu jīvanmuktipakṣe tadvatāmavasthānaṃ na syāditi codyamānamanavakāśamityata āha--tadatyanteti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2766: [1.1.22] ityatāvadeva niḥśreyasamiti kena pratijñānaṃ yāvatā jīvanmuktirapi riḥśreyasaṃ bhavatyevetyata āha--na cānyaditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2771: yasyābhāvānnāpavṛjyate so 'nyor'thaḥ iti sphuṭaṃ vārttikamiti ṭīkārthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2773: yathāśrutaṃ vārttikaṃ na pūrvāpakṣācchādakaṃ na hyaparamapi niḥśreyasaṃ śāstrīyāt tattvajñānāt sākṣādbhavatīti,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2774: yasmācca sākṣādbhavati na tacchāstrīyamityato bhūmimaracayati--catasro hīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2780: na hi niścayātiriktaṃ kasyacit pramāṇasya phalamityata āha--na cāyamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2782: na hi niścayo mohaḥ aupadeśikenānumānikena vā tattvaniścayena nirākartuṃ pāryate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2788: kāryakāraṇabhāvasya bhedādhiṣṭhānatayā tayoḥ paramārthikatve bhedasyāpi pāramārthikatvaprasaṃgāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2792: dvitīye tu na śābdādānumānikād vā tattvajñānādaindriyakavyāmohavigamaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2793: kiṃ tarhi, sākṣātkārādeva dṛṣṭa iti tathaiva tadarthinaḥ pravṛttiryuktā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2794: na ca vācyaṃ vākyādevātmasākṣātkārodaya iti, tasya kevalasya sāmarthyānupalambhāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2795: yadi tu svasaṃviditasvarūpatayā kiṃ tatra dhyānādikamapūrvamādhāsrūtītyucyate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2798: tatrāpi na kevalenaiva vākyena sākṣātkāraḥ kiṃ tu cakṣurādinaiva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2800: anekadhā śrutaśruterapi satyapi ca paṭīyasi manasi brahmasākṣātkārābhāvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2805: lokasiddhaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvastāttviko bhavatu mā vā bhavatu sarvasya puruṣārthapravṛttasya tāvat sa eva śaraṇam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2807: yadi nāma catasraḥ pratipattaya ātmādau prameye, prakṛte tu kimāyātamityata āha--atheti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2808: etaduktaṃ bhavati--yadi śrautamānumānikaṃ vā tattvajñānamādāya pūrvapakṣaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2811: kiṃ tarhi? paramparayā saiva catasro hītyādinā darśitā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2818: na hi śravaṇāderiva pare niḥśreyase kartavye sākṣātkārasyāpi kiñcit kartavyāntaramastītyata āha--na caivamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2824: śakyatve vā surāpayetvānumānamapi durnivāramiti haitukānāṃ dattaḥ svahastaḥ syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2825: ata eva na prāyaścittācaraṇaduḥkhameva brāhmahatyādīnāṃ phalam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2830: tasmādadattaphalānyeva karmāṇi prāyaścittena kṣīyanta ityeva sādhu /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2832: atra cāgamabalapravṛttā āgamenaiva bodhayituṃ yujyanta ityāśayavānāha,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2839: syādapyevaṃ yadi nābhuktamityādismṛteranugrāhako nyāyo na syāt, asti ca tathā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2843: na cotsargasiddhāyāḥ smṛterasati bādhake 'nyathāmāvo yujyata ityāśayavānāha--autsargikasyeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2846: kṣīyante cāsya karmāṇi tasmin dṛṣṭe parāvare //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2847: [muṇḍaka. 2.2.8] iti śrutau paripanthinyāṃ kathamucyate 'sati bādhaka iti,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2848: kathaṃ ca tadvirodhena smṛternirṇāyakatvamanumānānugraho 'pītyata āha--kṣīyanta iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2849: na hīyaṃ śrutiradattaphalānāmeva karmaṇāṃ tattvajñānāt kṣayamāha, kiṃ tu kṣayamātram /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2865: atha naiṣa mahimā neṣām, tathāpi kva yogaprabhāvasyopayogaḥ?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2868: evaṃ ced varamadattaphalānyeva yogaprabhāvāt kṣīyanta iti kalpyatāṃ lāghavāyeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2875: te ca sahakāriṇaḥ kvacitphalonneyāḥ yathā yugapadanekendriyopagrahe,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2876: kvacidāgamagamyā yathā vāsudevasaubhariprabhṛtīnāṃ kāyayaugapadya iti sarvatra pramāṇamasti,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2878: yathā ca mahāpralaye sarvakarmaṇāmekadaiva vṛttinirodha āgamaprāmāṇyādāsthīyate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2879: tathā yogarddhikāle 'pi sarveṣāṃ vṛttilābha āstheya āgamaprāmāṇyādeveti na kiñcit svapratibhāmātreṇa kalpitamityarthaḥ tādṛśaśca muniraparaniḥśreyasavānityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2881: atha paraṃ niḥśreyasaṃ kīdṛśamityata āha--paraṃ tviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2885: na hyasti sambhavo na tatra tṛṣyati tacca tasya sukhu yādṛśamajñāninaḥ tṛṣṇājanakam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2886: na tad dveṣṭi tacca tasya duḥkhamiti yādṛśamajñānino dveṣajanakamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2888: upabhogaprayatna āstheyo mokṣāya tvaramāṇenāpi kāyavyūhādāviti śeṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2889: yastu ta tvarate yadā bhavitā karmakṣayastadā bhavitā mokṣo 'pi kiṃ tvarayā?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2899: yadyapi duḥkhādīnāmekārthasamavāyalakṣaṇo 'pi yogaḥ saṃbhavati tathāpi śarīrāderjanmanaḥ sa nāsti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2900: kāryakāraṇabhāvastu tasyāpi sa eva grāhya ityāha--yogyatayeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2901: kāraṇasya hi pūrvavartitvaṃ yujyata ityata āha--atra
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2903: uttarasyānantaraṃ ca pūrvameva syāt, na ca pūrvaṃ kāryamityata āha--tadanantaratvaṃ ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2906: mithyājñāne kāraṇe tatkāryā doṣāḥ avyavadhānenaiva ādau paṭhitā iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2915: keṣāmiti duḥkhādīnāmiti ca padaṃ kiṃ bhavatīti sākāḍkṣam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2929: nanu sūtre mithyājñānamātrameva śrūyate, tat kathamāha tatrātmādāvityata āha--yadyani sāmeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2931: na khalu yathā kuṇḍe badaraṃ saṃyogena paṭe vā śauklyaṃ samavāyenetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2932: nanu na tāvat sattāmātreṇa sārūpyaṃ bhrāntāvupayujyate japākusumādisannidhānaparibhūtasitimni sphaṭhikādāvanupalabhyamānaviśeṣasmaraṇe 'pi rajatādiviparyāsābhāvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2937: na hīdamane, sadṛśamiti kṛtvā sārūpyagrahaṇamiti brūmaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2939: rajatādau yo dharmaścakacikyādiḥ upalabdhapūrvaḥ sa eva tajjātīyo vā purovartinyupalabhyate yadi tadā bhrānti,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2944: vyavacchedakānabhibhūtatvaṃ ca tatra nāstītyataḥ sarvātmanā vā sārūpyamekadeśena vetyevamādi parāstaṃ veditavyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2946: idamatra vivakṣitam, sārūpyaṃ hyāropyasyāropaviṣayeṇa cintyate, anyathā vā? anantare 'tiprasaṃgaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2947: prathame tu na tāvata pītaguṇī śuklaguṇini śaḍkhe āropyate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2954: taddhi tadātmatayā vā āropyet, tatsaṃsargitayā vā?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2955: ādye śuklatvasāmānyādhārā vyaktiḥ pītatvasāmānyātmanā prathamānā na deśakālaniyatā syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2958: na ca pītatvasāmānyameva śuklaguṇavyaktirūpeṇaropyata iti sāmpratam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2962: na hi tasyānyat kiñcid rūpamasti, yena pratītipathamavataret /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2963: sarvathā apratītaṃ ca nāropaviṣaya ityasaṃgatirevāsya kalpasya,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2964: saṃsargitayā tu sāmānye āropyamāṇe śuklaguṇasya śuklatvenaiva pratītiḥ syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2966: tasmāt pītaguṇa śaṅkhe samāropyata iti vācyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2969: na hyatra pītaguṇa āropyo 'pi tu pītaguṇaśca śaḍkhaśca āropaviṣayau,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2971: tathā ca saṃsṛṣṭasvabhāvābhyāṃ guṇaguṇibhyāmanayoḥ asaṃsṛṣṭasvabhāvayoḥ sārūpyamiha prayojakam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2972: upadarśitaṃ ca taditi kimaprayojakena guṇisārūpyeṇa guṇasārūpyeṇa vā, satā asatā vetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2988: asti hi kenacit kasyacit kathañcit sārūpyamityata āha--neti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2996: apsu daṇḍasya vakratābhrame taraṅgavakrimadaṇḍayorasaṃsargagraha ityevaṃ neyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3000: yathā hi, indriyādinā vinā nātmā duḥkhaṃ janayitumalam, evaṃ nendriyādikamapi tamantareṇa /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3004: na tairvinā duḥkhaheturātmā cet te 'pi tādṛśāḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3012: yadi jñātasya sato duḥkhaṃ pratyātmano hetutvaṃ sutamaraṇāderiva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3016: ātmadṛṣṭestu heyatvavyutpādanaṃ manāk sadalamityāśaḍkya nirākaroti--na tviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3025: tanmūlatvācca rāgadveṣayoḥ, tannivṛttau tayorapi nivṛttiriti ko nāma nābhyupaiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3028: na hi śuktikāto rajataṃ bhedenāvyavasthāpayatastasya rajatabuddhiḥnivartate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3031: na hi te śarīrādiviviktam ahamiti pratiyanti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3033: sāpi kiṃ sarvathā jñānābhāvādeva, cetanasyāpīdantāspadatvādeva vā, tasminneva nāstitvādhyāropād vā?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3036: yathā yathā dṛṣṭinirodhāya prayatnaḥ, tathā tathā dṛṣṭeḥ pratyāpatteḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3043: yadi hyahamāspadaṃ cetano gṛhītaḥ, kathaṃ nāstitādhyāropaḥ?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3050: tarhi bahirūpaplavavirahe svātmapratiṣṭhaṃ jñānaṃ rāgādinivṛttiheturityevaṃbhūtayātdṛṣṭyā kimaparāddham,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3057: tarhi nirātmīyatādṛṣṭiṃ vadan kuto nairātmyadṛṣṭiṃ supta iva pralapasīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3061: vastutastu nāsti karma, nāsti karmaphalam, nāsti pretyabhāva iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3069: arthācca pravartayet pravṛttinivṛttī ca saiva dṛṣṭiḥ karoti yā rāgadveṣau prasūte,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3074: tasmād yaḥ paralokārtho tasya paralokinamātmānamaḍgīkṛtyaiva svarge 'paparge vā prayatnaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3075: yastu nityamātmānaṃ nābhyupaiti tasya cārvākasya iva svargāpavargāveva na staḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3082: api tu duḥkhaṃ jihāsamāna ātmānaṃ jahāti,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3083: ātmānamanapahāya duḥkhasya hātumaśakyatvāditi manyamānastasmād duḥkhamajihāsataḥ sukhaṃ copādātumicchato nairātmyadṛṣṭerasaṃbhava eva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3084: tathā ca tathābhūtasya nairātmyadarśino nityātmadarśino vā tulyaḥ saṃsāraḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3086: na hi sarvaduḥkhocchedam evopakāraṃ paśyati sukhāya tadupakārāya ca ghaṭata iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3089: na hi parāpakāraḥ sarvaduḥkhocchedanidānamiti hṛdi nidhāyāha--abhyarhitatā ceti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3093: itarakārakaprayoktṛtvam bāhyakārakaprayojyatāṃ ca dṛṣṭvā bhedāgrahe sati śarīrādau kartṛtvamāropyātmatvena viparyasyatīti tadidamuktam--tāṃ khalviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3094: evaṃ siddhaṃ kṛtvā viparyayam anyathākhyātirūpamiti śeṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3096: nanu sthāṇāvevāyaṃ mama corapratyayo vṛtta ityāgāpālāṅganaṃ prasiddhamiti tadatra saṃśaya eva nāstītyata āha--parīkṣakāṇāmiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3099: nanvidaṃ rajatamityatra dvayaṃ pratibhāti, jñānasyātmā, purovarti dravyaṃ ca /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3103: tat kathamucyate vaṇigvīthyādāviti, ata āha--āntaratvaṃ tvasyānupalabdhacaraṃ katastyam?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3107: tathā sati nedaṃ rajatamiti śuktikāyāṃ rajatatvapratiṣedhe tadekajñānasaṃsargiṇo bhūtakāderapi rajatatvaṃ vidadhyāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3109: tat kasya hetoḥ? tasya rajatatvaṃ kadācidapi nopalabdhacaraṃ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3111: svātmāno 'pi rajatātmatvaṃ na kasyacidupalabdhigocaraḥ kadācit svapne 'pi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3113: so 'yaṃ svapnāyate, tatrāpi hi purovartini rajate anubhūyamāne svātmano rajatākāratvaṃ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3117: yathā hi nedaṃ rajatamiti bādhakabalena purovartino rajatatvapratiṣedhaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3120: evaṃ tarhi na rajatatvamāropyate bāhye, kiṃ tu tasminnevāhamāspade bāhyatvamāropyate ityāśayaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3121: tathā sati bādhakapratyayena tadevāpaneyam, tasmiścāpanīte 'haṃ rajatamiti syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3122: evaṃ ca satīdaṃ rajatamiti kor'thaḥ? nāhaṃ rajatamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3124: tataśca yathedaṃ nedamahaṃ nāhamityanayorvirodhāt samuccayābhimāno 'pi nāsti,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3125: tathā nedaṃ rajataṃ nāhaṃ rajatamityanayorapi virodhāt samuccayābhimāno 'pi na syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3127: tasmādubhayorapi rajatatvapratiṣedho 'nyasya rajatatvaṃ vyavasthāpayatīti pāṣāṇarekheyaṃ na durūttarapāṃsupūraṇamātreṇāpanetuṃ śakyate //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3135: pravṛttyaupayiko hyarthaḥ prakṛte prakāśate, na tu sadasattvena gṛhītvā pravṛttirūpapadyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3140: ta thāhi kimidam anirvacanīyatvam, kiṃ nirūktiviraha eva, āhosvinnirūktinimittaviraha eva?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3141: na tāvadādyaḥ, idaṃ rajataṃ nedaṃ rajatamiti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3143: nāpi dvitīyaḥ, nirūktinimittaṃ jñānaṃ vā syāt viṣayo vā?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3145: nāpi dvitīyaḥ, viṣayo 'pi kiṃ bhāvarūpo 'bhāvarūpo vā? ādye asatkhyātyabhyupagamaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3148: atha bhāvābhāvaśabdena lokapratītisiddhāvevobhāvabhipretau, viparītau vā? ādye tāvad
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3153: atrāpi nisaḥpratiṣedhārthatvena svabhāvaśabdasyāpi bhāvābhāvayoranyatarārthatve pūrvavat prasaṃgaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3155: atra tu svavacanavirodhaḥ, pratītyagocaraśca pratīyate ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3156: yad yathā pratīyate tat tathā neti cet? atra na vipratipadyāmahe /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3158: nanu yadyathāsatprakāśate prapañco 'pi tarhi tathaivāstu jātyādikaṃ cetyata āha---yaḥ punariti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3159: asaccet? asatteyaiva prakāśeta, na pravṛttigocaraḥ syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3175: caturthe tu sāmyāpādane sati jñānadharmo vā agraho viśeṣaṇam, vastudharmo vā?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3199: anāśvāsastu yathārthatvājñānaṃ vā syāt, yathārthatvāyathārthatvasandeho vā?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3208: tajjanitāṃ pravṛttiṃ vighaṭayaditi taducitavyapadeśābhiprāyam, viparītamabhiprāyaṃ kurvadityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3218: anugatamekaṃ svarūpaṃ samānāsamānajātīyavyacchedako dharmo lakṣaṇamiti yāvat //2 //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3222: svābhāvikaṃ tu śāstrasya traividhyaṃ nāstyeva tasya puruṣāyattatvādityapi draṣṭavyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3230: ataḥ samānadharmadarśanāt asati nibhāge saṃśayaḥ, tannivṛttyartho vibhāgārambhaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3231: nanu sadanupayogisaṃśayānucchede kiṃ syāt? kathamanupayuktaṃ taditi jijñāsāyā anivṛttiḥ? api
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3232: cārthāpattyādīnāmupayogavatāmapi parairūdghuṣyamāṇānāmapi lakṣaṇākaraṇāt syāt sandehaḥ-- kiṃ lakṣaṇākaraṇādasanti, anupayogīni veti?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3235: tathā bauddhāpekṣayā mīmāṃsakānāmadhikapramāṇalakṣaṇābhidhānaṃ vinaiva pramāṇānām ādhikyāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3237: tad ihāpi sāṃkhyāpekṣayā adhikābhidhāne bhavati sandehaḥ, kiṃ satyādhikye athāsatīti?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3259: evaṃ ca sati yatra yadā yasya yathānukūlatve pratikūlatve vā pramāṇamasti,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3262: sarvaśca pareṣāṃ vimarśasaṃbhavo 'tīndriyasāmarthye 'pi samāna ityarthāpattim upekṣyānyadevātīndriyaśaktisvīkārabījamāśaḍkya vimṛśati--syādetaditi //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3263: svarūpasya pratyakṣatve sākalyasya ca kāryaikavyaḍgyatve 'numeyamatīndriyaṃ sāmarthyam avaśiṣyata iti pūrvapakṣārthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3266: nanvanyakāryeṇopadhānaṃ tatkāryeṇaiva vā? ādye ahetureva hetuḥ syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3267: dvitīye tvitaretarāśrayatvam, tasya tatkāraṇatve siddhe sati tatkāryatvaṃ siddhaṃ syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3268: tatkāryatve sati ca tadupalakṣitaṃ kāraṇatvaṃ bhavedityata āha--idameva cāsya tadupadhānaṃ yat tatkāryotpādāt pūrvamavaśyaṃbhāvaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3269: yudatpādāt pūrva yasyāvaśyaṃbhāvaḥ tat kāraṇamitarat kāryamityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3270: nanvevaṃrūpaṃ kāraṇatvaṃ tajjātīyasya samāmanyato 'numīyeta prativyakti vā?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3271: na tāvat prativyakti, taduttarakāryābhāve 'pi kāsāñcid vināśadarśanāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3274: yathā yo yo dhūmaḥ so 'gnimāniti sāmānyato 'vadhāraṇe 'pi eṣa dhūmo 'gnimāniti navādhāritam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3276: na ca kvacit kāryamakṛtvaiva vinaṣṭe vyabhicāraḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3279: tasmād yā nobhayaprayatnaprasavahetuḥ sopekṣābuddhiḥ tṛtīyeti viṣayabhedād buddhibhedaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3280: sa ca sukhaheturduḥkhaheturataddhetuśceti trividha iti suvyaktamityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3281: anumānapadaṃ vyutpādayatā bhāṣyakṛtā prasaṃgāt lakṣaṇamapyabhihitamiti ṭīkākṛd api smṛtyādivyavacchedyaṃ darśayati--tathā cetyādinā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3290: nanu hānādiviṣayaṃ prāmāṇyamucyamānamanumānasya svagocaraṃ pratyevoktaṃ bhavati,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3292: ata āśaḍkaiveyamanupapannā kimatra samādhānenetyāśaḍkya vyāpārānubandhitayā hānādirasya gocaraḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3295: vijñāne yat prakāśate yena vijñānaṃ nirūpyat ityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3296: na ca svaviṣayādanyad viṣayāntaramasya saṃbhavati, atiprasaṃgāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3299: nanu heyādibuddhayaḥ kena viśeṣeṇa dvitīyānumānasya phalam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3301: nanu sāmīpyasya sādṛśyasya mānaṃ mitiḥ saṃjñāsaṃjñiparicchede pramāṇamityukte kuto vyāghātāvakāśa ityata
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3303: nanu svaviṣayaparicchittau tāvat svarūpataḥ pramāṇam, vyāpāravataḥ kāraṇaviśeṣasya pramāṇatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3304: nāpi vākyārthapratipattirasyāḥ phalam, tadānīṃ tasyā vinaṣṭatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3306: anupayuktasamayānāmasmaryamāṇapadārthānāṃ śabdasmaraṇe 'pi tadabhāvādityata āha--yat khalu caitreti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3308: tat kutaḥ pratyakṣasya pradhānatvād iti ekadeśī vaktītyata āha--pratyakṣaparā hīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3309: prāyeṇa pratyakṣamātrapūrvakamiti sākṣāt, paraṃparayā tu sarvamevānumānaṃ tathetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3314: yadyapi śabdasyapi pramāṇasya vākyarūpasya smṛtisthasya padārthasmṛti padārthasmṛtisahakṛtasyaiva vākyārthabodhakatvam, tathāpi na
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3315: kvacidapyanubhūyamānasya liḍgaṃ tvanubhūyamānamapi śabdasya viśeṣābhidhāne nyāyasiddhe 'pyekadeśyabhimataprayojanābhidhānaṃ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3317: tathāpi dūṣaṇābhāsena ta tad duṣayituṃ śakyamiti śikṣayituṃ vārttikakṛtamanarañjayannevottaragranthamavatārayati--tadetadekadeśimatamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3320: tatra mahāviṣayatvamanaikāntikāmiti śabdasya mahāviṣayatvāt ādyatvamāpādayatā pratyakṣasyānādyatvamicchatā anya eva dṛṣṭānta udāharaṇīyaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3321: tathā ca citrādau vipakṣabhūte pratyakṣa'pi gatatvena mahāviṣayatvamanaikāntikatvamityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3327: mahāviṣayatvāditi sādhāraṇo dharmaḥ pratyakṣaṃ vā śabdo veti saṃdehaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3329: prādhānyakhyāpanaṃ prayojanaṃ yadi prāthamyaṃ vinā na siddhyet tadānumānasyāpi prādhānyāt prāthamyaṃ syādityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3330: nanvasati ca saṃplave kā no hāniḥ?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3331: sati vā kiṃ bhevad yena bhāṣyakāro vicārayati smetyata āha--syādetaditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3333: yadyanumānamapi vyavasthitaviṣayaṃ bhavedityata āha---na cānumānaviṣaye sāmānyarūpa iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3335: avyākhyāne kāraṇamiti kimiti na vyākhyātamiti śaṅgānivṛttikāraṇamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3336: sandigdhena hīti upadeśaprāmāṇye taddvāra vahnāvapyuttarakālamiti mantavyam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3337: ato vahinaṃ pratyāhita utpāditaḥ pratyayo niścayo yasyetyanena na virodhaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3339: nanu ca niścavaphalatvāviśeṣe 'pi pratyakṣata eva ākākṣānivṛttiriti kuta etadityata āha--tāvadayamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3341: nanvaḍgaṃ viśeṣaṇamityekor'thaḥ, tat kuto vyāpakatveneti vyākhyāyate?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3342: kutaśca pūrvācāryapradaśitaḥ panthāḥ parihnīyata ityata āha--tatta prakṛtānupayogitayeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3356: lakṣaṇa hi jijñāsupratipādanāya, sā cānirjñātasāmānyasya viśeṣe nāsti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3358: viśeṣavibhāgaṃ ca kṛtvā śiṣyasya jijñāsāmutthāpya viśeṣalakṣaṇāvatāraḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3359: tathā ca sāmānyalakṣaṇavibhāgoddeśajñānasya jijñāsadijananadvārā viśeṣalakṣaṇajñānaṃ prati hetutvāt tadgocarayorapi hetuhetumabhdāvaṃ vivakṣitvoktam--hetutveneti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3360: vyavacchedo nāsyāmidheya ityata āha--prayojanamiti samānajātīyamanumānādi pramāṇatvena,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3365: ataḥ kārakāt phalabhūtāṃ kriyāṃ niṣkṛṣya darśayati--viśeṣakatvaṃ viśeṣa iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3367: kaḥ punaranena lakṣaṇena pratipādayiṣyata ityata āha--yaḥ khalviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3368: na ca sarve vyāmūḍhāḥ, yena pratipādyapratipādakavyavasthā na syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3369: na ca sarvatra vyāmoho yenānavasthā syāt, na ca sarve vyāmohahetavo yenāpratipattiḥ syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3370: na ca sarvāpratipattiḥ, yenāśrayāsiddhiḥ syāditi bhāvaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3373: kiṃ cāsyābhidheyam, yadibhidadhat tatparaṃ syādityata āha--tasmāditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3374: nanu lakṣaṇaṃ yadi prasiddhaṃ kiṃ vidheyam, tasyāprasiddhatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3375: vidheyaṃ cet kathaṃ lakṣaṇam, tasyāprasiddhatvādityata āha--itastvavagatalakṣaṇa iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3377: pratipādyaśca vidheḥ pratītyaiva lakṣaṇaṃ yāgamiva paścāt sādhyaṃ sādhayatītyarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3380: satyapi tasmin paramāṇvādiṣu indriyasaṃyuktavyavaghāyakasaṃyukteṣu ca ghaṭādiṣu tadanupapatteḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3383: tat kimarthaṃ saṃyuktasamavetasamavāyābhyupagama ityata āha--na ceti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3386: nanvasannikṛṣṭasyaiva sannikṛṣṭāśrayasya vā grahaṇamagrahaṇameva vā bhaviṣyati,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3395: na ca rūpatvādisāmānyaviśeṣaviśiṣṭarūpādyupalabdhimantareṇa pramāṇamasti parasparavyāvṛtteṣu cakṣurādiṣu viśiṣṭopalabdhereva pramāṇatve parasparāśrayatvam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3403: na ca viśeṣaṇabhāvapadenobhayasaṃgrahe samavāyapadenāpi catuṣṭayasaṃgraho 'stviti vācyam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3404: viśeṣaṇabhāvasya śuddhasya pratyakṣānaṅgasvena tadaṅgaprastāva viśiṣṭasya sulabhatvāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3405: samavāyasya śaphaddhasyāpi pratyakṣāṅgatvena prastutatayā tatpadasya tāvanmātrābhidhānenaiva paryavasitatvāditi //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3408: nanvavayavaśvāvayavī cetyādyevāpalabhyate, na tu tayoḥ sambandho 'pītyata āha--nānyatheti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3410: pratipattiḥ parasparāsambaddhebhyo vyāvartamānā parasparasambaddheṣu viśrāmyatīti bhāvaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3411: nanu sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ samānenādhikaraṇena sambandha iti paryāyau,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3416: api tu ya eva śuklaḥ sa eva paṭa ityabhedenaiva pratītirityāśayavānāśaḍte--tādātmyamiti cediti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3418: yadi hi guṇaguṇinorabheda eva syāt tadā tadvācakayorekārthatvāt tarūvṛkṣaśabdavat sahaprayogo na syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3420: apaṭaḥ paṭa itivadaśuklaḥ paṭa ityapi virudhyeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3423: mahārajanādisaṃyukte śuklatvavat paṭo 'pi tirohita iti na pratīyetetyevamāditarkasahāyaṃ pratyakṣameva paṭaśuklatvayorbhedamākalayatīti parihārārthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3427: tathā hi bhedamādāyāpaunarūktyam, abhedamādāya ca sāmānādhikaraṇyamityata āha--na caikaṃ vastviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3431: sā cābhedaṃ nollikhatīti cintitamadhastādityato lokaprasiddhayorbhedābhedayorasaṃkīrṇatayā virodha eva,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3436: tathāpi bhedasambandhābhyāṃ vyāvartamānā abhedaṃ vā abhedasambandhaṃ vā sādhayet /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3437: tathā hi prayogaḥ, paṭaśuklatve na bhinne sambaddhe, sāmānādhikaraṇyāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3438: ye punarbhinne sambaddhe na te samānādhikaraṇe yathā dadhikuṇḍe /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3441: bhavedevam, yadi bhedasanbandhābhyāmasya vyatirekaḥ svābhāvikaḥ syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3442: kiṃ tu raktaḥ paṭaḥ, agnirmāṇavaka itivat śabdavṛttibhedopādhikaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3445: ca heturyathā bhedasambandhābhyāṃ vyāvartate tathā abhedasambandhābhyāmapītyasādhāraṇaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3447: na caivaṃbhūtamubhayavādisaṃpratipannaṃ kiñcidasti yato vyāvṛtterasādhāraṇo hetuḥ syāditi cet na,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3449: yo hyabhinnaḥ sa kathaṃ sambaddhaḥ, sambandhasya bhedādhiṣṭhānatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3450: yaḥ sambaddhaḥ sa kathamabhinnaḥ, tenaiva tasyāsambandhāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3451: bhinno 'pīti cet? tathāpi bhedamādāyaiva sambandho na punarabhedamādāya /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3453: abhedastvasambandhenaiveti katham abhinne sambandhe iti pratijñā na vyāhatā?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3459: sattvenābheda iti cet? kimidaṃ sattvaṃ sattā vā, svarūpaṃ vā? svarūpaṃ tāvad
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3461: sattā tu tābhyāmasādhāraṇābhyāṃ sādhāraṇī bhinnā kathamiva tayoḥ svabhāvaḥ?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3463: na vaidravyaguṇakarmasādhāraṇādākārādasādhāraṇamākāraṃ sattāyāḥ paśyāmo yena sā tathā syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3464: evaṃ teṣāmapi dravyaguṇakarmaṇāṃ parasparāsaḍkīrṇāt rūpānna svabhāvāntaraṃ paśyāmaḥ pratīyamānarūpamevābhinnamityucyamāne sattā vā na syāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3468_2: vā pare menire iti yadyupanibandhenāha--śabdānāṃ tviti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3470: sā guṇaguṇibhyāṃ vyāvartamānā svavyāpyamaikāntikaṃ bhedamapi vyāvartayatīti ata āha--ayutasiddhyeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3474: bhinnasaṃmbandhyanubhave 'pi kutaḥ sambandhānubhava ityata āha---na cāsāviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3477: yo viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvaḥ sarvaḥ saṃndhāntarapūrvakaṃ iti vyāptirihaiva bhajyata iti pareṇāpi svīkaraṇīyameva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3478: na hyasau samavāyamabhāvaṃ vā abhyupagacchan viśeṣaṇatāmasya na svīkaroti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3481: sambandhāntararahito viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvaḥ pratyakṣāḍgaṃ na bhavatīti kadācid brūyāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3487: na ca guṇakarmasāmānyeṣvapi viśeṣaṇatvamātreṇaiva grahaṇamastu, kṛtaṃ samavāyādineti vācyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3489: so 'pi tṛtīyo 'stviti cet---na, gandharasayoratathābhūtayorapi saṃyuktasamavāyena grahaṇāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3499: ataḥ kiṃ tadarthena viśeṣaṇabhāvenetyata āha---na ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3503: kevalyaṃ hi bhūtaladharmo ghaṭādyavirodhī yudyucyeta na ghaṭādinā saha saṃbhavet,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3504: tathā ca sa doṣastadavastha eva, virodhī cet?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3516: tatrāpyasau bhāvaniṣedhākāro vā syāt, anyathā vā? na tāvadanyathā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3518: niṣedhākāro 'pi yadyanutpanno 'pi na nivartate, tadā ghaṭādivyavahāraḥ kadācidapi na syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3519: utpanno vā yadi nivarteta, tadā vinaṣṭo 'pi ghaṭaḥ kadācidupalabhyeta /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3520: ataḥ padārthānāṃ saptamo niṣedharūpo 'nutpannapradhvaṃsī ca utpannavināśī ca bhūtalādidharmaḥ kaivalyamabhāva iti ekor'tha iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3522: syādetat yadyapi jñeyarūpaṃ tattvāntaraṃ nāsti, tathāpi jñānarūpaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3523: viṣayaśca tasya dṛśye pratiyogini bhūtalamevetyata āha--na ceti,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3526: nanu dṛśye pratiyoginītyuktaṃ ghaṭavabhdūtalajñāne tu ghaṭo na dṛśyaḥ kiṃ tu dṛśyamāna ityata āha---nahīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3528: darśanārhe hi ghaṭaḥ tatra yadi na nāsti tadā bhūtalavadakāmenāpyupalabhyetaiva,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3533: tathāpi svavacanavirodhamapyapaśyantaṃ prati kiṃ tenāpītyāśayavānāha---dṛśye 'nupalabhyamāna iti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3537: na tāvad dvitīyatṛtīyau, smaryamāṇe dṛśyamāne ghaṭe bhūtalopalambhe sati ghaṭavatyapi prasaṅgasya
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3542: bhavati hi ghaṭaṃ nopalabhaitivat ghaṭo nāstīti pratītiḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3544: nimīlitalocanasya hyupalambhābhāvaniścaya upalabhyābhāve ca sandeho jijñāsā ca kathañcid bhūtalaniścaye 'pi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3555: mamāpi yadabhāvo 'nupalabdhyā bodhyaḥ tadgrāhakeṇendriyeṇādhikaraṇagrahaṇe sa gṛhyata iti siddhāntasāramiti cet---na,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3561: nāpi pratiyogismaraṇe rūpābhāvapratītyā ca niyamena apekṣata ityāyātam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3563: āntarālikameva vyāpāraṃ vyavadhāyakamiti bhrāntaṃ pratibodhayannāha---na ca pratiyogīti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3565: abhāvajñānotpattāvindriyārthasannikarṣo na kāraṇaṃ vyabhicārāditi vādinam utthāpayati---nanu svarūpeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3569: na tāvadādyaḥ, tadānīṃ gehasya viprakṛṣṭasya vyavahitatvena yogyānupalabdherasattvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3572: bhavati hi kadācit pratiyogyadhikaraṇayoḥ smaraṇe 'pyasato 'pi sabhdāvapratītiḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3580: na ca svarasasiddhasya smaraṇasyānupalabhyamānasyaiva viparyayaḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3581: iyatī ca sāmāgrī yaduta pratiyogyadhikaraṇasmaraṇaṃ tattāsmaraṇaṃ ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3582: na vā sādhāraṇaṃ pramākaraṇamadūṣayanta eva doṣā viparyayahetavaḥ, sarvatrānāśvāsaprasaḍgāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3583: tvayāpyetat samarthanīyamiti cet---na, yogyāsmaraṇasya mayā liṅgatveneṣṭatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3585: yadā tu sunipuṇaikajñānagrahaṇayogyasya caitrasya gehasmaraṇai'pyasmaraṇalakṣaṇaṃ liṅgamavadhāryate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3589: asmaraṇamātrasya hi vyabhicāram upalabhya tadanādṛtya viśiṣṭāsmaraṇaṃ jñātukāmasya praṇidhānamupapadyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3591: kiṃ tu tadapi kathaṃ jñātavyamityavaśiṣyate? tatrāha---naitaditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3599: ata evānutpannapādavihārasya acalacakṣuṣa ityādi vyadhikaraṇameva darśayati sma vārttikakāraḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3606: iyaṃ tvānumānikī pārokṣyavatī tasmānna kvacid vyabhicāraśaḍkā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3610: na tarhi ityādibhāṣyeṇa kaḥ sūtrāvayavo vyākhyāta iti śaḍkāmapanayanneva vārttikamavatārayati---saṃpratīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3615: nanu mahattvānekadravyavattvayoḥ parasparāvinābhūtayoragṛhyamāṇaviśeṣatvenobhayorapi cākṣaṣatvaṃ prati kāraṇatvāt samuccaya eva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3616: viśeṣe vā ekasyaiva kāraṇatvam, kuto vikalpaḥ?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3617: parasparavyabhicāriṇo hyarthakriyāyāṃ vikalpasambhavo na tvime tathā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3620: ata evāgre satyapyevaṃ lakṣaṇakatva ityāha uktasāmagrīsambhave 'pi cakṣuravayavino na pratyakṣatā,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3621: ata uktaṃ vārttikakṛtā upalabdhiphalaḥ saṃskāra iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3623: tathāhi guṇidharmo vāsau syāt, guṇadharmo vā syāt?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3625: na tu kvacid grahaṇam agrahaṇaṃ ca kvaciditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3630: nityastu sāmānyarūpo na saṃskāraśabdavācyo nāpyupalabdhiphalaḥ, tasya
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3632: rūpādīnā svakāraṇavaśādeva sa svabhāvabhedo jāyate keṣāñcit,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3634: sa ca dharmādharmajanyatayā saṃskāra ityucyate, upalabdhiphalaśca bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3639: na caivamālokādayaḥ, teṣāmativyāpakatayā avyāpakatayā ca pratyakṣasvarūpāvyavasthāpakatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3642: nanu yadyapi svarūpataḥ santānato vā indriyābhedādindriyamanaḥsannikarṣābhedo yathāyathaṃ saṃbhavati,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3643: tathāpi vijñānābhedo vyaktikṛto jātikṛto vā syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3645: uttaratra tu indriyārthasannikarṣabhede pyabheda eva, sarveṣāṃ sākṣātkārijātīyatvāditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3646: tat ekadeśiparihāro garbhastrāveṇaiva gata upanyāsayogyo 'pi na bhavatītyāśayavānāha---yadā hīti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3647: asti hi svarūpajātikṛtabhedātirikto viṣayakṛto viśeṣo buddhīnām /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3650: tatra jñānasyāpi na viṣayakṛto bheda ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3653: tasyaiva goścakṣuṣā saṃyogena tatraiva gavi samavāyena prathamaṃ śuklaguṇajñānaṃ paścād gamanakarmajñānamiti bhede 'bhedāditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3659: ubhayātīndriyādhāratā tu ātmamanaḥsannikarṣasyāpi nāstītyata āha--ātmā tu yadyapīti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3661: na hi rūpopabhogānarthinaḥ kṛṣṇasāre tṛṣṇā tatkarmasaṃbhavaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3662: asaṃbhave ca kathamasyotpattiriti? ataḥ kārye 'pi karmaṇaḥ sahakāritāmāha--etaduktaṃ bhavatīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3664: yadi hi rathādisaṃyogānāṃ nabhovyāpakatvaṃ bhavet tadā tatkāryasyapi śabdasya sarvatrotpādaprasaḍgeḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3668: tataśca taddvāreṇopalamyamānā rathādayastatsaṃyogāśca na niyatadeśatayā pratīyerannityāśayavānāha---mā bhūtasarvatreti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3672: tathā ghrāṇodāharaṇaṃ pūtigrandhābhāvaviśiṣṭā surabhitarā kastūriketyato bahuvacanāvirodhaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3678: nanu mā bhūt sahāntareṇa grahaṇaṃ sāntara iti vā grahaṇaṃ hetvarthaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3681: etasyaivottaropādhitvena prayojakatvādityata āha---indriyasambandho bhavatu mā veti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3683: yadindriyasambaddhaṃ tadavaśyaṃ śarīrasambaddhamiti vā na pramāṇamasti,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3685: na hyasti niyamo yat pradīpena sambaṇsate tadavaśyaṃ mallimayāpi yad vā mallimayā tadavaśyaṃ pradīpenāpi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3687: tasmāt tadanyathāsiddhirevetyasiddhivyavacchedārthaṃ sajalasatejaḥpaṭādigrāhiṇā prāpyakāriṇā tvagindriyeṇa viruddhamapi sahāntareṇa grahaṇaṃ draṣṭavyam //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3689: iha dvividhaḥ sambandhaḥ prāptilakṣaṇo yathā, ālokādīnāṃ ghaṭādibhiḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3700: evaṃ tarhi viṣaya eva sa kaścit tādṛśo yo gṛhyate netara ityabhyupeyatām,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3702: viṣayamāhātmyaṃ hi prāptisahakāri, na tu svatantram /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3703: na hi sparśarasādayo grahaṇayogyā ityaprāptaireva tvagādibhirgṛhyante,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3704: prāpyakāritvād vā tairanubhdūtābhibhūtā api te prāptatvamātreṇa gṛhyanta ityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3705: yadyapi kṣaṇabhaṅgapariṇāmanaye 'pi prāptānāmeva parasparaṃ kartṛkaraṇakarmaṇāṃ kāryajananam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3707: na hi parasparamapratyāsīdantaḥ sahakāripratyayā bhāvānatiśāyayanto dṛśyante /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3710: tathā ca svarūpayogyatāmindriyārthayobruvatā nirantarotpāda eva vaktavyaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3713: na tu nirantarotpāde 'pi tatrādhikāprāptiḥ sādhanamarhatītyāśayavānāha---niṣetsyete hīti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3714: evaṃ nivāritābhimānaḥ paradarśane 'pi pramāṇamapaśyan sandigdha iti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3715: nanu janakatve satīti nirṇayahetuṃ paśyan kathaṃ nāma sandigdha ityata āha---ayamabhisandhiriti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3717: tvagādīnāṃ daṇḍādīnāṃ ca prāptānāmeva kāryajanakatvaṃ paśyan kathamiva sarvatra vipratipadyata ityato vipratipattibījamāha---yogyatayaiveti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3718: nanvayaskāntasyāprāpyakāritve hetvantare 'pi kaḥ pratīkāra ityata āha---ayaskāntamaṇeriti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3719: nanu tasya vṛttibhedaḥ anupalambhabādhita ityata uktam---cakṣuṣa iveti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3721: vyavadhānaviprakarṣau hi anirantarotpādo vā syādaprāptirvā, svarūpayogyatā vā?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3724: na ca kṛṣpāsārasyārthena maṇervā lohena nirantarotpādaḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3725: aprāptyabhāvastu prāptireva, tathā ca kaḥ pratikūlo 'nukūlamācarati? ayogyatābhāvastu yogyataiva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3726: sa ca bauddhanaye kāraṇajātīyasya nirantarotpādānna bhidyata ityuktam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3727: tasmāt sthiranaye kāryaṃ janayanti kāraṇāni parasparaprāptiṃ vā vyabhicaranti,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3730: nanu lakṣaṇāntareṇa vyavasthite lakṣye kathamanyonyāśrayatvamityata āha---agatirveti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3732: uttaratra tu avagate lakṣye tatsāpekṣeṇa lakṣaṇena kiṃ gamayitavyamityagatirevetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3734: yadi vijñānābhinnahetujatvāt sukhaṃ vijñānajātīyaṃ syāt sukhābhinnahetujatvāt tadapi sukhajātīyaṃ bhavet /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3737: nanu jñānahetvanugamaḥ sukhe 'pyasti, na tu sukhahetvanugamo jñāne, ato yatkāraṇānugamo
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3740: na tu sarvasya yavāḍkuratvam tatkāraṇānugamābhāvādityāśayavān āśaṅkate---avāntareti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3741: na hyasti niyamo yajjātīyakāryahetucakrānagamo yatra tatra tajjātīyatvamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3745: sa ca kāryabhedaḥ kiñcitkāraṇabhedenaiva bījāḍkurādivat jñānasukhādāvapyanākasmika ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3748: na hyasti saṃbhavo rūpādyupādānaṃ cārūpādikaṃ ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3750: ajñānatve vā na jñānopādānatvamiti yadi pratyavatiṣṭhate tatrāha---na ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3751: yadi hyekajātīyopādānatayaikajātīyatvaṃ bhavet, avāntaraikajātīyamapi kiṃ na syāt?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3753: dṛśyate ca rūpajñānād rūpajñānaṃ rasajñānādijātīyaṃ ca /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3757: so 'yamekopādānakatve 'pyavāntarajātibhedābhyupagamaḥ pareṣāṃ dṛṣṭāntārthamubhdāvitaḥ api cetyādyubhdāvitaṃ sandigdhavyāvṛttikatvaṃ sphuṭhayitumato nāsaṅgatamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3759: paramārthatastu yadupādānavat tatsajātīyaṃ yadvyāpakopādānavat tadguṇajātīyamiti niyamaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3761: tadyadi sattayā guṇatvena vā sukhajñānayorekajātīyatvaṃ sādhyate, tadā siddhasādhanam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3764: nāpyavāntara jātikṛtaḥ nāpi guṇatayā piṭharopādānatve 'pi karmaṇo 'guṇatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3773: utkṣepaṇasya ca pāṭavādibhedastathā jñānasyāpi darśanādibhedaḥ sukhasyāpi tāratamyādibhedo bhaviṣyatītyarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3774: syādetat, ajñānarūpatāyāṃ punaḥ kiṃ pramāṇamityata upasaṃhāravyājenāha---tasmāditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3776: na hi candanamahaṃ jānāmītyatra sukhaṃ parisphurati tadāhaṃ sukhīti syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3777: nāpi sukhyahamityatra jñānaṃ parisphurati tadā jānāmīti syāt, na caitadasti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3778: jñānaviśeṣaḥ sukhaṃ tathāvidhe ca sukhabuddhirbhavatyeveti cet---hanta bhostasya jñānaviśeṣasya viṣayaviśeṣo 'pyasti na vā?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3781: na caitad dṛṣṭamiṣṭaṃ śakayaṃ vā sādhayitum /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3782: asti cet? bāhya ābhyantaro vā? na tāvad bāhyaḥ kaścid viṣayabhedo 'sti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3783: yadeva hi rāgavatā gītamanubhūyate tadeva vītarāgeṇāpi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3784: tadeva gītam, paraṃ rāgavatā anukūlatayā, vītarāgeṇa tu tadviparītatayeti cet?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3786: kathaṃ kañcit prati, sopādhikatve sa evocyatām /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3789: tasmāt tasya jñānaviśeṣasya sukhatvenābhimatasyābhyantara eva viṣayaviśeṣo nisargānukūlasvabhāva eṣṭavyaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3790: yaddhetutayā bāhyo viṣayo 'nukūlatayābhimatatveneṣyamāṇo bhavati sa evoktarūpo viṣayaḥ sukhamityucyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3791: tathāpi mūḍhadhiyāṃ vyavahārārthaṃ samānāsamānajātīyavyavacchedakā dharmā jñānādīnāmuktāḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3801: santi hi padārthāḥ svakarmopārjitatvāviśeṣe 'pi kecidadhyakṣā eva, yathā svaśarīrādayaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3802: kecit tu parokṣā eva, yathā tadantargatanāḍīsaṃsthānādayaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3803: evamajñānatvāviśeṣe 'pi kāraṇalabdhasvabhāvabhedāḥ kecit avaśyasaṃvedyāḥ sukhādayaḥ kecidanyathetyarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3807: na ca sākṣātkāraṇameva kāraṇam, tathā sati vyāpāriṇa udāsīnāḥ prasajyeran /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3813: jñānaṃ punaḥ kāryāvasānamapi indriyārthasannikarṣam atipatatyeva svapnāntike /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3819: ālambnaṃ tvasya viparyāsasya yathā pūrvānubhūtā smaraṇārhā kāminītyevaṃ tajjānmapūrvānubhūtaṃ smaraṇārhaṃ sukhameva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3820: viparyāsatvaṃ punaretāvataivāsya yat viprakṛṣṭadeśakālayoḥ kāminītajjanyasukhayoḥ sannikṛṣṭadeśakālatayāvabhāsaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3822: tathā sati kāminītvasukhatvaniṣedhenānyasya kasyacit pratibhāsanaṃ bādhakaṃ bhavet /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3823: na ca vācyam yadi na svapnāntike sukhamutpadyate na
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3827: smaraṇe prāpte viparyāsaḥ smaraṇaviparyāsaḥ anubhavalakṣaṇastadviṣaya evetyarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3828: nanu sukhaduḥkhotpādaprayojanau dharmādharmau yadasukhaduḥkhārūpān dehādīn utpādayataḥ tattadarthatayaiva,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3830: idaṃ tu svapnajñānaṃ na sukharūpam, saṃkhasādhanamapi yadi na syāt, na tarhi dharmanimittakam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3834: na ca sukhādi svarūpataḥ upabhogaḥ, kiṃ tu tadanubhavaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3835: sa ca pratyutpannasukhādyanālambanatve 'pi pūrvotpannam ālambya jāyamānaḥ sarvaṃ samañjasayati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3839: tatra tu bādhakaṃ bhavad dvirūpaṃ bhavet---asukhametaditi vā, nāsīt sukhamiti vā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3841: jāgarāvasthāyāṃ tu nāsīt kāminīti yujyate bādhakaṃ sthiratvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3846: nāstīdānīṃ sukhamiti tvidānīntarasukhasya bādho na prāktanasya, kṣaṇikatvāt tasya /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3847: tatkāryāṇāṃ ca harṣāśrupulakādīnāmanuvartamānānāmupalambhādanyathā āśutaravināśināṃ kṣaṇāntare 'darśanāt tadanubhavānāmaprāmāṇikatvameva syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3848: tasmātabādhitānubhavasiddhatvādasti svapnāntike sukhamiti taṃ pratyāha---na cāsatīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3850: tathāpi svapnāntika eva tatkāraṇatvena pratītānāṃ candanavanitādīnāmasti bādhakam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3851: kāraṇe ca bādhite kāryaṃ bādhitameva yathā svapnāntikadṛṣṭapayodapaṭalabādhe
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3853: harṣāśruprabhṛtayastu na sukhakāryāḥ kiṃ tu sukhajñānakāryā iti na tāvanmātreṇa tatsaṃbhavopapattiḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3854: tasmāt svapnāntikodāharaṇabalena jñānamātrakāryato sukhasya sidhyatīti manorathādyudāhṛtya parihṛtam //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3861: na hi yathā manoratheṣu sukhaṃ tathā viṣayasaṃbhoge /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3873: sa ca kāraṇabhedo 'nuvihitabhāvābhāva eva sidhyatītyatra vivakṣitamiti pratipipādayiṣuruktam evānubhāṣate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3878: jñānābhede hi bhinnajātīyaṃ sukhaṃ kāraṇāntaraṃ bhinnamākṣipet /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3882: sa ca tādṛśo nāstīśvare tasya bubhukṣāvirahāt ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3884: nanu te 'pyalaṃpratyayavantaḥ kathamiva sukhabhājo bhaveyurityata āha--asatyāmiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3885: na hi te sarvadaiva pratipakṣadhāraṇāvanto mā bhūdamīṣāṃ sarvadā bhogavirahād dharmādharmapracayatādavasthyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3886: tasmād yadā pratipakṣadhāraṇā nāsti tadā viṣayasākṣātkāramātrādeva teṣāṃ sukhaṃ prasajyetetyarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3887: na ca vācyam, yadi bhavedevaṃ kīdṛśo doṣa iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3890: na cendriyāṇāmarthānāṃ ca parasparamasannikṛṣṭānāmeva sattāmātraiṇa kvacidātmadharmasamutpāde sāmarthyamadhigatam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3891: tasmād yogarddhimatāṃ satyapi viṣayasākṣātkāre indriyārthasannikarṣābhāvāt sukhaṃ nāstītyabhipretyopasaṃharati--tasmāditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3897: anyatra hi caritārthatvaṃ sākṣātkāre saṃbhāvyeta, sa tu yogajadharmasahakṛtena manasaiva janitaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3901: so 'yaṃ sannikarṣo yadā nāsti tadā teṣāmapi na sukhādikamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3905: ato na teṣāṃ sukhotpādaprasaṅga ityata āha--api ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3908: sa ca yadi kārye vivakṣitaḥ, kathaṃ na tasya kāraṇatā sukhādikaṃ prati?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3910: tasmāt caramabhāvinyeva sākṣātkāre sati kimindriyeṇetyahṛdayasyābhiprāyaḥ avaśiṣyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3919: nanvavyapadeśyavyavasāyātmakapadayoḥ saṃgrāhyaṃ vyavacchedyaṃ vā na paśyāmḥ pratyuta parasparaviruddhayoranayorekasmin pratyakṣe 'samāveśa evetyata āha--iha dvayīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3924: sā ca vyavacchittirvyāvṛttipratītirūbhābhyāṃ kriyata iti tadubhayamāha--viśeṣaṇamiti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3928: na tu sedava viśeṣaṇam, ativyāpakatayā alakṣaṇatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3934: ata eva saditi viśeṣaṇamiti cet--na, sato 'pi kasyacidupalakṣaṇatveneṣṭatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3936: tasmāt sad vā asad vā samānādhikaraṇaṃ vyavacchedakaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ viparītamupalakṣaṇamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3937: ata eva viśeṣaṇamātramudāharannopalakṣaṇam, tat kasya hotoḥ? tadeva vyādhikaraṇatayopalakṣaṇa
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3945: tairityatra kāraṇatābhramo mā bhūdityetadarthamupetadenāpūrya vyācaṣṭe--arthā hīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3948: yat punaryadātmakaṃ na bhavati na tat tatsāmānādhikaraṇyena
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3951: pratīyante cārthāḥ śabdasāmānādhikaraṇyena tasmāt tadātmāna iti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3952: nanu gavāśvādīnāṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyavyāvṛtti kimabhedavyāvṛtterūta tatpratītyorūpāyopeyabhāvavyāvṛtteriti saṃdihyata ityata āha--na ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3953: api ca yadi śabdārthayoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇye upāyopeyabhāva upādhiḥ syāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3955: na ca nivartata ityata āha--api ceti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3962: yathā ṣaḍjādyutkarṣāpakarṣavyavahāranibandhano mayūrādyutkarṣāpakarṣavyavahāra iti dṛṣṭāntārthaṃ ṣaḍjādiṣvityuktam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3966: yat punaryadātmakaṃ na bhavati na tat tadutkarṣādyanuvidhāyi, yathā gauraśvasyeti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3967: nanu yadyarthapratyayo nāmadheyotkārṣādyavidhatte tat tasyaiva tādātmyamastu,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3969: sākṣādanabhidhāne 'pi guṇaguṇyāderapi yogyatayā sapakṣatvena tadgatasāmānādhikaraṇyena virodha ubhdāvayituṃ na śakyata iti tadupekṣyānyathā śaṅkate--astīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3970: asti hi śuklabhāsvaratvādibhiḥ yuktikāgatai rajatatvasya sāmānādhikaraṇyapratyayo natu tādātmyaṃ parasparaṃ dharmiṇorityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3978: na tanniyamatastena vyapadiśyate yathā rūpavijñānaṃ raseneti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3992: tadato bāle 'pi prathamataḥ śabdamuccārayati eṣa eva krama unnīyata ityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3993: prathame pakṣe 'siddho hetuḥ aprasiddhaviśeṣaṇaśca pakṣaḥ śabdabrahmaṇa eva vājiviṣāṇāyamānatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3997: na hi bhāvanā vā tajjanitā smṛtirvā pūrvānubhūtasya sattāyām idānīmanubhūyamānasaṃbhede vā pramāṇamasti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3998: tathā sati vinaṣṭo ghaṭaḥ smaryamāṇatvāt sanneva syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3999: anubhūyamānaṃ na bhūtalaṃ ghaṭasaṃbhinnaṃ bhavedevaṃ cocchinnamaghaṭaṃ bhūtalamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4005: na hi śabdātmatāpratyayaṃ vyavahārāṅgam ācakṣmahe, kiṃ tu sambandhagrahaṇamityata āha--na ceti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4009: tadayaṃ bālo yad rūpaṃ paśyati sa eva rūpaśabda iti loṣṭalaḍḍukadṛṣṭāntamanuharatīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4010: so 'yaṃ bhedapratyayo bhrānata iti yadi śaṅkate tatrāha--na ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4011: ayamapyabhyupagamavāda eva, na hyasti bhrāntatve 'sya pramāṇam //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4014: vyutpannānāṃ punaḥ savikalpā dhiyaḥ śabdasāmānādhikaraṇyena jāyamānāḥ śabdātmakatvamarthasya vyavasthāpayantu /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4019: ayaṃ śabdo gakārādyākāro na tu sāsnādyākāra iti tātparyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4021: na tvayaṃ ḍitthaśabda iti tameva niṣedhasi ceti kimidamityata āha--autsargikaṃ hīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4023: tat kiṃ sarvatraivameva? netyata āha--kvacit punariti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4024: yatra tarhi asaṃbhadena saṃketagrahe nityādipadāni santi,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4026: svaparo 'pi yadi na syād vyarthaḥ prayogaḥ syādityata āha--yatrāpīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4027: yathā hi gaurvāhīka ityatra gotvaṃ goguṇayogalakṣakatvena vāhikopādhirna tatsamavāyāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4029: tathā hi ḍittho 'yamityatrāpi ḍitthaśabdo vācyatvopalakṣakatayā piṇḍopādhirna tu tatsamavāyāt tādātmyād veti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4030: yathā cātra vāhīke gauriti pratyayābhāvaḥ pramāṇam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4031: tathātrāpi vṛkṣaviśaiṣe ḍittho 'yamiti pratyayābhāvaḥ pramāṇamiti samudāyārthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4032: nanu śabdapuraḥsaratvaniyamād vikalpasya tadupāyatā vā tadviṣayatvaṃ vā syāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4033: tatpuraḥsaratvaniyamasyātadupāyādatadviṣayatvānniyamato vyāvṛtteḥ tatra yadyarthavikalpastacchabdavipayastadā siddhaṃ naḥ samīhitam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4035: ajñātatve nirvikalpakatvānupapattireva, tasmāt śabda upāyo bhavan jñāta eva vaktavyaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4037: tasmādarthatādātmyāt śabdasyārthasannidhānameva tatsannidhiḥ ityarthālocanameva tadālocanamityanicchatāpi svīkartavyamityata āha--yattviti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4038: na tāvat śabdaḥ pūrvaṃ niyamato bhavati vikalpasya /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4039: kiṃ nāma? vyutpannasya śabdasmaraṇapuraḥsaratvaṃ niyamavad dṛṣṭam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4041: tathā sati ghaṭābhāvajñānasyāpi ghaṭaviṣayatā syāt, tatsmaraṇapuraḥsaratvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4042: tasmād ghaṭe vikalpayitatavye anupāyo viṣayaśca ghaṭaśabdaḥ kimiti niyamataḥ smaryata ityavaśiṣyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4054: sarva eva vyavahāraḥ svārthaḥ parārtho vā vikalpasādhyo na tvālocanenāpi kaścidarthaḥ sādhayitavyo 'sti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4056: na tāvat sarvasyaivotpattimataḥ prayojanaṃ piśitacakṣuṣaḥ sākṣātkurmaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4057: na ca prayojanāpratipattimātreṇa paṭutarapratyakṣaparikalitamapi kāryaṃ nānumanyāmahe /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4059: tathāpi sphuṭaṃ savikalpakotpattirevāsya prayojanam iti sādarśiteti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4061: nāmāvacchinne vikalpe kartavye yato na viśiṣyate viśeṣeṇa na gṛhyate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4062: ato vaidharmyasya yogyapramāṇabādhitatvāt tadarthajñānaṃ tādṛgeva bhavati tatsamānajātīyameva bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4063: ato bhāṣyapaunarūktyaṃ pariharato na sādhyāviśiṣṭo heturiti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4067: tasya ca tadvyapadeśaviṣayatā tadā syāt yadi rūpatadvyapadeśayorabhedaḥ syādityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4068: anyenānyasya vyapadeśe atiprasaḍgo vyavahāravilopaśca vipralambhādityatra tannāmadheyatvādeva niyama iti sphuṭaṃ bhāṣya eva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4069: svarūpeṇaiva viṣayeṇaiva vā kimiti jñānaṃ na vyapadiśyata ityetad vivṛṇvan pariharati--arthākārameveti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4070: ātmānaṃ prati tāvat svarūpeṇaiva jñānamajñānād vyavacchidyate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4071: jñānāntarāt tu viṣayeṇāpītyetat ko nāma nābhyupaiti?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4073: ata eva tadviṣayo 'pi tat kathaṃ svarūpaviṣayābhyāṃ paro bodhyatām?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4079: na hi pramāṇavyatirekeṇa prameyamadhigantuṃ na śakyate ityetāvataiva tayorabhedaḥ syāditi tadidamuktam--anyathā aśakyatvāditi //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4085: na hi gośabde karṇajapite 'pabhraṣṭe vā aṇīyān gauḥ kṛśa upahatākṛtirvikṛto vā pratīyate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4087: nāpi sādhutvādibhedavato gośabdasya prāśastyamaprāśastyaṃ ca kiñcidasti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4092: śabdānuvyādharahitatā śabdārthānuvyādharahitatopapattirityato 'sya nirākaraṇaṃ sūcitamiti pūrvoktena na virodhaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4095: śabdo hi yatkāryo yatkāraṇaṃ yadgrāhyo yatpramāṇaṃ yadvirodhi yaddharmā yadrūpo yadviṣayaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4102: rūpa eva niyatam rūpeṇeva nirūpyate; na śabde pravartate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4112: śabdasāmānyasya vā śrotrendriyaikavedyatvāt arthasāmānyamapi śrotrendriyaikavedyaṃ bhavet /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4118: atrāpyanutpādo vināśo 'tyantābhāva iti viruddhaṃ syāditi mantavyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4120: indriyasya ca grāhyaḥ sa eva yastajjanyajñānaviṣayaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4125: tasmādaprasakte 'pyarthaśabdasya padārthamātraparatvamabhyupagamya parihāre gatyantaraṃ vārttikakṛtā darśitam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4128: indriyārthasannikarṣo hyajñāyamāna eva sattāmātravyavasthitaḥ pratyakṣe vivakṣitaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4129: anumāne tu liṅgasya jñāyamānatvameva vivakṣitam, na tu sattetyarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4130: nanvanumāne 'pi liḍgāsattaiva ki na vivakṣitetyata āha--ata eveti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4135: catra hi viṣayānapekṣaṃ jñānameva kāraṇaṃ tatra na viṣayakālānuvidhānam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4137: api ca liḍgānapekṣasya liṅgajñānasya liḍgijñānajanakatve pramāṇādīnāṃ gatidvayavādo 'pi tatra tatra na syāt //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4142: nanvindriyaviṣayeṣvityadhyāhārastarhi sūtre pūrveṣāṃ kiṃ mūlam ityata āha--imaṃ ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4143: na hyanumeyasyendriyeṇa sannikarṣāditi vadatā hyevamuktaṃ yasyendriyeṇa sannikarṣāt tajjñānamutpadyate nāsau tasya viṣayaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4144: yastu viṣayo na tasyendriyeṇa sannikarṣāt idaṃ jāyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4145: tasmādindriyārthasannikarṣādupajātaṃ vijñānaṃ yadi tadarthaviṣayameva bhavati, tadā tatpratyakṣam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4147: tasmād vārttikakṛtā eva kṛto 'yamadhyāhāra iti keścid buddham /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4152: indriyārthasannikarṣādutpannasya hi jñānasya vyabhicārasaṃbhādavyabhicārīti viśeṣaṇaṃ yadyapi nānupapannam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4155: na hi yata ityadhyāhṛtapadena karaṇamātraṃ parāmṛśyate tasyāprakṛtatvāt, kiṃ tu pramākaraṇam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4156: tathā cāyamarthaḥ, indriyārthasannikarṣotpannaṃ jñānaṃ yataḥ pramāṇād bhavati tatpratyakṣam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4157: evaṃ ca vyabhicāriṇi kaḥ prasaṅga ityata āha--yadyapīti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4158: nanvavyabhicāripadakaraṇaṃ pramāṇapadānuvartanaṃ veti kaścid viśeṣa ityata āha--anyatheti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4161: na hyuktarūpe dve pratyakṣe pūrvaṃ yasya jñānasya tadvyabhicāriṇīmapi pramāṃ janayet /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4163: tathāpyevaṃbhūtapratyakṣadvayajanite saṃskāre nirṇaye ca anumānatvaprasaṅgastadavastha eva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4164: tasmāt tannivṛttyarthaṃ pramāṇapadaṃ na kṛtaṃ cedavaśyamanuvartanīyamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4165: yadyevaṃ kimavyabhicāripadaprayojanamityata āha--tathāpīti nopayujyate na ca śakyate parasparāśrayaprasaḍgādityapi draṣṭavyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4166: tathāpi niyamo na sphuṭībhūta ityata āha--tatreti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4167: nanvanumānavadavyabhicārasiddhyā phalasiddhirna pratyakṣe yathā, tathā śabde 'pi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4172: ayaṃ ca niyamaḥ svarūpato 'pi phaladvāraiva pratyakṣamunnīyate, na tvanyatheti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4173: anumānādikaṃ tu pratītaṃ satphalāya kalpate, na tvanyatheti niyame sati syāditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4176: kāraṇamutpādakaṃ pratyāyakaṃ ca ubhayaṃ sādhayati---na hīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4178: āgamasyāpi ca vaktṛśrotṛgatatvena pratyakṣāpekṣā utpattau jñaptau ca cato 'taḥ saṃmugdhamāha--evamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4179: tathāpyayamarthaḥ kathamavyabhicāripadopādānamātrat labhyata ityata āha--na hīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4181: so 'yaṃ sūtrakārasyeha viśeṣataḥ prayatno jñāpayati yadetasminnavyabhicāriṇyanyatra vyabhicāraśaḍkaiva nāsti,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4186: nanu bhāṣyavārttikāyoḥ kā gatiḥ? na hyayamarthastataḥ pratīyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4188: sa evārthaḥ, kiṃ tu niyamyatayā, na tu vidheyatayetyāśayaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4193: na cārthena kaścidartha upadarśito yamaprāpayannartho vyabhicaret /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4203: yathā hi sthāṇuradṛśyamānastathaiva puruṣatvenāpi daśyamāna iti tātparyam //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4208: vyabhicārijātīyaḥ, atastenaivāsya vyudāso yukta ityāśayavān āha--avyabhicāripadenaiveti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4210: viparyājñānaṃ hi niścayākaram, ayaṃ tu na tathetyata āha--no khalviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4211: na hi niścayatvaṃ prayojakamatra, kiṃ tu visaṃvādaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4213: na ca prāptiyogo dvirūpasya vastunaḥ, kvacit kadācit kenacid aprāpterityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4214: na ca vācyaṃ bhrānterabhrāntipratiyogitvādaniyatasya cārthasya kvacidapi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4218: nanu sthāṇupuruṣāvubhāvapi yadyāropitau tadobhayopamardātmanā bādhakena bhavitavyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4220: yathā yuktau rajatāṃśasya mithyātve śuklabhāsvaratvādiniścayasya satyatvam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4221: tathā ca sthāṇvaṃśe niścayaḥ puruṣāṃśe tvekakoṭisanniveśavāneva vibhrama iti saṃśayo dattajalāñjaliḥ prasaktaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4224: yatra tāvadubhayoranubhayātmake pāṣāṇastambhādau samāropastatrobhayopamardātmaka eva bādhaka iti kimatra vaktavyam?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4227: yatra hi rajatatvārope 'pi śuklatvādau niścayastatrāropitānānopitayormitho virodhābhāvaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4229: yatra tu parasparaviruddhau sa saṃśaya iti sarvamavadātam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4232: san vā sa udārārtho vyākhyātṛbhiḥ kimityupekṣitaḥ?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4235: syāt tadavabodhārthaṃ, yadi tatpratyakṣaṃ syāt, na tvetadastītyarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4240: sa ca saṃyogasamavāyakāryakāraṇabhāvarūpastāvanna saṃbhavatītyāha--na hyarthe śabdāḥ santīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4246: sa hi saṃvedanadharmo grāhyākārarūpo vā syāt?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4254: etaduktaṃ bhavati saṃvedanākāro hi jñātṛtvādistatsāmānādhikaraṇyena pratīyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4256: tasmād viṣayataḥ svarūpataśca yato 'sya nābhibhalāpasaṃsargayogyatāsambhavastasmādidamarthāt sarūpakādupajāyamānaṃ jñānaṃ vikalparūpamarthamevādarśayediti prasaṅgaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4260: evaṃ cārthādupajātasyāpyaneko 'bhilāpo 'pyasya viṣayo yadi syāt ko doṣa ityata āha---na hīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4261: rūpāccakṣuṣo viṣayādupajāyamānaṃ cākṣuṣaṃ vijñānaṃ nayanāviṣayarasasahitamatad rūpamiti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4266: na cendriyavijñānaṃ śabdaḥ svatantra evākārādhāyako, vikalpakāle tadabhāvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4277: yadi hi pratibhāsamānor'thopi vikalpasya janako bhavet,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4281: nanvindriyamasya janakamastu, na hi tasyākāraniyāmakatayā kārakatvamityata āha--mānasamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4283: indriyamapi hi jñānajanakaṃ bhavadākāraniyāmakārthasannikarṣeṇaiva, na tu tannirapekṣam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4289: anyathotprekṣāvyāpāratvād vikalpasya pravartakatvamapi na nirvahedityata āha--ātmīyamiti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4290: utprekṣā asadāropaṇaṃ yato bhavatyavaśyamato 'pyevamutprekṣāmaha iti vyāhāraḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4293: puraskāro bhedāgraho vā, taddhetuka āropo vā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4296: yadi vivādādhyāsitā vikalpā arthasāmarthyalabdhajanmānaḥ, tadā na śabdakalpanānugatā ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4306: niyāmakatayā, tadatra saḍketa eva niyāmako yadi syāt ko doṣa ityāśayavānāśaṅkate--saḍketeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4310: ata eva sāmānyaṃ deśakālānugatam, tatraiva saḍketasya sukaratvāditi bhāvaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4311: kimetāvatāpītyata āha--na ca tattat dṛṣṭaṃ sākṣātkṛtaṃ kiṃ tu svalakṣaṇaṃ darśanagocaraḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4317: nanu sāmānyamapi kiṃ na darśanagocara ityata āha--na tu sāmānyamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4319: sarvaḥ puruṣārtho heyopādeyarūpastasya sāmarthyaṃ śaktiḥ, tadrahitaṃ yasmāt tat /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4324: nanu sāmānyasya tāvadarthakriyāvirahād darśanagocaratvaṃ mā bhūt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4327_1: prayojyavṛddhāśca tathāvidhārthapratipattimantaḥ śābde vyavahāre upalabhyanta ityata āha--api ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4329: na cobhayavādisaṃpratipattiviṣayaḥ pratītamauṣṇyaṃ śītāpanodanaṃ karotītyapi kadācit /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4330: akurvaddhi sarvathā apratītaṃ na kuryādāropitaṃ vā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4338: sā cāto nivarttamānā svavyāpyaṃ viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvamādāyaiva nivartate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4339: tataśca jātyādīnāṃ parasparamasambandhānna svatanatreṣu teṣu śabdo 'pi sukarasaḍketeḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4341: etena śabdasya vivekagrahasaṃbhave 'pi tadyojanā nirasto boddhavyā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4350: nanu na hyekajñānaviṣayau samānakāle 'ḍgulyau na kāryakāraṇabhūte iti niyatapūrvāparatve 'pi te sarvajñaikavijñānagocarau na tatheti yuktaṃ vaktum /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4351: yadyucyeta ko doṣaḥ? na hyupalabdhibhedābhedaprayukte kāraṇākaraṇatve /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4352: kiṃ tarhi? yadanapekṣaṃ tat kāraṇam sāpekṣaṃ ca kāryamiti, tadatrāpi samānam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4355: yattu naivaṃ na tat yathetyata āha--viśeṣaṇaṃ khalviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4363: sa cāyamekajñānagocarayorekakālayośca dvirūpo 'pi niyato nāsti yasmādityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4367: kṣaṇabhaṅgastu tvayāpyupapādanīyo mayāpibhañjanīya ityata āha--api ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4368: yadyapi tīrthikaiḥ kuṇḍādhāvaśānna badarasyaiva apatanadharmakasyotpādaḥ svīkriyate sthaimaśraddhājaḍatvāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4369: tathāpi gatinivṛttilakṣaṇāṃ gurutvapratibandhakasaṃyogalakṣaṇāṃ vā sthitiṃ taddharmabhūtā vidadhadeva badarasya kuṇḍamādhāratayā abhyupetaṃ taiḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4372: yadyapi badaravajjātyādīnāṃ dharmasya kasyacidupajanāpāyarūpamupakāraṃ nābhyupagacchatyeva paraḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4375: sannityanena hi vikalpena sattvopakārasamartho viṣayīkṛtaḥ na ca tato 'nyaḥ kaścid dravyatvādyupakārasamartho 'sattvopakārasamartho 'sti,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4377: tasmādete dravyavatvādyupakārasamarther'the sattvopakārasamarthābhedini pravartamānāstadadhikaraṇamarthamaspṛśanto 'narthakāḥ prasaktā iti samudāyārthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4378: bauddhasyātiparāmarśakuśalatāṃ codyasya cātitucchatāmālakṣyāsmākameva matilāghavaṃ saṃbhāvayiṣyatītyāśaḍkya tadgranthaṃ likhati--yadāheti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4380: yasya darśane nānopādherapyarthasya dhīḥ vikalpadhīrgrāhikā bhedino viśiṣṭasya /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4382: sarvātmanā sarvaiḥ upādhibhirekasvabhāvasyaivopakāryasya viśeṣyasya grahe sati ko bhedo bhidyata iti bhedo viśiṣyata iti yāvat /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4383: aniścitaḥ syāt? api tu sarvopādhimirviśiṣṭo niścita eva syādityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4384_0: emasyopādheḥ upakārakasvabhāve grāhye gṛhyamāṇe sati nopakārā upakārakāḥ svabhāvā
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4384_1: upādhyantarāṇāṃ tato 'pare bhinna vidyante ye tasminnekopakārakasvabhāve dṛṣṭe 'pi na dṛṣṭāḥ syuḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4385: kiṃ nāma? sa ervekasvabhāvaḥ sarveṣāmupakārakaḥ tatasadgrahe tadekopādhiviśiṣṭagrahe /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4387: nanu varaṃ vastusvabhāvavādamāsthāyānupakāryānupakārakayorapi viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvaṃ spaṣṭadṛṣṭamupapādayituṃ śaktāḥ pare /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4390: evaṃ ca tvaccharāstvayyeva nipatitā ityata āha--asmākaṃ tviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4398: tadāyattau viśeṣāviśeṣau, atra tu viparyayo viṣayasyaiva pratibhāsasattayā buddhyadhīnatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4400: tattadvadviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭatayāpi kiṃ bhinno 'bhinno vetyatra vikalpa eva sākṣī, na vicāra ityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4401: nanu paramārthasannartho mā bhūdvikalpasya viṣayaḥ, janakastu bhaviṣyatītyata āha--api ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4404: artho vikalpasya na gocaro janako 'pi netyarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4425: tathā sati tasmānna kadācit apyālocanaṃ jāyeta /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4427: sa khalu vāsanāparipāko yadi niyamādindriyārthamadhyamadhiśete kathaṃ na tadapekṣā kāryasya?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4429: sannidhisannihiteṣvapīndriyārtheṣu kadācid viśiṣṭād vāsanāparipākāt sākṣātkāravān vikalpa utpadyata /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4431: kiṃ tu nirvikalpakabhedāgrahāt tadvānivāvabhāsata iti cet--na, pramāṇābhāvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4441: tathā ca vikalpasānnidhyādaupādhiko darśanavyāpāro 'yamālocanamiti kiṃ na syāt?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4443: anāgate vikalpe kathamiva taddharmo nirvikalpake pratibhāseteti cet--na,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4450: hanta yadi sākṣātkāraḥ sākṣātkāravānutpadyate kathamasya tathātvamaupādhikam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4455: tarhi yādṛśi kārye yādṛganvayavyatirekānuvidhānaṃ dṛṣṭam, tādṛśasya tatra sahakāritvamāstheyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4465: ananugatamevānugatatayā darśayatīti cet--na, asādhāraṇasya svalakṣaṇasya vikalpenāsaṃsparśāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4467: ajanakasyaiva tu vastusato viṣayatve pratyakṣatvamarthasāmarthyasamutthatvena vyāptamiti suptapralāpaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4472: tathā ca kathamasya viparītāroparūpasya saṃvādo nāmeti cet--na,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4475: na hyanyadasādhāraṇādrūpāt samarthaṃ nāma tava darśane /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4478: nanvasāmarthyavyāvṛttimātrameva sāmarthyaṃ na tu tattvāntaram, tasya ca na sādhāraṇarūpavirodhaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4479: tathā caikātmyaprathanaṃ na viruddhamiti cet--na, avirodhe sati samāropānupapatteḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4480: na hi yad yatrāviruddhaṃ sat prathate tat tatrāropitaṃ nāma /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4483: tathā ca satyālocanamapi visaṃvādi syāt, kalpanālocanayorbhedānullekhāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4485: anarthatvaṃ hi vikalpādabhedo vikalpyasya syāt, ālocanīyād bhedo vā?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4486: na tāvat kalpanāgocarasyālīkasya kalpanayā abhedaḥ saṃbhavati, yena bhedollikhanamāropaḥ syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4490: sa khalvākāro vikalpādabhinno 'pi bhinna āropyata iti cet?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4491: yadi tāvat vijñānanayamālambyaitaducyate, tadālocanasyāpyeṣaiva gatiriti tasyāpyāroparūpatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4492: grāhyākāre 'prāmāṇyaṃ vikalpasyāpi svātmani ca saṃvedanatvādubhayorapi prāmāṇyameveti na kaścid viśeṣaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4494: tathāpi yādṛśākāro vikalpastādṛśākāra eva bāhyatayā pratibhāseta?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4496: tato yedatat sādhāraṇaṃ rūpamābhāti tanna vikalpākāramabhiniviśate
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4508: hanta, yadyayamākāro vikalpātmā tatheti pratīyeta, kathaṃ bāhyatvenāropyeta?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4515: avagataṃ na tu niścitamiti cet--na, niścayāniścayalakṣaṇaviruddhadharmasaṃsarṅgeṇa bhedāpatteḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4516: vyāvṛttyorbheda eva na tu vastunīti cet? atha keyaṃ vyāvṛttirnāma? na kiściditi cet? evamastu /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4524: evaṃ sati sarva eva saugatenaprayujyamānāḥ kālātyayāpadiṣṭatayā pratipakṣahetavaḥ padamadhyāropayitumasamarthāḥ prāgeva vikalpasyāpratyakṣatāṃ sādhayitum /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4525: tathāpīdamavaśiṣyate, yadetāvatāpi na paramārthasad viṣayasya prāmāṇyaṃ sādhitam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4527: nanu paramārthasato 'bhilāpasaṃsargayogyatā aśakyavyutpādanaiva kṣaṇikatvāt jagata ityata uktam--sthemabhājamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4528: nanu sthairyasiddhāvapi jātyādīnāṃ durūpapādatvāt kathaṃ paramārthasato 'bhilāpasaṃsargayogyatetyata uktam--jātyādimantam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4532: na hyasti saṃbhavo vikalpasyārthasāmarthyasamutthatvaṃ niścitamaniścitaṃ ca tadarthasya paramārthasattvam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4533: tathāpi paro 'pi tannirākaraṇasiddhyaiva pratyavasthito na rājājñayā nirākaraṇīyaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4536: namu santu jātyādayaḥ paramārthabhūtāstathāpi yadi te 'pi piṇḍātmabhūtāḥ kathaṃ bhedena pratibhāsaren?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4539: tathāpi śabdo bhinnātmā atadvṛttiḥ kathamavacchedakaḥ syāt, yadi tadgatastadātmā vā na pratīyeta /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4544: uktametat iti na hi tadvṛttitayaiva tatsaṃsarga iti niyamaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4545: api tu taṭasthenāpi jñāneneva jñeyasya vācakena vācyasya na viruddha ityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4546: nanu taṭastho 'pyayamavacchedako na sattāmātreṇa, api tu jñātaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4547: na tu śabdajñāne tadānīṃ śravaṇasya vyāpāraḥ, viṣayasya viprayogāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4549: tasmādyathā svpnāvasthāyāmindriyoparame 'pi pūrvasaṃskārapāṭavānmanasaivaikena avidyamānā apyarthā viṣayīkriyante,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4550: tathā aśabdavyāvṛttivikalpajanitavāsanāpaṭunā cakṣuṣaiva manasā vā śabdo 'pi viṣayīkriyata ityavidyamānaśabdālambanatvād bhrāntirevetyata āha--na ca śabdārthayoriti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4556: bāhyendriyamabhipretya, tatrāpi kiṃ nāma yojanātmake vikalpe, kiṃ vā jātyādiyojanātmake?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4560: jātyādiyojanāyāṃ tu śabdasmaraṇasyāpi nāstyupayogaḥ, prāgeva tadgrahaṇasya, tasyānavacchedakatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4561: kevalaṃ kimiti niyamataḥ smaryate śabda ityavaśiṣyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4563: tatkimidānīṃ śabdasmaraṇasya na kaścidastyupayoga ityata āha--indriyajavikalpotpādaṃ prati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4568: śabdastu na niveśayatyātmānaṃ gṛhītaḥ smṛto 'pīti śeṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4569: cakṣuṣāpi sa evāyaṃ dṛśyate, na tu pūrvahṛdayasthaḥ śabdo 'pītyarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4573: yadyapi saṃjñā hītyādi śloke sā taṭasthetyetāvadeva prakṛtopayogi,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4579: iti nyāyenātiśayaparamparotpādena pūrvāvasthāsmaraṇādisahakārimadhyamadhyāsīnaṃ yadevendriyaṃ tadeva vikalpajanakaṃ netaraditi nāsti kaścid virodhaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4580: tathāpi vikalpasya sthiraviṣayatvāt kṣaṇikatvasvīkāre nirviṣayatvamāpādyeteti nisphalaḥ prayāsaḥ syāditi manyamānaḥ sthairyamālambyaiva pariharati--na ca janakatveti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4582: syādetatsahakāritvaṃ saṃskārasyendriyaṃ prati, yadyanayorviṣayabhedo na syādityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4584: indriyasaṃskārayoḥ parasparādhipatyaṃ viṣayabhedāt kīdṛśānna bhavati kiṃ pratipattyanubandhino,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4590: nanu vyāpāranubandhitayā saṃskārasya yadi purovartī viṣayaḥ, tadā atītāvasthāsphuraṇaṃ na syādeva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4592: tasmādatītaviṣayatvāt kriyāyāḥ vyāpārānubandhitayāpi saṃskārasya sa eva viṣayaḥ, na tu purovartī /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4593: evamindriyasyāpi yadyatītāvasthasyaiva vyāpāravato viṣayaḥ, tadā purovartiviṣayasphuraṇaṃ na syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4594: tasmāt tasyāpi vyāpāravataḥ purovartyeva viṣaya iti vyāpārato 'pi kathamekaviṣayateti?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4597: na hi cakṣuṣyapi sahakāriṇi gandhajñānād gamdhajñānam, api tu rūpajñānameveti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4600: tathā sati gandhajñānād rasanādisahakāriṇo 'pi rūpajñānameva syāt, na rasādijñānam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4601: tasmāt kevalasya cakṣuṣo yadyapi rūpameva vyāpāraviṣayaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4602: tathāpi pūrvāvasthāsaṃskārasahakārimatastadvāneva purovartī vyāpāraviṣaya iti na kaścid virodhaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4603: pūrvāvasthā cakṣuṣā asannikṛṣṭā kathaṃ tadvyāpāraviṣaya iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4605: atra tatsaṃbandhameva tadvyāpāraviṣayatvaṃ syāt, saṃbandhasya tadvyāpakatvaṃ vā?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4610: atha savikalpake janayitavye pūrvāvasthāsmaraṇamevāvāntaravyāpāro na tu viṣayasambandhaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4615: ayamāśayaḥ, na tāvat sarvathaivātītāvasthā nendriyasannikṛṣṭa, saṃyuktaviśeṣaṇatāyāḥ saṃbhavāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4618: tathāpi vidyamānadharmaviṣayaiva sā vyavasthitiriti na kaścit sūtravirodha iti yadyapi rahasyam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4627: tadeva tvekamanayoḥ kuta ityāśayavān codayati--nanu pūrvāpareti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4629: yadyapi tadityullekho na sarvavikalpavyāpī, tathāpi pratisandhānajñāne tāvadasti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4633: tannirākaraṇenaiva hi jātyādyabhāve apratisandhānātmakasyāpi vikalpasya pratyākhyānamayatnasiddhamityabhisandhiḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4634: nanu viruddhadharmasaṃsargo 'pi syāt, na ca bheda ityata āha--trailokyasyaikatvaprasaḍgāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4639: nīlālambanatvamava yadi pratisandhānasya paro 'bhyupagacchet, na tasya kācidiṣṭasiddhiḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4642: tatra prathamaṃ yadi paro 'bhyupagacchedanukūlayedevāsmān tasmāt nānāvasthāviśiṣṭapāramārthikaikaviṣayatayāstyekatvaṃ parābhiprāyagocaraḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4649: kiṃ tu sannihitaviṣayamasannihitaviṣayaṃ vā yadeva liḍgādinirapekṣeṇa indriyeṇa vijñānaṃ janyate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4655: tathāpyabhyupagamavāde 'pi na kaścid virodha iti pratibandigraha iti mantavyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4656: tasmād viṣayabhedādavirodha iti tvayā samādhātavyamiti cet? nanvihāpīti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4658: nanvevaṃ sati dattaḥ svahasto bauddhānāmityata āha--sambandheti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4665: na ca kadalīkāṇḍapratyabhijñānataḥ padmarāgapratyabhijñānasya kañcid viśeṣamupalabhāmahe /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4666: nanu nānādigdeśasaṃbaddhasyāpi tava kadācidekatvamupalabhyate, tat kathaṃ tasyāpyekatvaniścayaḥ?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4667: atha nānādigdeśasaṃsargaḥ svāśrayaṃ bhedayitvā na nivartata iti niḥsvabhāvatā vāpādayet,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4672: tathā hi yadi pūrvāparakālasaṃbandho vastuni virudhyeta, vijñāne 'pi virudhyeta /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4674: evaṃ ca buddhīnāṃ niyatārthatayā pratisandhānagandho 'pi na syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4677: atītavartamānaviṣayatve 'pi naikaṃ jñānamatītaṃ vartamānaṃ ca svīkriyata iti cet?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4678: atha kimidra ca vartamānatvam sattvaṃ sadantarasaṃbandho vā?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4680: tatra sadantaranaṣṭāntarasaṃbandhaḥ pratisandhāne sarvajñavijñāne cāstyeva naṣṭānaṣṭaviṣayatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4683: sattvanaṣṭatve parasparaṃ virudhyete, te caikatra pratisandhāne na sta iti cet?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4686: sa eva tu satā kenacit saṃsṛṣṭaḥ kenacidasatā pratisandhānamiva sadasabhdyāṃ viṣayābhyāmiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4689: te yatra padmarāgādau na santi tatrautsargikamekatvameveti samaḥ samādhirityabhiprāyeṇa deśamantarbhāvyopasaṃharati--tasmāditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4690: na cānyasya saṃbandhinaḥ kālasya bhedo viruddhadharmasaṃsargaḥ anyasya padmarāgamaṇerbhedaṃ nānātvam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4694: na hi vayamapi vikalpamātraṃ prati tasya kāraṇatvaṃ brūmaḥ, kiṃ tu sākṣātkārivijñānaṃ prati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4700: aupādhikatvāt tasyeti āśaḍkya nirākaroti---na ca vikalpagata iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4704: tasmād darśanavyāpārā vikalpā indriyārthasannikarṣajanmāna iti yojanā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4710: tasmād śabdaikaviṣayatayā pravartamāno vikalpo nendriyaviśayaṃ spṛśati,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4711: tadasparśe ca na svābhāvikamasya sākṣātkāritvamityāśanayavānāśaḍkya nirākaroti---na ca śabdeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4712: ekatrārthe indriyaṃ kāraṇam anyatra tannirapekṣaḥ śabdādirityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4719: anyathā sannipātamūḍhasya svedane 'pi doṣāpagamo na syāt, uṣṇadravyānupalambhāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4720: tuhinācalaguhāmadhyavartini ca sarvajñe vaḍavānalasākṣātkāravati tuhinācalavilayaḥ syādityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4729: sa eṣa nyāyo yadi paramārthasatyapi syāt, kīdṛśo doṣaḥ?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4730: na kevalaṃ kālpanike vyavahāre tavedaṃ samarthanamapi tu pāramārthike 'pītyāha---api ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4734: tathā caikekaparamāṇuniyame sthūlapratibhāso bhrānto 'pi na syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4735: jñānasvabhāvatve 'pi ca paramāṇunāmapyekatvaprasaḍgādamūrtatvādiprasaḍgācceti sa eva doṣa ityādyuttānaṃ dūṣaṇamutsṛjya anyamāha---teṣāṃ sarvān pratīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4736: paramāṇūnāmekajñānasvabhāvatve vā na te dvitīyena viditā syurityapi draṣṭavyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4737: yadyapi tādātmyābhāve 'pi jñānajñeyayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ saṃbandho viṣayaviṣayiniyamārthaṃ bauddhena svīkṛtastathāpi kāryakāraṇabhāve 'pi ko niyanteti tulyo 'nuyogaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4739: bhāvābhāvayoḥ samavāyatadvatorviṣayaviṣayiṇośca vayamapi svabhāvenaiva parasparopahitaṃ sambandhamātiṣṭhāmahe /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4741: tathāpi sambandho 'pyanubhūyamāno vinā bādhakaṃ nopekṣituṃ yujyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4749: nanvasti vyavahāro na tu vāstavaḥ, sa ca
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4753: tvaduktameva vāsanādvāramupādāya yeti vāstava evāyaṃ vyavahāraḥ syāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4755: tathāpi vāstava evāyamityatra kiṃ pramāṇamityata āha---tathā satīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4760: manasaḥ sarvaviṣayatvaṃ na tāvad vyāpārānubandhitayā parasya vivakṣitam,
