GSP29nvtp1_1u:4762: tasmāt pratipattyanubandhitayā vā syāt, sarvavāsanādhāratayā vā? ādyaṃ dūṣayati--yadi pūrvakamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4763: asmākaṃ tu manaḥ sarvaviṣayakamapi na pratipattyanubandhitayā asarvaviṣayamapratipattirūpatvāt iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4764: na ca sakalasaṃskārādhāratayetyāha--acetanatayā na vicārakam iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4766: tvadabhipretasya ca manasaḥ sakalavāsanādhārakatvaṃ niṣetsyata ityanenābhiprāyeṇāha--tasmādātmaiveti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4774: tarhi nirvikalpakotpattikāla eva labdhasaskārasacivatayā vikalpameva janayedityata āha--sa khalviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4779: tatsahāyaśca vikalpayatīti na cakṣuṣaḥ kaścidupayoga ityata āha--cakṣuṣeti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4780: nanvevaṃbhūtā sāmagrī militāpi yadi cakṣurvyāpāravirahe na vikalpikāṃ dhiyam upajanayet,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4783: etena sākṣātkāraṃ prati tasyānvayavyātirekau sta iti darśitam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4786: tathāpi ka upakāraḥ samarthita ityata āha--teneti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4787: jñāpyajñāpakabhāva ityupalakṣaṇam, kāryakāraṇabhāvo 'pi na sarvatrāstīti draṣṭavyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4789: tadarthālocanānugataṃ smaraṇaṃ yayoste viśeṣaṇaviśeṣye tathokte tayoḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4791: yadyapi svābhāviko viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvo nopakāramapekṣata iti tatra tatra vakṣyati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4795: prathamataḥ svabhāve gṛhyamāṇe kiṃ na gṛhītam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4796: na ca svabhāvastadānīṃ na gṛhīta ityata āha--arthau hīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4797: na khalu rūpaparamāṇuṣu sparśādiparamāṇavo 'pi svabhāvataḥ sthitā ityetāvataiva pratītipathamavataranti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4798: sāmagryabhāvānna tatheti cet? sa ihāpi samāna ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4799: ata eva pramāṇaṃ kṛtsnavṛttīti matvā yadāpāditam, tadapi nāstītyata āha--teneti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4801: svābhāvikasamastasambandhābhiprāyeṇa tu sarvajñetaradhiyāmaprāmāṇyamāpādayatīti upasaṃhāraṃ sthāne saṃkalayyāhā---savikalpakaṃ tviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4809: pītaḥ śaḍkha ityādinā vyabhicāranivṛttyartham avyabhicāritve satīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4811: na caitanmantavyamiti bhāṣyamiti indriyārthasannikarṣamantareṇāpi saṃśayotpattidarśanāt atatkāraṇatayā prasaṅga evāsya nāsti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4813: yadyapi na savaḥ saṃśayaḥ indriyārthasannikarṣajastathāpi sākṣātkāravānavaśya tajjanyaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4816: mana eva kevalamindrayanirapekṣaṃ bahirvyāpriyamāṇaṃ sākṣātkārisaṃśayādi janayati, dṛṣṭo
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4827: bāhyena viśeṣyeṇāpyasannikṛṣṭaṃ manaḥ kathamiva jñānamutpādayet? utpādane
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4839: saṃvedanatve hi teṣāṃ svasaṃvedanatā śaḍkāspadamapi syāditi śeṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4840: nanvindriyasya vai sata iti vadato bhāṣyakṛto manasa indriyatvamiṣṭamevetyata āha---na ca taditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4841: manasa indriyatvābhyupagamo vātsyāyanīye gautamīyasūtra viruddha ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4843: tathāpi sūtrākārasya mana indriyaṃ yadyabhimatamindriyaprakaraṇa eva lakṣayedityata āha---tatra ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4844: indriyatvena tatprakaraṇa evābhighāne prāpte yadanyatra karoti tenādhikamasya kiñcid rūpaṃ vijñeyamiti sūcayati,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4846: darśayiṣyati hi vātikakāra ityāgāmikā phakkikā bhramanirāsārthaṃ bhūtābhūteti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4850: manastu na saguṇamindrayamityatrāpi yo viśeṣaguṇo yenendriyeṇa gṛhyate tajjātīyena guṇena saha vṛttiḥ saguṇatvam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4851: grāhyaviśeṣaguṇajātīyavirahaśca manasa iti yadyabhipretaṃ bhāṣyakṛtā tadaitadapi vaidharmyameva,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4854: tathā hi, indriyabhūtānāmeṣāṃ saguṇatvaṃ grāhyairguṇaiḥ saha saṃbandhaścakṣurādīnām /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4855: manasastvindriyamūtasyaiva na saguṇatvam, na grāhyena guṇena saha saṃbandha iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4856: tasmādatrāpi śabdadoṣaḥ, na tvabhripāyadoṣa iti mantavyam //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4862: satrākāravacanasya vivādāspadatvāt kathaṃ tenaiva nirṇaya ityata āheti pūrayati bhāṣyakāra iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4863: śābdetyanena śabdendriyasamāhārajamayamasāvaśva iti jñānaṃ vyavacchedyamabhimataṃ vārttikakṛta iti keṣāñcinmatamapanayati---na khalviti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4864: vācyatvena hi viśeṣaṇatayā gṛhītena niśeṣyaniṣṭhena bhavitvayamataḥ kevalavācyatvaprastāve 'pi tathaivodāhṛtam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4866: gṛhīte hyaśvatve tadasannikarṣe 'pi yo 'yaṃ piṇḍastvayā dṛṣṭo 'yamasāvaśva ityupadeśāt kevalādeva vācyatvapratītidarśanāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4873: tayośca ko 'tra manasā vedyata iti bhavāneva paribhāvayatu /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4875: asākṣātkāritvapakṣe ca nedam aindriyakamiti prathamapadeneva vyudastam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4877: kimarthaṃ tarhyavyavadeśyapadam, kaścāsya vārttikasyārtha ityata āha---vyavasāyātmakapadena tviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4882: sa ca tadābhāseṣu āviṣkṛteṣu bhavatītyāśayavataḥ ayamārambha ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4883: tator'thādityatra hi pañcamyā hetutvamarthasya vijñānaṃ pratidarśitam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4884: tatparaśca evakāraḥ evaṃ saṃbadhyate--sa vyapadeśakor'tho hetureva yasya na punaraheturapi tadvijñānaṃ pratyakṣamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4886: tathāpyanyayogavyavacchedo 'pi vārttikakṛtā nirākartavya iti vyākhyāyāmubhayaṃ darśitavān /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4887: yadi tata eva tabhdavati, nārthāntarādityavyapadeśakādityato na virodhaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4889: tato na tasya vyudāsaḥ kṛta ityata āha--tator'thādityatra hīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4891: tasyāśca pratiyoginyanumānādijātireva, tathā ca tasyā eva
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4896: tena vyapadeśo hi tadupādhikaṃ nirūpaṇami vivakṣitam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4897: na ca jñānaṃ kartrā karaṇena vā nirūpyate, api tu karmaṇaivetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4899: tacchabdasya pūrvaprakrānta evārthe saḍketitatvāt, tadanabhidhāne 'vācakatvaprasaḍgāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4901: sa cārtha eveti viśeṣyaḥ prāpyate, nāntarīyakatvādityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4908: indriyādayo hyavyapadeśakā api vyapadeśakādhipatyenaiva jñānajanakā ityavirodhitayā na te vyavacchedyāḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4909: liḍgādayastu vyapadeśakādhipatyanirapekṣatayā tadvirodhina iti ta evānye vyavacchettavyā ityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4912: nanu bhrāntijñānamapi na vyapadeśakam antareṇa bhavati,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4914: atasmādapītyatra yadyapi na śrūyate, tathāpi vyapadeśakādapi na bhavatīti boddhavyamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4915: tadidamuktam--yena viśeṣarūpeṇa tasya vyapadiśyate na tatastabhdavatīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4916: tasmād yattata eva bhavati tato bhavatyevetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4918: nanu vyapadeśakādanutpatterityavyapadeśakādutpatteriti vā codyamupakrābhyāśakte rajatāt notpadyata iti vākchalamātrāmityata āha--na hyatasmādāropitād rūpāditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4923: yadyavyapadeśakasyaiva, vaṇigvīthyāṃ svatantrasya rajatasya hetutvaṃ syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4928: kathaṃ punā rajataṃ vyapadeśakaṃ svātantryeṇa purovartyātmanā vā? na tāvadādyaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4930: purovartyātmanā ca pratyantare tad bhavati vyapadeśakam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4933: ayaṃ tvabhiprāyaḥ syāt, yādṛśākāreṇa vyapadeśakor'thaḥ tādṛśādutpannaṃ jñānaṃ pratyakṣamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4935: na cābhiprāyaviśuddhimātreṇa paraḥ pratipādayituṃ śakyate, pratyabhijñāsvasaṃvedanāvyāpakatvācca /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4940: vyapadeśako hyartho vartamānatayā sarvatra pratyakṣasya viṣayaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4942: tathā ca pratyakṣatve sādhye 'pratyakṣatvameva sidhyatīti bhavati viruddhatvamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4943: atha vartamāna eva vyapadeśakastadā samānakālatayā tator'thādityasiddhamāha--tatsamāneti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4944: yattu kenacit pralapitam--aparokṣajñānāvabhāsitaiva vartamānateti, tat tucchamityupekṣitavān /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4949: sa ca bhinnakālayoreva bhavatīti svabhāṣayā samarthitaṃ pareṇa /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4950: na ca vayaṃ bhinnakālayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaviśeṣam avajānīmahe;
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4951: kiṃ tvatītasya vartamānatayāvabhāsanaṃ tasya vā satyatvam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4954: anene hi na pratibhāsamānatayārtho grāhya iti vyavahniyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4957: sa ca jñānātmabhūtatayā vartamāna eveti na kaścid virodha ityata āha--anahaḍkāreti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4960: asatyaścenna pratayakṣaṃ pramāṇamiti seyamubhayataḥ pāśā rajjurityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4961: api ca bhavatvākāravedanam, bhavatu vārthasyākārārpakatvaṃ vā , tathāpi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4964: tathā hi pratibhāsamānasyaiva jñānaṃ vyapadiśyate, na tvapratibhāsamānasya /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4966: tasmād vyapadeśakona janakaḥ, janakaśca na vyapadeśaka iti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4978: yadāhuḥ--pratyakṣasiddhenākāreṇa artho 'numīyata iti phalataḥ pratyakṣor'tha iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4983: yaśca sarvathaiva jñānāgocaraḥ sa vyavahniyata iti kutaḥ?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4987: na hi kiñcid vastubhūtaṃ vācyaṃ nāma saugatānāṃ samasti,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4990: jñānasya kalpanāpoḍhasya pratyakṣatayā vyutpādyamānasya kathaṃ sarver'thā pratyakṣatayā prasajyerannityata āha--na hīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4998: manuṣyaśabdasya brāhmaṇo brāhmaṇatvādijātimattayā avācyo 'pi manuṣyatvajātimattayā vācya evetyarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5001: na tu tattacchabdasya prakṛtatayā viṣayaḥ kaścidastītyāha--buddhyeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5002: yadyapi pratyakṣajñānamapyanena lakṣaṇena svātmani pratyakṣaṃ na syādeva,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5003: tathāpīndriyārthasannikarṣajanyatvamātraṃ tāvat tatrāpyastīti kadācit paro brūyādityata āha--anumānādīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5017: nāpratyakṣaṃ pramāṇamityanena hi viśeṣaniṣedhena kaṇṭhataḥ anumānaprāmāṇyaniṣedhor'thataḥ pratyakṣaprāmāṇyavidhiśca vivakṣitaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5020: nāpi śabdopamāne, svapratyaye tayoranavakāśāt, parapratyaye 'pi dharmyasiddheḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5028: na cet parapratyāyanam, nūnamaunmattyamāviṣkaroti vakturityāha---api ceti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5033: vyāptismṛtisahāyād dvitīyaliṅgadarśanādevānumitisiddheralaṃ tṛtīyaliṅgadarśanakalpanayeti yathāśrutabhāṣyānusāriṇaḥ tān risyati na ceti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5035: yastu sahakārilābhādanyo na kaścidudbodho nāmeti manyate, taṃ pratyāha--vinaśyadavasthasyeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5039: na ca vyāptiviśiṣṭaṃ liṅgamekaikasyobhayasya vā gocaraḥ, kiṃ tu svatantramubhayamubhayasya /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5044: dvitīyaliṅgadarśanaṃ hi vasatugatyā liṅgaviṣayamityetāvataiva vyāptismṛteḥ sahakāriliṅgatvarūpollekhitayā vā?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5052: iha tādātmyatadutpattisvarūpādiniścaye pratibandhaniścayastadā na syāt yadi te eva pratibandhaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5061: tatra ca sahacārāvasāyaḥ tāvadindriyasannikarṣādhīnotpattiḥ tadutpattyaniścaye 'pi vahnidhūmayoḥ sidhyati,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5063: atīndriyāstu upādhayaḥ anyatra pramāṇaparidṛṣṭāḥ śaḍkitā api yathā nivartante, tathā vakṣyāmaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5068: tadāsmākamapi svābhāvikasaṃbandhasiddhau vipakṣe bādhakapramāṇavṛttyaiva śaḍkānivṛttiriti samaḥ samādhiḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5069: viśeṣastu svābhāvikasaṃbandhasya vyāpakatvam, avyāpakatvaṃ tu tadutpattyāderityāha--api ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5070: tadidamuktam--sa ca yo vā sa veti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5071: na ca samānopāyatvādubhayoranyatarāniścaye nānyataraniścaya iti sāmpratam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5075: tayoreva pratibandhaḥ paryavasyatīti pakṣaṃ nirācaṣṭe--api ca rasāditi //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5076: yattu bhede sati vyāpyavyāpakābhāva eva kāryakāraṇabhāva eva kāryakāraṇabhāva iti vyudapādi prajñākareṇa tat pāpādapi pāpīyaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5077: tathā hi niyāmakavirahe bhinnāyoravyabhicāraḥ śaḍkākalaḍkāḍkitatvāt duravadhāraṇa iti tāmapanetuṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvo 'nenopanītaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5078: sa ced rūpa eva kathaṃ tanniścayenaivāvyabhicāraniścayaḥ?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5079: na caitat kīrteranumataṃ yad rasena rūpānumāne 'nyathābhyupāyamāha--yadi ca sarvalokasiddhamativāhya svayaṅkṛtalakṣaṇairvyavahāraḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5083: tadātmano 'pi etadastīti cet? astu śiśapāpi vṛkṣakāryam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5086: asiddhaṃ siddhena sādhyate, natu tadeva siddhamasiddhaṃ ceti cet?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5094: api ca rasarūpayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaniścayo vahnidhūmayoriva pratyakṣānupalambhasādhyo vā syāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5098: na hi vahneriva rūpasya pūrvakālatāniyamaṃ dhūmasyeva rasasya praścādbhāvitāniyamaṃ laukikāḥ pratipadyante /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5099: kṣaṇabhaṅgasiddhinyāyastu na laukika iti vastuto laukikānāṃ rasato rūpānumānaṃ na syādityāha---laukikānāṃ cedamiti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5100: api ca ityanena te eva pratibandha iti nirastam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5101: tādātmyaṃ tu gamyagamakabhāve pratyuta viruddhamityāha--api ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5105: bhavatvabhede 'pi gamyagamakabhāvaḥ, tathāpi na śiśapātvena vṛkṣatvānumānamanavasaradusthātvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5106: na hyasti saṃbhavaḥ sāmānyamaniścitaṃ niścitastu viśeṣa ityāśaḍkya kenacit samarthitam utthāpya dūṣayati---yatviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5107: bhinnayoreva vyāvṛttyorgamyagamakabhāvaḥ kiṃ tvabhinnādhyavaseyasaṃbandhāt tayorapi tādātmyaṃ vyavahniyata iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5108: sa yadyabhinnadevadattasaṃbandhāt, chatrakuṇḍalayorapyabhedaṃ vyavaharati ko vārayitā?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5115: tau hi na tāvannirnimittau sārvatrikatvaprasaḍgāt, niyataviṣayau copalabhyete /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5122: tathāpi yatra sphuṭo vyabhicārastatra niṣphalamupādhyanusaraṇaṃ tadarthatvāt tasya /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5127: yato na svābhāviko na nirūpādhikaḥ, tato na niyato nāvyabhicārītyarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5128: atha dhūmādīnāmapi vahnyādibhiḥ kathaṃ svābhāvika ityata āha---svābhāvikastviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5131: tat kimatra nāsau sphuṭa ityata āha---kvacidvyabhicārasyādarśanāditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5132: nanu kvacit kadācid vyabhicāro 'pi syādayogyatvācca na dṛśyetāpītyata āha---anupalabhyamānasyāpi kalpanānupatteḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5136: sa eva tūpādhyabhāvaḥ kutastya ityāśaṅkate---na ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5139: anyathā sarvaiḥ pramāṇaiḥ sarvadā sarvatra sarveṣāṃ jātyā kaścit anupalabhyamāno 'pi syādupādhiriti śaḍkā tadutpattāvapi brahmaṇāpyapanetumaśakyā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5140: nānāpramāṇagocarārthasākṣātkāravataḥ sarvajñasyāpi svabhāvata evānupalabhyaḥ kaścidartho bhavet,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5147: yatra pramāṇāni paribhūya śaḍkāpiśācī prasarati kutastatrārthasaṃbhāvanāpi?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5150: yadyapi viśiṣṭāhārānantaraṃ bhūyo bhūyaḥ puṣṭidhātusāmyādi daśyate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5152: tathāpi āhāraviśeṣo maraṇasyaiva hetuḥ kadācid bhavet,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5157: rogādikameva ca puṣṭyādihetuḥ, tattu puṣṭyādikāle adṛśyatvādeva nāpalabhyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5158: na hi puṣṭyādikāraṇairdṛśyaireva bhavitavyamityapi kadācit syāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5167: sādhane sopādhiḥ sādhye nirūpādhireva upādhitvena niśceyaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5182: sā ca na kvacidupādhiḥ, dhūmasya vahnineva tayāpi svabhāvasaṃbandhāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5184: na ca kṛtakatvānuṣṇatvayoḥ saṃbandhe tejojātīyetaratvavadihāpi sādhyadharmajātīyetaratvamupādhiḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5186: ata eva upādhimapaśyanto 'pi virodhipramāṇasadasadbhāvaniścayavyagratayā muhūrtam anumitau vilambāmahe /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5187: tadevaṃ sarvathopādhyanupalambhāt tadabhāvaniścayo yathā dhūmasaṃbandhe tathānyatrāpi draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5190: na tu svabhāvāvalambanenaiva vastuvyavasthetyāśayavān pṛcchati---kena punariti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5192: dvitīyādibhistu śaḍkāmātramapanīyata iti keṣāñcinmatamapanayanneva prakṛtaṃ prapañcayati---yadā tāvaditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5194: yo 'yamupādhimādāya yena saha saṃbadhyate sa nirūpādhyavasthāyāṃ tasyāgamako yathā vahnirdhūmasya /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5195: sopādhyavasthāyāmapyupādheḥ, kevalasyaiva sāmarthye sa eva gamako na tūpahitaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5197: yatra tūpādhiḥ kevalo vyabhicārī tatra sopādhirapi gamaka eva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5199: tat kasya hetoḥ? viśiṣṭasya nirūpādhitvāditi bhūyodarśanamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5205: te te sūkṣmā viśeṣāḥ parīkṣakairbhūyobhirdarśanairūnnīyante, tathātrāpīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5210: atra ca na vāraṃsakhyāniyame 'bhyupayogaḥ, mṛdumadhyādhimātrabuddhibhedena puṃsāṃ vicitraśaktitvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5214: anyato 'nāgatasya tatrāsatastadanantaram upalambhe 'pi tato 'nyasmādanutpatteḥ bhāvamātreṇa niścetumaśakyatvāt ;
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5220: dhūmādīnāṃ maitratanayatvādīnāṃ ca bhūyodarśanatvāviśeṣe 'pi kuto viśeṣādekasya gamakatvamaparasya natyata āha---na ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5222: yathā hyanārdendhane vahnau na dhūma iti vahnestatsaṃbandhe tathāvidhamindhanamupādhiḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5223: tathā yadi maitrājjātasyāpi kasyacid vivakṣitāhārapariṇativiraheṇa śyāmatopālapsyata sa
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5226: tathā satyapi copādhivādo vyarthaḥ, vyabhicārādeva maitratanayasyāhetutvāditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5228: tathā hi nopahitasya niścita eva sādhyavyabhicāraḥ, upādherlakṣaṇaṃ kiṃ nāma?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5232: iyāṃstu viśeṣaḥ, vahnerdhūmenevārdrendhanenāpi sākṣādeva vinābhāva upalabhyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5234: nanu vajre lohalekhyatvaṃ prati pārthivatvahetoḥ ka upādhiḥ? praśithilāvayavatvam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5236: na khalu nibiḍāvayavatvena ubhayoḥ kaścid viśeṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5238: na hyadbhyo medinī nibiḍeti na praśithilāvayavā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5240: yathā yathā śaithilyāpakarṣastathā tathā lekhituḥ prayatnaprakarṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5241: yadi tu śaithilyamaprayojakaṃ tadā mṛtkāṣṭhapāṣāṇādiṣu prayatnaprakarṣo 'pi viphalaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5249: sa ca bādhaikaniyataviṣaya iti nātiprasaṅga ityuktam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5251: yadyapi dvitīyaliṅgadarśanasya smṛtyā saha vinaśyadavasthasyaiva parāmarśajanakatvaṃ kvacit,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5252: tathāpi yatra dṛṣṭamātra eva vahninivṛttau nivṛtto dhūmaḥ kālāntare jijñāsāvaśāt parāmṛśyate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5254: yena ca parāmarśo neṣyate tena vākyasya caturtho 'vayava apanayo 'pi neṣitavyaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5256: svārthānumāne tu sā dvitīyaliṅga darśanādevāvagateti kiṃ parāmarśeneti cet---na,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5263: tataḥ svārthānumāne yadyasti tasyopayogaḥ, nūnaṃ parāmarśo 'pi tṛtīyaḥ svīkartavyaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5267: nanu vyāpārānubandhitayā viṣayatvam, viṣayatve ca vyāpārānubandha iti parasparāśrayatvam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5269: tathāpyasaṃbaddhatvāviśeṣāt kathaṃ tasyaiva vyāpārānubandhitetyāśaḍkya pariharati--na cātiprasaṅga iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5270: na dhūmajñānasyāgniḥ svatantrasya vyāpāraviṣayo yenāsaṃbaddhatvāviśeṣādatiprasaṅgaḥ syāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5272: tasya ca jñāyamānasya dhūmasyāgninā saha niyāmakaḥ svabhāvasaṃbandha eva,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5274: pūrvaṃ lakṣyapadārthapraśnāvasare anumīyate 'neneti kāraṇārtha ityuttaraṃ dattam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5275: idānīmanumitiḥ kasyāñcidavasthāyāmanumānaṃ pramāṇaṃ bhavena veti vijñāsāpraśne bhāvaḥ karaṇaṃ vetyuttaram /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5277: ataḥ ṭīkākṛd api vyāpāratvenāpramāṇyaṃ pūrvapakṣayitvā phalāntarahetutvena prāmāṇyaṃ samarthayati sma /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5281: pramāṇādhikāra'pi phalataḥ sa evārthaḥ, tatpūrvakaṃ pramākaraṇamanumānamiti sūtrasaṃbandhāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5282: tathāpi vivakṣābhedāt vikalpenobhayamubhayatra saṃbhantsyata iti vivakṣitvā ekaikakaniṣṭhatayaikaikaṃ darśitamiti tathaiva vyākhyātavān /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5284: vipakṣāvṛttiriti vārttike bahuvrīhisamāsasthito viśeṣaṇatayā vyatireko niṣkṛṣya svapradhānatayā tatpuruṣapadena pradarśito vipakṣāvṛttirvyatireka iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5291: mūḍhapraśnānurodhād vā dharmāntaraṃ prati pūrvavadeva svavacanavirodhabhayād veti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5298: na tvekena satā niṣedhyena niṣedhādhikaraṇena vetyarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5299: nanu sata eva kutaścit pramāṇapratītānnivartsyatītyata āha---pakṣādanyasyeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5300: tadanenāsatyadhikaraṇe nivṛttinirūpaṇaṃ pratiṣiddham, nivṛttau tu mūkataivociteti hṛdayam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5304: yatra khalu bhāvaḥ sarvathaiva na nirūpitaḥ tadadhikaraṇatayā
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5305: tasyānyatropalabdhasyābhāvo nirūpyata iti dṛṣṭam, yathā gavi dṛṣṭasya śruṅgasya śaśe /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5306: yatra tu śṛḍgābhāvo 'pi gaganakamalādau nirūpayituṃ na śakyate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5316: yadyapi svavacanavirodhabhiyāpi sarvathāvicārāsahor'thaḥ svīkartuṃ na śakyate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5318: anyathā vikalpaśabdau na vastugocarāviti svavacanavirodhādeva parihartavyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5320: śabdasya ca samayādhīnapravṛttikatayā vikalpasya ca tadekaviṣayatayā
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5327: tathāpi tattvaṃ nirūpayan pariharati---na vai tattvata iti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5328: nanu yadi naikataraniṣedho vidhirvā tat kimubhayavidhiḥ niṣedho vā?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5329: tathā sati atitarā durghaṭamāpadyetetyata āha---no khalviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5331: anyathā punarapi svavacanapratirodha ityata āha---upayoge veti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5335: no khalu sakalavyavahārābhājanaṃ ca tanniṣedhavyavahārabhājanaṃ ceti vacanaṃ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5338: hanta ! sakalavidhiniṣedhavyavahārābhājanatvena kiñcid vyavahniyate na vā?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5343: vyavahniyata iti pakṣe tu viṣayasvarūpaparyālocanenaiva virodhāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5344: na hi sarvavyavahārābhājanaṃ ca vyavahniyate ceti ca //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5345: api ca yadyavastuno niṣedhavyavahāragocaratvam, vidhivyavahāraviṣayatāpi kiṃ na syāt?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5350: na hi bandhyāyāḥ suto na sutaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5352: vacanamātrametanna tu paramārthataḥ suta evāsāviti cet? acetanasyāpyevaṃrūpatvāt, cetanādanyat
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5356: asutatvanivṛttimātrasya svarūpataḥ kṛtijñaptyorasāmarthye samarthamarthāntaramavaseyam anantarbhāvya kuto hetutvamiti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5358: vyāvṛttirūpamapi ca tadeva gamakaṃ yadatasmādeva, yathā śiṃśapātvam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5359: bandhyāsutastvasutādiva ghaṭādeḥ, sutādapi devadattādeḥ vyāvartate, ato na heturiti cet?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5361: na hi bandhyāsutaścetanādiva devadattāderacetanādapi kāṣṭhāderna vyāvartate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5363: vaktṛtvaṃ vastvekaniyato dharmaḥ sa kathamavastuni sādhyo virodhāditi cet?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5364: sa punarayaṃ virodhaḥ kutaḥ pramāṇāt siddhaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5370: na hyavaktṛtvamapi vastuviviktaṃ kasyacit pramāṇasya viṣayaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5373: nanu vaktṛtvaṃ vacanaṃ prati kartṛtvam, tat kathamavastuni, tasya sāmārthyavirahalakṣaṇatvāditi cet?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5375: sarvasāmarthyavirahe vacanasāmarthyaviraho na viruddha iti cet?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5376: atha sarvasāmarthyaviraho bandhyāsutasya kutaḥ pramāṇāt siddhaḥ?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5380: soyaṃ kevalairvacanairitastato nirdhanādhamarṇika iva sādhūn bhrāmayan parasparāśrayadoṣamapi na paśyati //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5385: tataśca pramāṇameva sīmā vyavahāraniyamasya, tadatikrame tvaniyama evetyanenābhiprāyeṇedamuktam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5388: yasmin kiñcinniṣidhyate pramāṇena, tasmin kiñcid vidhīra'pīti niyamādityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5394: na hyapratīte devadattādau sa kiṃ gaurakṛṣṇo veti vaiyātyaṃ vinā praśnaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5395: tatrāpi yadyeko 'pratītaparamārthaviṣaya evottaraṃ dadāti na gaura iti,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5396: aparo 'pi kiṃ na dadyād gaura iti?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5397: na caivaṃ sati kācidarthasiddhiḥ, pramāṇābhāvavirodhayorūbhayatrāpi tulyatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5399: nanvapratīte vyahārābhāva iti yuktam, kūrmaromādayastu pratīyanta eva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5401: na ca pramāṇāspadameva vyavahārāspadamityasti niyama ityata āha---na cātyanteti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5402: yadyapi sarvathāpratīte vyavahārābhāva iti vadato bauddhasyāpi svavacanavirodha eva,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5403: tathāpyayaṃ virodhaḥ prāgevodbhāvitaprāya ityenamupekṣya śaḍkāmātraṃ samarthitam //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5405: na tāvadādyaste rocate, tathā sati kiñcidāropyaṃ kiñcidāropaviṣaya iti syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5411: sa hi saḍketo vā syāt, śabdasvābhāvyaṃ vā? na tāvadādyaḥ, saḍketaviṣayāpratīternirākṛtatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5414: tathā cānanvitāḥ padārthā evānvitatayā parisphurantīti viparītakhyātirevāvartate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5427: svasantatimātrādhīnatve tu bāhyavādavyāghātaḥ, nīlādibuddhīnāmapi vāsanāparipākādeva utpādāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5430: sa vicāryamāṇaḥ pūrvaṃ nyāyaṃ nātivartata iti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5433: na cārthakriyāviśeṣo 'pyasti yato viṣayaviśeṣamunnīya tatra saḍketo gṛhyatām /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5438: tadviṣayo 'sya vācya iti sugrahaḥ samaya iti vācyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5441: na ca viśeṣāntaravinākṛtaḥ kalpanāmātraviṣayo 'sya vācya iti sāmpratam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5443: na ca sarve pratipattāraḥ svavāsanayā asadarthaśabdasambandhapratipattibhāja iti sāmpratam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5445: na hi svayaṅkṛtaṃ saḍketamagrāhayitvā paro vyavahārayituṃ śakyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5447: na ca gāṃ badhānetivat śaśaviṣāṇāpadārthe vṛddhavyavahāraḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5449: na ca yathā gaustathā gavaya iti vadupalakṣaṇātideśaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5450: na ceha prabhinnakamalodare madhūni madhukaraḥ pibatītivat prasiddhapadasāmānādhikaraṇyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5456: yadyato vyatiricyate tasya tatrābhāvo vā, tadabhāvasvabhāvatvaṃ vā?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5457: tatra na tāvat kramayaugapadyayoḥ śaśaviṣāṇe 'bhāvaḥ pramāṇagocaraḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5465: etāvataiva tadabhāvo 'pi ghaṭavirahasvabhāvaḥ siddha iti cet---na,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5467: na cānyasya svabhāve pramāṇagocare tadanyo 'pi siddhaḥ syāt, atiprasaḍgāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5468: evaṃbhūtāveva ghaṭatadabhāvau yadekasya paricchittirevāparasya vyavasthitiriti cet---na,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5471: na tu svabhāvavādālambanenaiva vastuparicchittiriti hi bhavatāmeva tatra tatra jayadundubhiḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5477: tat kimidānīṃ svābhāvavirahasvabhāvo ghaṭaḥ pramāṇānaiva siddhaḥ? tava dṛṣṭyā evametat /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5478: ghaṭo hi yādṛktādṛksvabhāvastāvat pramāṇapathamavatīrṇaḥ tasya yadi paramārthataḥ abhāvo 'pi kaścit syāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5479: paramārthataḥ so 'pi tadvirahasvabhāva iti tathaiva pramāṇāveditaḥ syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5482: aprāmāṇikatve vā anayorapi na tathābhāva iti śaśaviṣāṇādiṣvapīyameva gatiḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5484: dahanavattvādisādhane prameyatvādau śabdānityatvādisādhane cākṣuṣatvādau nityatvādisādhane kṛtakatvādāvityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5486: tatra ye kalpanopanītāḥ, tatra kālpanikā eva
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5491: sā ca na siddheti kutastasya hetutvam?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5492: evaṃ prāmāṇikāt śabde 'pi pakṣīkṛte prāmāṇika eva hetusadbhāvo /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5493: vaktavyaḥ na cāsau cākṣuṣatvasyāstīti so 'pi kathaṃ hetuḥ?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5494: evaṃ kṛtakatvasyāpi vastvekaniyatasya dharmasya vāstava evānvayo vaktavyaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5495: vastuno vipakṣācca vāstava eva vyatireko vaktavyaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5499: na hi niyāmakamantareṇa saṃpadaṃ prati kalpanā tvarate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5500: vipadaṃ prati tu vilambata iti śakyaṃ vaktum /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5501: tathā ca niragnikamapi kūrmaroma sadhūmamiti kalpanāmātreṇa vipakṣavṛttitvād dhūmo nāgni gamayet /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5503: tarhi vāstavyāmasaṃpattau kiṃ kālpanikyā tayeti samānam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5508: dhūmo vastubhūto yena kūrmaromṇastena saha virodhaḥ syāt?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5509: kvacid vastubhūta iti cet? nirdhūmatvamapi kvacid vastubhūtamiti tenāpi virodha eva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5511: tathā kālpanikī saṃpattirapi na guṇāyeti tasyāśca sarvatra sulabhatvāditi ṭīkārthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5512: etaccābhyupetyoktam---vastutastu na na nirūpākhyaṃ kasyacid vyavahārasya bhājanamiti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5515: yatra vacane sarvathaiva virodhasatatrāvacanameva śreya ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5518: gamakatve vā vyatirekavikalavad rūpāntaravikalamapi tathā kiṃ na syādaviśeṣādityāśaḍkyāha---na caitāvateti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5520: evaṃ tarhi satyapi vipakṣe vyatireko na paryeṣaṇīya ityata āha---vipakṣasambhave tviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5521: vipakṣe sati tatra vṛttiśaḍkā, tatastannivṛttyarthaṃ tadupayogaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5522: vipakṣābhāve tu śaḍkaiva nāsti, yathoktaṃ prāk /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5523: na hi tāyābhyavaharaṇe 'pyasamarthasya mumūrṣoḥ śaṣkulībhakṣaṇaṃ śaṅkate cetana ityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5525: asya tu kālpaniko 'pi vipakṣaḥ pareṇābhidhātuṃ na śakyate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5528: tasya kiṃ vipakṣe vṛttiravṛttirveti praśne anenottarakovidena kiṃ vaktavyam?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5529: mūkībhūya tiṣṭhāsostu na kaścit pratimalla iti svayamevollapitamanena /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5531: arūcimātrasya sarvatra sulabhatvāditi bhāgāsiddhinirākāraṇāya vyāptyeti vadataḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5534: tadidam uktaṃ ṭīkākṛtā---asti gandhavatvasya sādhyaṃ na tu vyāptyeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5535: nanu sādhyasajātīye śeṣaśabdasya na kācid vṛttirityata āha---sādhyasyopayuktatvāditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5541: yogyadarśananivṛttyā ca dṛśyanivṛttirvivakṣitā, tena vipakṣe asadityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5547: kiṃ lakṣaṇam iti jijñāsāyāṃ pūrvavadityādyekavākyatayā vyākhyānena parāmarśaviṣayaḥ saṃjñito vibhakto lakṣitaśca /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5567: śeṣavallakṣaṇayoge 'pi tadudāharaṇāntaravailakṣaṇyenedameva sāmānyatodṛṣṭapadārthe bhaviṣyatītyata āhā---na caitāvateti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5568: na tāvadaśvakarṇādiśabdavadayaṃ sūryavrajyānumāne vartate, anyatrāpi vṛddhaprayogāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5576: prāḍmukhopalabhyatve cetyasya ṭīkayā sphoritasya prāḍmukhopalabdhasya prāḍmukhenānupalambhe satītyarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5578: anyathā mārtaṇḍamaṇḍalasyāpi lokāntaravartipuruṣāpekṣayā prāḍmukhopalabhyatā durvāretyasiddhaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5581: na hi yathātathā pādavihāraṇamātramasya hetoḥ kṣatimāvahatīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5582: satyavināśe iti ca draṣṭavyam sati draṣṭavyatva iti veti śeṣaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5583: iha yadyapi diśaḥ pratyakṣatve sādhye 'ḍgulyā nirdeśo vyadhikaraṇaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5586_0: tathāpi yasyāṃ diśi ete taravaḥ sā prācīti tarvādibhedena apyaḍgulyā vyapadeśo 'stīti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5586_1: na vyadhikaraṇatvamāhatyābhidhātuṃ śakyata ityanenābhiprāyeṇa anyathāsiddhimeva vārtikārthamāha---anyathāsiddhatayeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5588: calantīṃ patākāmupalabhyāyaṃ vāyurvātīti aḍagulīnirdeśasyācākṣuṣe vāyāvapi gatatvena vyabhicārasya api saṃbhavāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5589: rūpeṇa sparśānumānamityādāvādigrahaṇena rasena rūpānumānam, gandhena rasānumānamityādi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5590: vṛkṣādarśane sandehe vā na śiśapādarśana niścayo vā tato 'navasaraparāhatamevānumānam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5598: tathā sati śiśapātvādayaṃ vṛkṣo vyavahartavyaḥ iti śiśapātvameva vṛkṣaśabdapravṛttinimittamākalayet /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5604: tadanena ye cānye sādhyasamānakālāḥ, te sarve sāmānyatodṛṣṭānumānasaṃgrāhyatvena upalakṣitā iti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5610: sāmānyena kāryaṃ vā kāraṇaṃ vā anubhayātmakaṃ vā avinābhāvitayā dṛṣṭaṃ niścitaṃ sāmānyatodṛṣṭameva ca yojanā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5615: yadyapi pratipannaṃ pratyanumānasya na saṃśayaviparyayanivṛttirajñātajñānaṃ vopayogaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5617: tenādivākye pratipannaḥ pratipādayiteti pratipanna eva pratipādayitā,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5626: na hi saṃtatamūrdhvagamanamātreṇāgniranumātuṃ śakyate, dhūlīpaṭalādau vyabhicārāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5632: kāryatvaṃ punarasyānupalabdhikāraṇabhāve sati anupalabdhasyopalabhyamānatvād vā pratyakṣād veti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5637: tathāpi bhāṣyakārīyo heturūpekṣitaḥ syādityato 'vyāpakatāmātraṃ prasādhyaiva prakṛte lagayati---karṇeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5645: sa evābhiprāyeṇa vyāpyate, yena vinā pratijñātor'tho nopapadyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5649: kṣityādikaṃ sakartṛkaṃ kāryatvādityatra sarvajñatvamantareṇa kṣityādīnāṃ kartṛtvameva nopapadyate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5655: na hīcchādīnāṃ kṣityādipāratantryamasaṃbhāvit, api tu mānasapratyakṣavedyatvādibhaḥ bādhitam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5660: etaduttarakālaṃ kṣityādau bādhite tadanyāsiddhau vidhāyakapramāṇābhāvānniṣedhamukhena vyatirekī pravartate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5661: tamimaṃ viśeṣaṃ hṛdi nidhāyoktam---bādhakairapanīte dravyāṣṭakaguṇatva iti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5662: nanu sāmānyatodṛṣṭād yadrūpaṃ siddham, na tat kevalavyatirekiṇā sādhyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5669: na hi vākyārthasayāpūrvatayā padārthānāṃ viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvo vihanyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5671: na ca dravyāṣṭakātiriktādipadārthā evāpūrve, yenāprasiddhaviśeṣaṇatā syāt pakṣasya /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5682: athavā pratyekotthitaḥ saṃśayaḥ samudāye viśrāmyatīti nyāyaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5687: uta tadatiriktāśritā ityanenākāreṇa sarvadravyeṣu bhavan sandehaḥ samānadharmadarśanādeva dravyāṣṭakatadatiriktakoṭyoreva paryavasito bhavati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5691: tadiha vartamānāvartamānārthatvavyākhyānaṃ tadviruddhamapi kuta upādīya ityata āha---pratyakṣaṃ hīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5692: atha tathaiva kiṃ na syādityata āha---yadyapīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5694: āho nyāyopyastītyasyākṣarārthena naḥ saṃbandhānupapatteḥ, tātparyārthenasaṃbandhamāha---na sandeha
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5696: nyāyābhāvena hi tarkasya niścayāparyāptau sandehastadavastha ityāśaḍkitam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5698: astyeva nyāyaḥ, sandehavirodhiniścayasamartho yata iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5700: athopādānatvam, na tatsādhye samavāya ityata āha---nimittatvaṃ kāraṇatvamiti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5706: deśasyāvacchedakatāmātreṇa saptamyā nirdeśo vane sihanāda itivat /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5708: na hyātmādayaḥ sarvatropalabhyante ityata uktam---satyupalabdhikāraṇa iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5709: tathāpi viṣayasyāpyupalabdhikāraṇatvād yatra yatra ghaṭādiparamāṇvantāḥ svopalabdhisāmagrīsahitāḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5710: tatra tatropalabhyanta eveti taireva vyabhicāra ityata uktam---antareti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5718: yadyapi ca sarvatrāstitvaṃ vyāpakatvam, tathāpi lakṣaṇamantareṇa tad duravabodhamiti tadevoktamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5720: kartrā avyāpāryamāṇasya karaṇasya svayaṃ vyāpārāyogādityāśayavāniti bhāvaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5723: na syāt? na hi kāryasyānādhāratvamasyeṣṭamevetyata āha---syādetaditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5725: na hyutpanno 'pyasaṃyukta eva turyā prathamekṣaṇe paṭa iti kasyacinniścayaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5727: tathotpanne 'pi prathame kṣaṇe tantuṣvasamaveta eveṣyata iti pādau prasārya tiṣṭhato nedamuttaramityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5731: anavasthābhiyā avaśyamantataḥ kācit prāptiśca na ca vṛttimatīti svīkartavyam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5734: anāditāyāṃ hyaḍkurotpādānuguṇasamayasaṃbhavinā bījena janite 'ḍkureṇa janite bīje vartamānaṃ bījatvaṃ tasyāḍkurapūrvakatāmavagamayatīti yujyate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5736: idaṃprathamatāyāṃ tu kāryotpādānuguṇasamaye bhaviṣyatpravāhasyāsattvāt prathamasyānutpāde tadāśrayasya hetostasminnasatyāśrayāsiddhatayā sarvasyāgamakatve pramāṇābhāva ityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5738: kāryamakṛtakasaṃbandhavaditi pratijñāyāṃ ghaṭāderbhūtalādināpyakṛtaka eva saṃbandhaḥ syāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5741: kāryamiti ca samavetamātropalakṣaṇaparam, anyathā jātyādiṣu vipakṣeṣu saṃbhave hetorvirodhaḥ syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5759: nanu vidhīyamānaniṣidhyamānavyatirekeṇa jagati na svatantro nāma /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5763: tatra ye vartamānāḥ, teṣāṃ kaścit paratantro vṛttimānityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5765: pratiṣidhyamānāstu paratantrā na santi, asattvādeva iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5766: tadevaṃ vidhīyamānaḥ svatantro vidhīyamānaḥ paratantraḥ pratiṣidhyamānaḥ svatantraśceti tisro vidhā ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5782: asattayā sattayā vānabhyupagamāditi sattāyā jāyamānatayā virodhāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5784: kathaṃ nābhyupagamyate na hi sattāsattābhyāmanyaḥ prakāro 'stītyata āha---niṣedhaviṣayatayā tviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5787: tasmāt jāyamāne ghaṭe na vidhāyakapratyakṣapravṛttiḥ, virodhāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5788: niṣedhakaṃ taṃ pratyakṣaṃ pravartamānamapi tanniṣedhameva gocarayet, na tu niṣedhyaṃ ghaṭam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5795: nanu kenaitaduktam, yadubhayapadavyabhicāra eva viśeṣaṇasamāso bhavatītyata āha---viśeṣaṇamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5796: nanu tathāpyubhayorapi pṛthivīdravyaśabdayorūbhayavācitvāt kathaṃ viśeṣapratipattirityata āha---na ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5798: pṛthivītvaṃ dravyam, dravyatvaṃ ca pṛthivītyapi na bhavatītyapi draṣṭavyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5799: na ca nāntarīyakārthaśabdayorapīyameva gatirastviti vācyam, aniyamaprasaḍgāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5804: nanu aniyataprasareṇāsati nāstīti sahiteneṣṭalābho yadyapi tathāpi sarvathā sapakṣāvṛttirasādhāraṇo 'pi nivartayitavyaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5805: na hi pakṣavyāpako vipakṣe ca nāstyevaitāvataiva tasya nirākaraṇam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5811: prathame pade saṃbhavasya vidheyatvena ivāsaṃbhavasya niṣedhyatvenānupādānāditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5815: uditaṃ hyanūdyate, natvanuditam na cobhayatvaviśiṣṭaṃ havirūditam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5818: ubhayatvavivakṣāyāṃ tu nāyamanuvādaḥ, kiṃ tu vāda eva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5826: vivakṣite tasminnanenaiva vākyena viśiṣṭo vādaḥ kartavyaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5830: athārtirapi kathaṃ haviṣā viśeṣyata ityata āha---atra hi yadyapīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5840: tenedaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati, ekamanekaṃ vā haviryasyārtimārcchedityādi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5841: ubhayatvavivakṣāpakṣe tu naikaikahavirārtau prāyaścittavidhiḥ syāditi doṣaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5850: atra naiyāyikasamādhānamāśaḍkya bauddhaḥ svabhāṣayā nirākaroti---na ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5851: yadyapi tattulya evetyanyayogavyavacchedasya vipakṣamātraviṣayatvaṃ tadā syād yadi viṣayāntarasaṃkocaḥ syāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5853: anyathobhayorapi tattulyānyatvāviśeṣe vipakṣayogasya vyavacchedo na tvanumeyayogasyeti kutaḥ?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5856: yasmāt tadekavākyatāyāmeva satyāṃ vipakṣamātraviṣayatvamasya vaktuṃ śakyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5858: tathāpi bauddhanaye śābddhaṃ vyavahāramāśritya samuccaya eva na nirvahet,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5874: nityasyānekāśrayatve jātitvaprasaḍgāt ekāśrayatve tasya nāśe anāśrayasyāvasthānānupapatteḥ nityatve pramāṇābhāvaprasaḍgācca /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5877: idaṃ tu na tatheti kathaṃ nityamiti jñātavyam?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5882: anityasya tvanekāśrayatve guṇavato dravyatvaprasaḍgāt ; nirguṇatve guṇatvaprasaḍgāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5885: guṇeṣu ca karmasu ca sādṛśyavyavahāro na syāt, teṣāṃ samavāyikāraṇatvābhāvenānityadharmāyogāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5892: tathāpi karaṇavyutpattyā sādhanapadavyākhyānasya parityāge na kācidupapattirdarśitā,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5895: pratyakṣāt sādṛśyāt prajānan tena prajñāpyata iti vadan sādṛśyasyaiva prajñāyamānasya kāraṇatvamabhipraiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5896: tathā ca tena saha sādhyasādhanapadasya vyadhikaraṇatvādanyasya ca karaṇasyābhāvāt sādhyasādhanapadamanarthakamāpadyeta,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5898: na ca tajjñānamevāstu karaṇamiti vācyam, avāntaravyāpāravirahiṇaḥ karaṇatvāyogāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5901: pramāṇānuvṛttyā tannivṛttirityapi na vācyam, vṛttaireva padaiḥ samīhitasiddhāvanuvṛtteranavakāśāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5903: tathāpi prajñānaṃ prasiddhipadārthona tu prajñāpanamityata āha---ityetadarthe /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5905: jñāyamānasya sādṛśyasya karaṇatvamāviṣkartuṃ tasyānyatra acaritārthaḥ phalānuguṇo vyāpāro darśita iti tātparyār'thaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5908: lakṣyapadaṃ hi lakṣaṇavyavasthāpakaṃ na bhavati parasparāśrayatvamagatirveti doṣāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5916: satyamevaitat, kintu phalābhāvenaiva hetunopamānasya prāmāṇyamapanīyate pareṇa /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5917: tasmāt tadavabodhāya niṣkṛṣya phalamasya darśanīyamiti tathaiva sūcitavān /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5920: karmadhārayasamāso 'pi na nirasta iti draṣṭavyam, aviruddhatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5921: prasiddhaṃ sādharmyaṃ yasyeti bahuvrīhāvapi karmadhārayārthasya praviṣṭatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5922: evaṃ prasiddhena sādharmyamityatra tṛtīyātatpuruṣasya praveśād virodhāntaramāśaḍkyāha---bhāṣyakāreṇa hīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5929: atropamānasya phale vipratipadyamānān prati sāśaḍkaṃ jarannaiyāyikajayanta prabhṛtīnāṃ parihāramāha--yadyapīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5931: mānāntaraṃ śabdo vā śabdārtho vā liṅgabhūtaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5933: śabdādavagatena gosādṛśyena pratipādyamānaḥ piṇḍa samānāsamānajātīyebhyo vyavacchinnaḥ śakyamavaganatumiti saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5935: tu gosādṛśyenopalakṣito viśiṣṭaḥ śabdādavagamyamānaḥ piṇḍaḥ samānāsamānajātīyebhyo vyavacchinnaḥ śakyo 'vagantum,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5938: atha gosadṛśa eva ka ityāśaḍkānivartanāsāmarthyamateḥ pariplavaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5941: tarhi viśiṣṭaiva pratipattirvākyādastu ityata āha---na ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5944: sa hi pramāṇasamāhāro vā syāt, phalasamāhāro vā?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5945: ādye 'pi pramāṇatve sati samāhāraḥ, samāhṛtayorvā prāmāṇyamiti?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5946: na tāvat prathamaḥ, phalānekatve sati samāhārānupapatteḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5951: tat kiṃ tatphalasya tatpramāṇabahirbhāva eva, antarbhāve vā kiyatī sīmā?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5953: asti tarhi sādṛśyādijñānakāle 'pi vistāritasya cakṣuṣo vyāpāraḥ? na, tasmin sati
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5957: pūrve hi yathā gaustathetyeva vākyaṃ gavayapadenāpratītasamayenāpi prayogamātropayoginā sahitaṃ saṃbandhapratipattihetuḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5960: avācakaprayogasya vākyānaṅgatayeti tadvirahiṇaśca saṃbandhyupalakṣaṇaparyavasānāditi manyamānā etadeva
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5963: yadi hi saṃbandho viditaḥ, kaḥ pariplavārthaḥ?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5964: atha na vidita iti tatrākāḍkṣānuvṛtterevamucyata iti cet--tadapyayuktam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5969: avagatireva tarhi saṃndhasya saṃbandhino 'navagamāditi kiṃ pariplutaṃ pramātuḥ?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5971: anyathā piṇḍopakṣepe 'pi nimittānupakṣepe manodharmādiśabdānāṃ jātiśabdatvaṃ na syāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5980: tatra prathamadvitīyayorasaṃbhāvitatvādiha viditavṛttāntatayā tṛtīyaṃ prakāraṃ nirasya pañcamaścaturthamupayātīti caturthaṃ vyavasthāpayati---na tāvaditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5981: aviditagavayaśabdavṛttāntasya tu yad bhaviṣyati, tadanantarameva vakṣyati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5984: tataśca tathābhūta eva piṇḍe saṃbandho grāhyo,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5987: na ca gosādṛśyenopalakṣyata iti upalakṣaṇamanumāpanam, smāraṇaṃ vā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5992: gavayaśabdo vā gavayatvaṃ gamayet, yathā gauḥ tathā gavaya iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5995: nanu sādṛśyameva jātibhedamanantarbhāvya pratyetuṃ na śakyam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6006: ado 'ravindamivedamaravindamiti caturdhā sādṛśyagatau bhinnapradhānasāmānyaniyamāyogena tadanantarbhāvyaiva sādṛśyapratipattyupapatteḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6007: kvacid dṛṣṭamiha smaryeta tāvaditi cet? smaryatāṃ tāvadatrāvagatam, na tviha tadavagatamiti brūmaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6008: tasmād gosāmānyenopalakṣyamāṇaḥ piṇḍaḥ kiṃ tadvāneva gavayaśabdasya vācyo bhavatu?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6011: tadupalakṣita eva piṇḍa ākāśavat tasya vācyo bhavet?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6013: etāsvavaśyamanyatamā koṭirgavayapadārtho bhaviṣyatīti nirdhāraṇasaṃbhāvanāṃ hṛdi nidhāya /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6020: yadyapi gavayatvāvagame 'pi saṃjñāsaṃjñisaṃbandhānavagame tatra prayujyamānatvāditi heturasiddha eva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6021: na hyasati vṛttyantare tadviṣayatayā prayogaḥ saṅgatimavijñāya jñātuṃ śakayate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6022: prāgeva pramāṇāntarāt tadavagame tu kimanumānena sādhanīyam?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6024: tathāpi saṃbandhyavagame gavayapadasamabhivyāhṛtaṃ vākyameva saṃbandhaṃ bodhayiṣyati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6025: avācakasyāpi ca samabhivyāhāra upayokṣyate upamānapakṣa iva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6029: ata eva vākyasya vyāptiparatāpi nirākṛtā, saṃbandhino 'navagamāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6030: na ca vyatireke tātparyam, saṃketayiturabhiprāyopādhikatvāt, satpratipakṣatvācceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6031: yadyapi vinigamanāyāṃ hetvabhāve 'pi nopamānasya kācit kṣatiḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6038: sa ca prasiddho dharmaḥ samānaḥ pratiyogitayā tadupakṣipto 'samānaśceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6041: jaranmīmāṃsakamataṃ gosādṛśyaṃ gavayasthaṃ pratyakṣameveti vadatā nirastam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6052: iha śabde trividhā vipratipattiḥ---prāmāṇyato, bhedato, lakṣaṇataśceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6060: tatra vipratipadyamānaṃ prati tu parīkṣāvatāra ityāśayavān siddhavat saṅgatibhāṣyaṃ vyākhyāya lakṣaṇamavatārayati---atheti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6061: tatra samayabalena samyakparokṣānubhavasādhanaṃ śabda iti eke /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6070: yadi ceṣṭā na prāmāṇam, aprasaṅga eva tasyāḥ, kiṃ śabdatvasamavāye satītyanena nirvartanīyam?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6072: tasmāt śabda eva ceṣṭāyāḥ praveśaḥ samayabalapravṛtteḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6073: śabda eva tu śabdavyavahāro laukikaḥ prāyikatvāt, cākṣuṣe jñānadarśanavyavahāravaditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6077: arthena ca smṛtyutpādanāt śabdaviṣayam evāsyāḥ prāmāṇyam, pramāṇaphalasya pramāṇatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6079: yadi ceṣṭopadhānamantareṇāvagato 'pi śabdo nārthaṃ gamayedevamapi saṃbhavet, na caitadasti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6083: ---ata eva taṃ prati samayabalena śabdavadarthe 'pi ceṣṭāyāḥ kuṇṭhatvameva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6087: atha kṛtasamayāpi ceṣṭaiva kiṃ na syāt, avinābhāvābhāvāt?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6088: smārayatu vā padārthān, tathāpi na pramāṇam //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6089: dvividhā hi sā samayapramārabhedāt---kṛtyanvayinī, jñaptyanvayinī ca /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6093: jñaptyanvayinī tu kārakeṣu pratipadikārthapradhānā, kriyāsu vartamānārthapradhānā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6094: tathā ca gauraśvaḥ puruṣa ityādipadairiva svatantreṣu padārtheṣu smāriteṣu parasparānvayayogaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6095: padaikadeśavibhaktiviśeṣavat ceṣṭaikadeśaviśeṣāt prakaraṇādiviśeṣād vā kārakādismṛtiniyama iti cet---ceṣṭaikadeśaviśeṣābhāvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6097: prakaraṇādayastu viṣayaviśeṣe śabdān niyamayanti, na tu kārakakālaviśeṣeṣu pravartayanti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6098: tathātve vā gauraśvaḥ puruṣo hastītyādāvapi karmatvādīnyunnīya vivakṣitārthāvasāyaḥ syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6100: kārakaviśeṣādīnākṣeptumalam, na tu padakadambka ityasti niyamaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6103: saṃśayapratibhayoranyatarasmād viśeṣānupalambhe vidūravartini samānadharmiṇi sthāṇvarthina iveti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6106_1: sāvyavahārikānapyakīrtayatā sūtrakṛtā sūcitamapi mandamatayo na gṛhṇantīti tadanukampayā
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6111: kiṃ tu tatrāpi vākyameva pradhānam, asādhāraṇatvādindriyādivat /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6114: tadanena nirākāḍkṣāyogyānāsannāni padāni nirasyātā ceṣṭādayo 'pi nirastā bhavantīti vijātīyavyudāsaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6119: nanu nāyamupadeśaśabdasyārtho yathāśruti cāvyāpakatā siddhārthāsaṃgrahādivadityata āha---yadyapīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6120: na kevalaṃ bhūtārthāsaṃgrahaḥ sādhyārthamapi na kiñcit saṃgṛhṇātītyāha---yadyapi ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6122: yenānayorūpadeśapadenāsaṃgraha ityatastābhyāṃ vidhervaidharmyaṃ pratipādya tayorapi tato vaidharmyamuktam---te hīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6125: yadyapi lakṣaṇayā te api saṃgrahītuṃ śakyete parasthāne prayoktṛpadaṃ prakṣipya,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6127: svargāpavargopāyaviṣayasya śabdaviśeṣasya lakṣaṇārambhāt śāstrasya tadadhikāreṇa pravṛtteḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6128: sāmānyalakṣaṇe tvakṛte viśeṣalakṣaṇānavatāra ityataḥ prathamaṃ tathaiva vyākhyātam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6131: parapadamapahāya prayojanavānityeva vākyārthapratipattiḥ phalamiti ca lākṣaṇikapadaprayogasya cāyamevopayogo yadubhayalakṣaṇalābhaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6137: nūnaṃ kañcidarthaṃ pratipādayantyaḥ kvacit paraṃ pravartayeyuḥ pravṛttyaḍkitatvāt prayojanasadbhāvasya /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6138: na cet paraṃ pravartayeyuḥ kathaṃ paraprayojanavattyaḥ pravṛttivirahāḍkitatvāt prayojanābhāvasyetyata āha---yadyapīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6147: tathā ca sthānakaraṇādīnāmanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ varṇanipatti prati sāmarthyāvagamāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6154: api tvāyatanatayā kartṛtvanirvāhakatayā vyāpakatayā ca tat tasya neṣyate bhogābhāvāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6158: tadevaṃ rūpa āptaḥ kutaḥ pramāṇāt niścetavyaḥ, paracittavṛttīnāmapratyakṣatvāt?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6160: anyathāpi saṃbhavādityāśaḍkya mlecchā api hītyādinā bhāṣyatātparyaṃ bruvāṇaḥ tanniścayopāyamapi leśato darśayati---hetudarśanaśūnyā iti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6163: tatra pūrvasya tāvat sattvaprasādhakādeva pramāṇād rāgadveṣamohavirahasiddhāvanāptatvaṃ nirastam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6167: icchāpi pratipipādayiṣā vipralipsā vā syāditi sandeho 'vaśiṣyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6168: tatrāpyabhyāsadaśāpanne 'yamartho 'syeti sāmānyato niścaye bhavatyeva tajjñānasya yathārthatvaniścayaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6169: yathābhyāsadaśāpannamidamaraṇyamamīṣāṃ mlecchānāmataḥ asminnete mārgāmārgavibhāgajñā iti pānthānāmevaṃ niścayaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6170: vipralipsā ca hetudarśanena vyāptā hetau sati syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6171: sa ca dvirūpaḥ, svopakāraḥ paropakāro vā?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6172: tatra tāvat pāntheṣu vimārgeṇa pratiṣṭhamāneṣu mlecchādīnāṃ na kaścit svopakāraḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6176: nāpi parāpakāramātraṃ puruṣārthaḥ tathā sati sarvaḥ sarvamapakuryādityevaṃ vipralipsāpi nivāryate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6177: anabhyāsadaśāpannaviṣaye tu pravṛttisāmarthyāt pramāṇāntarasaṃvādād vā mohavipralipsayornivṛttiriti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6179: tataḥ kaḥ sandeho mahādhiyām āryāṇāṃ ca tattvāvadhāraṇa iti apiśabdārthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6180: etena yad yena rūpeṇa na niścitam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6183: na pratīyate cābhimataḥ puruṣa āptatveneti vyāpakānupalabdherasiddhatvamuktam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6190: satpratipakṣatayā cet svargādīnāṃ pratyakṣatvaṃ kutaḥ setsyatītyata āha---yogaje tviti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6194: tasmādāpātatastāvat satpratipakṣā evaite hetava ityata āha---asmākaṃ tu sabhyañca iti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6195: ayamāśayaḥ, dṛśyate hi tāvad bahirandriyoparame 'pyasannihitadeśakālārthasākṣātkāraḥ svapne /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6197: na hi smaraṇānubhavavibhāge api sākṣī praṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6198: kiṃ tarhi? idaṃ smarāmīdamanubhavāmīti pratītyā svasākṣiko 'yam arthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6201: smṛtiviparyāso 'sāviti cet? yadi smṛtiviṣaye viparyāsa ityarthaḥ, tadānumanyāmahe /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6202: atha smṛtāvevāyamanubhavatvaviparyāsa ityarthaḥ, tadā prāgeva nirastaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6205: tathā ca sa ghaṭa ityutpannāyāṃ smṛtau bhrāmyatastaṃ ghaṭamanubhavāmīti syāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6209: asti ca svapnānubhavasyāpi kasyacit satyatvam, saṃvādāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6210: tacca kākatālīyamapi na nirhetukam, sarvasvapnajñānānāmapi tathātvaprasaḍgāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6212: sa ca karmajavad yogajo 'pi yogavidheravaseyaḥ, karmayogavidhyostulyogakṣematvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6213: tasmād yogināmanubhavo dharmajatvāt pramā, sākṣātkāripramātvāt pratyakṣaphalam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6216: asmākaṃ tu sabhyañca iti bahavaśceti anvācaye cakāraḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6217: yadyapi cāsmākaṃ paramasarvajñasiddhāvavāntarasarvajñe na sidhyatyapi na kācit prakṛtahāniḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6218: tathāpi tatsadbhāve api pramāṇasadbhāvāt so 'pi nopekṣāmarhatīti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6219: iha dignāgena bhāvasādhanatvakarmasādhanatvābhyāmupadeśapadaṃ vikalpya dūṣitam karaṇasādhanatvapakṣastvasmadamito 'pi kuta upekṣita ityata āha---anyasmādanyasyeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6220: arthena hi sākṣāt pratibandhaḥ pratyakṣasyaiva, paramparāpratibandho 'numānasya /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6223: apratibandhe tvaprāmāṇyameva ityasaṃbhava eva karaṇavyutpattipakṣasyeti manyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6224: atra bhāvavyutpattipakṣe āptatvaniścayaḥ śabdaphalam, taddvārā vākyārthaniścayo vā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6231: atha vā āpte niścayaṃ kṛtvā tatsahāyo vākyārthaniścayaṃ janayannityubhayaṃ dūṣayatītyāha--imamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6233: atrāpyupadarśitārthaprāptiniścayaḥ, taddvārā arthatathātvaniścayo vā śabdasya phalam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6236: upadiśyamānor'thaḥ prāptaḥ, prāptatvena niścito yasmāditi vā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6237: tathātvena niścita iti vā sūtrayojanā, ubhayamapi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6241: āptiniścaye 'pi śabdasya vyāpāro nāstīti darśayitumarthatathātvaniścayo 'pi pratyakṣeṇetyuktam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6244: atra cobhayorapi pakṣayorāptoktatvapravṛttisāmarthyahetupradhānayoḥ śabdasya prāmāṇyaniścayaḥ phalamiti śaḍkitumucitamapi na śaḍkitam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6251: nanvanabhyupagatebhyaḥ pakṣebhyo na kañcidabhyupagatasya viśeṣaṃ paśyāma ityata āha---etaduktaṃ bhavatīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6257: yathā tu pūrvapakṣe vyākhyātam, tathātrāpi draṣṭavyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6260: yadyevaṃ tarhi kkāptoktatvaniścaya upayujyata ityata āha---āptatvaṃ ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6264: tataśca punarāptoktatvenārthaniścaya āyāta ityata āha---na ca yata iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6277: jñātāptatvena tūpadeṣṭrā tathātvena niścīyata iti pratyakṣavat svaviṣaye vyavastheti jñānamātramanumāpayet /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6281: na cāyaṃ laiḍgikaḥ, vacanamātrasyānaikāntikatvāt, āptoktatvasya prāgevāsiddheḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6283: tathā hi, na tāvat tādātmyatatprāptī saṃbhavataḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6286: na ca tadevānumeyam, tasya svātantryeṇa bhavadbhiranabhyupagamāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6288: na ca liṅgasya svātmano laiḍgikajñānajanakatvamevānumeyam, tasya liḍgāntaraviṣayatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6289: tasmād vacanamātraliṅgapakṣe yad vacanaṃ tad buddhipūrvakamityudāharaṇīyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6299: tasya ca na kaścid viśeṣor'thāhitākārādilakṣaṇaḥ samasti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6302: sa cet jñānasiddhāvantarbhūtaḥ kimaparaṃ tena sādhanīyam?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6310: evaṃ ca samayagrahasyāpyupayoga iti cet---na, gauraśvaḥ puruṣa ityādipadakambakena vyabhicārāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6312: so 'yaṃ viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvo na tāvat svarūpataḥ, padānāṃ parasparaṃ svātantryāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6314: avagame vā kastato 'paraḥ padārthānāṃ saṃsargo, yo jñānāvacchedakatayā anumātumiṣṭaḥ?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6315: ākāṅkṣādimattve satīti viśeṣaṇānna vyabhicāra iti cet?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6322: tathā ca prāgeva sādhyaviśeṣasiddhaye hetuviśeṣasiddhimicchatā vākyādeva vākyārthaviśeṣapratyaya eṣitavya ityupasaṃharannāha---tasmāditi //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6324: tathāpyasaṃbaddhasya prakāśakatve 'tiprasaṅga ityata āha---na ceti nanu na hi saṃbandha ityeva gamako 'tiprasaḍgāt api tvavinābhāva eva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6325: sa ca śabdasyārthena nāstītyata āha---na cāvineti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6326: yat tvatroktam, cakṣurapi rūpakāryatvādeva rūpaṃ prakāśayatīti, tadayuktam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6327: yadi hi tatkṛtatvādeva tad gamayet, rūpamiva rasādīnapi gamayet /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6329: na hyavinābhāvasyaiṣa mahimā yadayaṃ sattāmātreṇaiva gamayati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6330: tathātve vā dhūmādapi cakṣuṣa iva sattāmātrāvasthitādevāgniḥ pratīyeta /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6331: api ca jñānasamasamayo vārthaḥ prakāśate, anantarasamayo vā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6338: kimasmābhiratra vaktavyam? kiṃnibandhanastarhi pramāṇavyavahāraḥ śabde, yannibandhanaścakṣurādiṣu /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6339: tatraiva kiṃ nibandhana iti cet? idaṃ mahāpāṇḍityaṃ yat siddhamātṛkāyāmapyadyāpi sandehaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6344: tathāpi samayasya puruṣāyattatvāt kimayaṃ sāṃvyavahārikasaḍketāneva śabdān prayuḍkte?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6345: kiṃ vā svayamidānīmarthabhedeṣu saḍketyeti sandeho na nivartata iti cet---na,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6348: jānātyeva hyayaṃ nāviditasamayā ete pratipādakā iti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6353: tatrāpi na pratipādyaṃ prati samayo gopyaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6361: yeṣāṃ vaśe nanu vaśe jagadeva teṣām //8 //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6369: tarhi uktāni pramāṇānīdānīṃ parīkṣayantāṃ kiṃ prameyalakṣaṇenetyata āha---lakṣaṇaṃ ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6373: nanu pramāṇaṃ tāvat prathamata eva vaktavyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6375: idānīṃ tu pañcadaśasu prathamaṃ kimabhidhīyatāmiti jijñāsā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6381: ārabhyatāṃ tahi prameyalakṣaṇam, kimantargaḍunā vibhāgenetyata āha---tadiheti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6383: kiṃ tadarthajātamiti bhāṣyakārīyaḥ praśnaḥ śliṣṭaḥ, ki lakṣaṇaṃ katividhaṃ ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6388: prathamastu viśiṣṭaṃ prameyamadyāpi na sidhyatīti tadarthaṃ praśna ityanena /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6389: tatra vārttikakāreṇa tuśabdasūcitaṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ gṛhītvā vibhāganiṣṭhaḥ praśna ityanena /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6390: tatra vārttikakāreṇa tuśabdasūcitaṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ gṛhītvā vibhāganiṣṭhaḥ praśnaḥ kṛta ityāha---sa ca viśeṣa iti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6391: nanvayameva ca sūtrārtha iti vibhāga evāsya sūtrāsyārtha iti gamyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6401: nanu yadā digādayo 'bhihitā evārthata iti samādhānam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6402: tadā tadabhidhāne ka upayoga ityapi samarthanīyamityata āha---kauśalamātramiti //9 //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6405: nanu pratyakṣamapyātmani pramāṇameva, ahamiti vikalpasya parairapīṣṭatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6415: tasmād vāsanāvādamātraṃ vihāya āgantukamapi kiñcit kāraṇaṃ vācyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6416: taccāptānāptaśabdau vā liṅgatadābhāse vā pratyakṣatadābhāse vā?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6423: na ca bāhyapratyakṣanivṛttāveva nirmūlatvam, buddhivikalpasyāpi nirmūlatvaprasaḍgāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6424: tatra svasaṃvedanaṃ mūlam, ihāpi mānasamiti na kaścid viśeṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6426: yadyapi savastuko 'yaṃ tathāpi śarīrapratyayasāmānādhikaraṇyāt tadvastuka evāyamityapi syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6427: ato na tadatirikte vastuni pramāṇayituṃ śakyate tāvad yāvad dehādibhyo bhinna ātmā pramāṇāntareṇa na sādhyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6431: tadatirikte vastuni drāgevapramāṇayitu śakyate, tathā nedamityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6432: nanu yadi nāma na drāgeva, vicārakrameṇa tu pramāṇayiṣyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6434: nirūpādhiśarīrabuddhitatsamudāyālambanatvena ahaṃ pratyayasyātiprasaḍgāt svasaṃbandhini śarīrādāvayamahaṃpratyaya iti vācyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6437: tathā ca yadā tenaiva tadanubhūyate tadā pratyetuḥ pratyetavyādananyatvādahamiti syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6438: ata eva ghaṭādayo na kadācidapyananyānubhavitṛkā iti na kadācidapyahamāspadamiti cet?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6439: evaṃ tarhi tvanmate 'pyayamahamiti pratyayaḥ śarīrādāvāroparūpa eva, tataḥ pratyeturanyatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6441: tasyāḥ kriyātvenānubhūyamānāyā bhinnasya tatkarturahaṃ chinadmītivadahaṃ jānāmītyanubhavāt nīlādipratyetavyākāravat pratipattrākāro 'pi pratīterevāyamātmā tathā bhāsata iti cet?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6442: tarhi pratyetavyākārasamānayogakṣematvena pratipatrākārasyāpi siddhaṃ naḥ samīhitam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6443: astu svopādānamātramiti cet---na, tatpratibhāsane tadgatārthākārasyāpi pratibhāsaprasaḍgāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6445: pravṛttivijñānasaṃtānādanya evāyaṃ buddhisaṃtānaḥ pratipattā, yamālayavijñānamācakṣata iti cet?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6447: sa kiṃ saṃtanyamānajñānarūpaḥ, tadviparītarūpo veti cintā pariśiṣyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6452: etena pratisaṃdhānaṃ pratyabhijñānaṃ vā syāt, kāryakāraṇaviśeṣayorekasaṃtānaniyamo vā?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6453: ādye tattvataḥ pratyabhijñānamasiddham, abhimānato viruddham, aviśiṣṭamanaikāntikam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6456: tadatra pratisaṃdhāne kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ pareṇopanyastaḥ kimupādhitayā vipakṣavyāvṛttisaṃdehamudbhāvayitum?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6459: tatra pratyabhijñānaṃ pratisandhānamiti gṛhītvopādhilakṣaṇamapaninīṣān kāryakāraṇabhāvapratisandhānayoḥ paraspareṇa vyāpti khaṇḍayati---na hi yatreti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6465: viśiṣṭo 'pi kāryakāraṇabhāvo na pratisandhānaṃ prati prayojako yatastannivṛttāvapi nedaṃ nivartata ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6466: na ca sādṛśyamātramevāstu tannibandhanamiti sāmpratam, bhedagrahe tasyāpi vyabhicārāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6467: tadagrahapakṣastu vācya iti tamupekṣyāsmadabhipretaṃ pratisandhānamādāya śaṅkate---pūrvāpareti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6468: yatra kartari pratisandhānaṃ tatrāvaśyaṃ pratisandhayānāṃ buddhīnāṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6469: yatra caiṣa evabhūtaḥ, tatrāvaśyaṃ kartṛpratisandhānamiti na vyabhicaratītyarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6473: sa kimātmanaḥ pūrvāparapratyayānekakartṛkatayā pratisaṃdhatte na vā?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6477: atha na pratisandhatte, na tarhi kāryakāraṇabhāvanibandhanaṃ kartaryapi pratisandhānam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6478: na hyasti saṃbhavo yadanvaye 'pi yasyānanvayastat tāvanmātranibandhanamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6484: yadi pāralaukiker'the vipralambhakā eva vaktāra iti niścayaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6488: tataśca na kāṣakāraṇabhāvo na tasya nibandhanam avyabhicārāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6494: upadeśastu pūrvapratisandhānabalopanītakarūṇābhyāsaprakarṣādeva virodhapratisandhānabalena suptasyeva prabodha iti śaḍkārthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6496: na ca sphaṭikavad viṣayoparāgaparihāreṇa buddhiṣu bhedagraha iti yuktam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6498: tathābhāve buddhimātreṇa bhedāgrahe pārthivatayā vṛkṣāt kāṣṭhaṃ kāṣṭhādaḍgāraḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6501: tasmānnimittavyāvṛttau pratisandhānaṃ na syāt, bhavad vā nimittāntaramākṣipatītyarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6513: cālayavijñānopāttaṃ pravṛttivijñānaṃ na kiñcidupādatta ityapi yuktam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6514: tathā sati nimittatāmapi na yāyāt, upādānatvavyāptatvānnimittatāyāḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6515: evaṃ ca yadi jñānāntaramupādadīta, tadā apūrvānantasantānapravṛttiprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6519: asya hi bhedāgrahaḥ svarūpato vā syāt, viṣayato vā?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6520: svarūpato 'pi pūrvāhamiti pratyayamātrād vā, pravṛttivijñānebhyo 'pi vā?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6525: kathañcid bhedāgrahe 'pi tadarthasyaiva pratisandhānamucitam, na pravṛttivijñānānām /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6526: na ca tebhyo 'pi bhedāgraha iti coktameva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6529: vastvantarameva vā, alīkaṃ vā? nādyaḥ, prāgdūṣaṇenaiva gatatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6530: na hyanena svākāraḥ svātmano bhedenāropitaḥ, api tu svātmaviṣaya eva darśitaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6533: nāpi tṛtīyaḥ, ahamiti vikalpasya savastukatāyāḥ prāgeva prasādhanāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6535: sa hi vidyamāna eva bhedo na gṛhyate, avidyamāna eva vā, āropito vā, āropitāsattvo vā?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6538: na ca paramārthata eva nānāvikalpollikhitamalīkamekātmakam anātmakatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6541: yadi hi tatra bhedāropaḥ, kathaṃ tadagrahaḥ?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6547: sa iha na gṛhyate ityabhedānusaṃdhānamiti cet---na,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6551: tarhi yathābhūto bhedaḥ tatra gṛhyate, tadagrahe evābhedāropa ityeva sādhu /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6552: na caitadalīkaviṣayatvapakṣe saṃbhavatīti sthiravastugocaratvam eva sattvabuddherjyāyaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6554: tadidamuktarūpaṃ pratisandhānaṃ nimittavattayā vyāptaṃ nirnimittatve niyamānupapatteḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6555: taccānekakartṛtve nāstīti vyāpakānupalabdhyā vipakṣānnivartamānaṃ nimittavatyekakartṛkatve viśrāmyatīti pratibandhasiddhiḥ ityanenābhiprāyeṇopasaṃharati---tasmāditi //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6558: tathā hi vyavahitakālā api pratyayā yadyekakartṛkāḥ, kva buddhīnāmupādānopādeyabhāvaḥ?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6563: bhedāgrahe satītyapi na yuktam, samastopādhisvīkāraparihāreṇa śiṣyācāryabuddhyorapi bhedāgrahāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6569: tasya vāstavasya kṣaṇikapakṣe viṣayasamayānāṃ kṣaṇānāmabhāvāt kālpanikasya tvatiprasaṃjakatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6571: gandhaḥ tatraiva rūparasasparśā iti, yatraiva śarīraṃ tatraiva jñānamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6575: kāṣṭhasya tu prakṛtervikṛtiraḍgāra iti kuto niścitaṃ bhavatā?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6576: yāvatā vahnerevāsau vikāraḥ kiṃ na syāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6578: kāṣṭhasaṃbandhe vahnereva tadutpattirityevaṃ kiṃ na syāt?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6585: asti hi teṣāṃ tadutpattau satyāṃ mamatā ābhimānikaikatvāvasāyaśca /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6587: astu piṇḍitānāṃ rūparasaparamāṇūnāṃ sarveṣā sarvopādānatvamityapi na yuktam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6590: etena bhrāntasaṃmataikāvasāya iti pāṭhāntaramapāstam, laukikānāṃ bhrāntasaṃmatestatrāpi tulyatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6594: kiñcideva svakāraṇasāmagrīvaśādutpadyate jñānaṃ yat kāṃścideva kāraṇasāntānikān pratyayān pratyavekṣate nānyat /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6602: yatra yathā kāryaṃ dṛśyate tatra tathā kalpyata iti cet?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6603: tat kimidānīṃ kiṃbhūtasya kutra sāmarthyamityanuyogo 'nuttara eva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6604: evaṃ tarhi sarvatra jñāpakajanakeṣvanāśvasāt nirīhaṃ jagat jāyeta /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6610: nanvidamapi te vyasanaṃ nivartayiṣyāmo mā tvariṣṭā
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6612: yadi hi sarvajñasya cetaso 'smadādicittamālambanapratyayatvenodāhniyate vaisadṛśyād daṇḍaghaṭavanna pratisaṃdhatta ityapi pariharedata uktam---yogicittamapīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6613: tasyāpi yogicittena pratisandhānaṃ syāditi viparyayo hetuviparyāsasyāpi saṃbhavāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6614: tasyāpi yogicittena pratisandhānaṃ syāditi viparyayo hetuviparyāsasyāpi saṃbhavāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6616: ihānubhavo vā kālāntarabhāvinīṃ smṛtiṃ janayati, jajjanito vā saṃskāraḥ?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6619: adhyakṣāsiddho 'pi taduttarabuddhidhārārūpo vā, tadanyo vā, tadviśeṣo vā?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6624: na hi karmakarakaropanītam eva bījaṃ kṣitimāsādyaḍkuraṃ kurute /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6625: na tu tathābhūtamapi pramādapatitam, tathā nīlādyanubhavasantānaḥ pītādyanubhavena vopanīyatām,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6626: nīlādyanubhavenaiva veti na kaścit svarūpakṛto viśeṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6627: evaṃ cānanubhūte 'pi smaraṇaprasaḍgo na cānubhūte 'pīti vaijātyaṃ tu viśeṣo bhavet /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6628: yathā kṣīrāvasekādamlatvaṃ parihṛtya mādhuryamādāyānuvartamānāmalakī kālāntare api phale mādhuryamunmīlayati,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6629: lākṣārasāvasekād dhavalatāṃ parihṛtya raktatāmupādāyānuvartamānaṃ kārpāsabījaṃ kusumeṣu raktatām,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6631: javākusumādyupadhānāt tadrūpatāṃ parihṛtya dhavalimānamupādāyaiva saṃtanyamānasya sphaṭikasyeva jñānasyāpi viṣayoparāgaṃ parihṛtya cidrūpatāmātramupādāyānuvṛtteḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6632: sarvākāratvameva sarvavijñānānāṃ kiṃ tu kaścidākāra ḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6633: sphuṭaḥ, anye tvapaṭava iti tu svadarśanaśraddhā, yato viruddhadharmādhyāsādapi na bhīḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6638: sa cet kālāntarasthāyī, nūnaṃ tadupādānamapi tathaiva sthāyi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6639: na hyupādānanivṛttāvapi upādeyamavatiṣṭhata ityāśayavānāha---iti pūrvotpanna iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6640: saṃtanyamāna evātīndriyaḥ saṃskāro bhaviṣyatītyāśayavānāśaṅkate---punaḥ para ityādi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6641: pṛthaksaṃskārasantāno hi na tāvat parābhyupeto nāpyupapannaḥ, ālayasya prāgeva pratiṣedhāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6643: tasmāt pravṛttisantāne phalānavakāśāt anyatra saṃskāre 'nyatra phale 'tiprasaḍgāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6644: tasmād pravṛttisantāne phalānavakāśāt anyatra saṃskāre 'nyatra phale 'tiprasaḍgāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6647: tasmād yatrānubhavastatra saṃskāraḥ, yatra ca sa tatra smṛtyādiphalamiti paramupapadyate //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6650: etena yo yaḥ saṃskāraḥ kvacit santāna āhitaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6658: guṇatvaṃ tu yadarthaṃ sādhitam, tat tatsādhakenaiva sādhitamiti vaiyarthyamavaśiṣyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6660: nanu yadi vaiyarthyamasya hṛdi nihitameva vārttikakṛtā,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6664: na cāsiddhaṃ sādhanaṃ nāmeti kṛtvā iti garbhaśoṣaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6668: na tāvadanayoḥ sādhanatvaṃ prati kaścid viśeṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6670: so 'pi nāsti, ekahetusiddhe 'pi hetvantarajijñāsuṃ prati bhāvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6681: atīndriyeṣvanumānaṃ pramāṇam, tacca dvividhaṃ samavyāptikamasamavyāptikaṃ ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6682: tatra yadyapi dvitīyasya nivṛttau na sādhyanivṛttiḥ, tathāpi prathamasya nivṛttāvavaśyaṃ nivarteta /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6684: ārambhake sati ca tat kāryadravyaṃ sāvayavaṃ vyavasthāpyeta, vāyuvat /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6685: na ceha kvacidupalabhyamānasparśavattāstīti nārambhasaṃbhavaḥ, tadabhāve na sāvayavatvamākāśavat /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6690: tathā satyeva hīcchādīnāṃ sārvatrikatvamupapadyate yata ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6694: atha gatereva kiṃ na taṃ tamāpnotītyata āha---gatikalpanāyāṃ pramāṇābhāvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6696: tayā aparidṛśyamānāpi gatiḥ kalpyate manasi paramāṇuṣu ca /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6698: tathā hi, na paramāṇvāśrayā icchādayaḥ, anityatve satyasmadādipratyakṣatvāt, śabdavat /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6699: niravayavadravyāśritatvaṃ ca sādhayatā sāvayāśritatvaṃ prāgeva nirastam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6702: nanu tathāpi kimanayā kaṣṭasṛṣṭyā, yāvatā guṇatvamanyathāpyamīṣāṃ sādhayituṃ śakyam?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6703: tathā hi icchādayo guṇā anityatve satyekendriyagrāhyajātimattvāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6712: teṣāmapi śarīramāśritya tathābhāvāt śarīrādapakarṣa iti saṃgatisaṃkṣepaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6714: indriyāṇāṃ manasaḥ aṃśator'thādeḥ paramparayā tu śarīrāśritatvam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6719: samuccayapakṣe vyabhicāradarśinaḥ kathaṃ ceṣṭāśraya iti praśno 'nupapannaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6722: yadyapi ceṣṭā kāyavyāpārastathāpi tasyaiva lakṣyatvāditaretarāśrayabhiyā vyāpāramātraṃ vaktavyamityāha---ceṣṭā vyāpāra iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6728: tadidamubhayaṃ vivakṣatoktam---api tu viśiṣṭo vyāpāra iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6734: atra ca sparśavaddravyaparimāṇaṃ mūrtiriti paralakṣaṇābhiprāyeṇa mūrtiśabdaḥ prayuktaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6739: tena yadyapi śarīrasya prayojakaṃ mano 'styeva, tathāpi na tat sparśavat /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6740: yadyapi ca śarīreṇāpi tatra prayatyate, tathāpi na tat tato 'nyat /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6744: āgāmivārttikaparyālocanāyāṃ tu ceṣṭāśabda evāyamevambhūter'thaviśeṣe vartata iti na nyūnaṃ sūtramāśaṅkanīyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6746: na ca tasyāpi prāṇitvenocchvāsaniḥśvāsānumānāt nayanodarādyavayavasaṃkocavikāśalakṣaṇā ceṣṭāstīti vācyam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6750: nanu yadyapīndriyāṇi śarīre na samavayanti, tathāpi saṃyujyante /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6751: tāvataiva āśrayārtha upapanna ityato vārttikakārasya bhāvamāviṣkaroti---saṃyogitayā tviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6754: na hi golakamātrasyopadhāte 'nugrahe vā tvagādīnyupahanyante anugṛhyante vā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6755: yathā jarāyauvanādinā śarīropaghātānugrahābhyāṃ sarvāṇi vikalāyante paṭūni vā sampadyanta iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6756: tadetad bhāṣyavārttikakārābhyāmevānugṛhyante upahanyanta iti bahuvacanaprayogeṇa spaṣṭaṃ darśitamityupekṣitavān /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6760: na tu tadeva kāryamityata āha---prayojanaṃ tadadhikāreṇa tatra pravṛtteriti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6762: yadavacchinne ātmani arthā bhogaṃ janayanti taccharīram /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6767: nāpīndriyaiḥ, tadavacchedena tatra bhogotpattau bahirapi bhogaprasaṅgaditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6768: tadetat tasya bhogadhiṣṭhānamiti vadatā bhāṣyakṛtā eva prāk darśitaṃ sphuṭamiti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6772: ceṣṭādayaḥ sāmānyaśabdā iti vārttike bahuvacanaṃ dṛṣṭāntabrahmaṇādiśabdāntarbhāvena /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6779: yasyāpi pramāṇena śarīratvaṃ bādhitaṃ bhavati, tatrāpi vyāpāraśrayatvaṃ gatamiti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6793: śarīrāvayavāntareṇa ghrāṇasya samavāyo vā saṃyogo vā?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6794: prathame 'pi dvayī gatiḥ, ghrāṇasya vā śarīrāvayave samavāyaḥ, tasya vā ghrāṇa iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6797: na hi kāraṇaṃ kāryakārye samavaitītyarthaḥ iti ṣaṣṭhatatpuruṣapakṣe /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6800: ghrāṇasya śarīrāvayave samavāya iti tu na sambhavatyeva,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6808: na tu miśrairiti vyāptiḥ, tāmupobdalayitumapratyakṣatvaprasaṅga uktaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6810: tathā ca na tatra śarīrasamavāyasambhava iti kimanena śaḍkitenāpītyupekṣitavān /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6819: yoginastadapi tatheti yadi tadendriyaparamāṇubhireva vyabhicāraḥ, teṣāmapi tathābhāvāditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6821: paramārthatastu yadi dvandvānantaraṃ bahuvrīhiḥ ka liṅgasaṅgatirarthasaṅgatiśca?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6827: śarīrādīnāmeva dharmaḥ pretyabhāvo dharminirūpaṇādhīnatvācca dharmasya tebhyaḥ pretyabhāvasyāpakarṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6828: arthādīnāṃ doṣāntānāṃ śarīramāśritya duḥkhahetutvāviśeṣe 'pi paramparayā śarīrāśriyatvādindriyāṇāṃ tu sākṣāt tathābhāvādebhyasteṣāmapakarṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6829: manasastvevaṃrūpatve satyapi bāhyendriyavaidharmyajñāpanārthatvāt buddhikramānumeyatvācca buddheḥ sakāśādapakarṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6837: nanu bhāṣyakṛd āha---bhogasādhanānīti, tatkathametat tena sūcitamityata āha---sākṣāditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6839: iti bhogau sukhaduḥkhe iti sākṣādeva bhogasādhanatvaṃ sarveṣāṃ sambhavati,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6840: tathāpi bhogo buddhiriti tatra tatra bhāṣyadarśanāt tadanusāreṇa vyācaṣṭe---pāramparyeṇa ceti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6843: tadetadevaṃlakṣaṇakamindriyaṃ bāhyamābhyantaraṃ cetīndriprakaraṇāt mano 'nyatra nayatā sūtrakṛtā eva sūcitam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6845: gandharasarūpasparśaśabdā iti pratiniyatārthavibhāgaṃ kurvatā sūtrakṛtā eva darśitam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6847: kathaṃ pañcaiva pratiniyatā viṣayā iti tadeva vyavacchedyaṃ darśayanneva manāk smārayati,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6848: rasanādi pratiniyataviṣayam, mana ādi sarvaviṣayamiti ca /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6852: tat kathaṃ tato na viśeṣa ityata āha---pramāṇādyudyeśeneti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6854: atha vibhāgasūtratve 'pi lakṣaṇasūtraṃ kiṃ na syāt?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6855: na hyanayoḥ kaścid virodha ityata āha---lakṣaṇaṃ hīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6859: lakṣyasya pakṣarūpatayā sādhyatvāt, lakṣaṇasya ca liṅgarūpatayā siddhatvādityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6860: tathāpi kathamebhya eva padebhyo vivakṣitobhayalābha ityata āha---atra ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6863: tena śrotrapadamapyavayavārthaṃ nimittīkṛtya nabhaso viśiṣṭādṛṣṭopagṛhītakarṇaśaṣkulyavacchinnatve vartata iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6870: na tu samuccitaṃ padaṃ nirūcyate tvakpadaṃ tvanavayavaṃ vṛddhikṣayavaddravyasahajāvaraṇamātre vartata ityabhiprāyavatā bhāṣyakṛtā lakṣaṇaṃ tadbījaṃ ca darśitam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6874: saṃyogādhāratvāditi grāhyasya mṛgamadādigandhasya tatrāsamavāyāt mṛgamadādīnāṃ svāvayavasamavāyena samavetasamavāyābhāvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6878: kiṃ yajjātīyaṃ yadindriyaṃ tattajjātīyasyaiva guṇaviśeṣaṃ gṛhṇāti?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6879: atha yajjātīyaṃ yadindriyaṃ tajjātīyasya tenaiva guṇaviśeṣo gṛhyate ityata āha---na caivamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6882: tathāpi bhūtebhya iti sūtrapadasya kiṃ tātparyam ityata āha---anena khalviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6885: na tvekaprakṛtikatvamāha sāṃkhyo na tvekasvābhāvyamindriyāṇāmityata āha---śliṣṭaṃ padamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6890: tathā ca lakṣyahāniriti---na hyasti saṃbhavo nirhetuko vyavahāra iti bhāvaḥ //12 //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6903: yeṣāṃ mithyājñānaviṣayīkṛtānāṃ nimittānuvyañjanasaṃjñāviṣayīkṛtānāṃ saṃsārahetutvaṃ ta hame lakṣyanta ityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6905: tatastadarthā iti lakṣaṇapadaṃ cet, lakṣyapadaṃ nāsti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6909: ke te? ya indriyāṇāmarthā viṣayā ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6910: āgāmino vārttikasya bhāṣyeṇa virodhaṃ parijihīrṣurāha---na ṣaṣṭhīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6912: vyadhikaraṇabahuvrīhau na kevalaṃ lakṣaṇābhāvaḥ prayojanābhāvaścetyāha---na ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6929: majjadhātumalā hame bahavaḥ śmaśāne tarāviva śarīre saṃyuktā ityudvegaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6939: śarīrāpekṣayā parāparabhāvo na madapekṣayeti na kiñcit /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6944: vakrabhrūḥ ṛjuromarājī gabhīranābhirūnnatapayodharā pṛthunitambā kṛśamadhyeti snehaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6946: acirasthāyinīti nirveda iti nimattasaṃjñayā saha aśubhasaṃjñeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6950: tadatiriktavastuviṣayaṃ vā, vastvanurodhākāraviṣayaṃ vā, atīkaviṣayaṃ veti?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6951: na tāvadādyaḥ, na hi bhavati yadeva rūpaṃ sa eva sparśa iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6952: na ca rūpaṃ dvīndriyagrāhyam, andhasyāpi nīlapītādiprayatyayaprasaḍgāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6953: na caikameva vastu kāraṇabhedādanyathā prathata iti yuktam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6956: nāpi dvitīyaḥ, sa hyekadeśatayā vā, ekakālatayā vā, ekakāryatayā vā, ekakāraṇatayā veti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6958: saṃbhave vā tadeva dravyamiti paryavasitaṃ vivādena /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6960: tathā hi cakṣuṣopalabhyamāne bhūtale rūpaviśeṣe ghaṭo 'pi cakṣuṣaivopalabhyamāno rūpaviśeṣastadādhāra iti śakyate niścetum,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6962: tadadhikaraṇāḥ sparśādayo 'pīti tu kasya pramāṇasya viṣayaḥ?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6979: sa hi vijñānanayamāśritya vā syāt, dvicandrādivad visaṃvādād vā, sthairyavadbādhakād veti?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6983: na teṣāṃ kiṃ tu tasyaivetyeva kiṃ na syāt?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6989: taiḥ saha tathotpādāditi parihāro 'stu, bhavatāmeva yathā śarīraṃ cetanāvaditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6995: abhedasādhanāni pramāṇāni bādhakamiti tu cintyata ityāśayavān paryanuyogārthamāha---svasaṃvedaneneti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6996: atra para āha anākalitasamaya iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6999: yathā nīladravyasamparkād dhavalo 'pi nīlo mahārajanasaṃparkādrakta iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7000: atra nīlādayo dravyavyapadeśaṃ vihāya rūpavyapadeśameva labhante,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7002: ādiśabdena gandhādīnāṃ vāsanādikāḥ vāsanādikāḥ kriyāḥ saṃgṛhītāḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7006: utpādamātraṃ vā, trailokyavilakṣaṇotpādo vā, sabhāgasantānabhedotpādo veti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7009: dṛṣṭisṛṣṭiviṣaye hi kasmiścid ghaṭa iti vyavahāraḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7010: sa cedanayā vacobhaḍgyātiriktaḥ samarthitaḥ, siddhaṃ naḥ samīhitamityāha---anyatva iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7013: te ca kathamapyutpadyantām, na kadācidapi dvīndriyagrāhyāḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7015: tathā ca dṛṣṭisṛṣṭiviṣayo naikaḥ samarthitaḥ syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7018: yadyapi kṣaṇikaparamāṇurūpe dravye na kaścid vicāravirodhaḥ, tathāpi sthirāvayavyabhiprāyeṇa śaḍkā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7031: kimevaṃrūpamithyājñānapravāhāvicchedaḥ, kiṃ vā pūrvamapyevaṃbhūtasya vibhramasya kadāpi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7037: na ca viparyaye bādhakābhāvād vibhramaśca syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7041: tathā hi mithyāpratyayā apyābhimānika pākṣikaṃ vā prāmāṇyamupādāyaiva pravartayeyaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7044: na ca pramāṇabhedāgrahamātreṇa tattvābhimānasaṃbhavaḥ, visadṛśārthagocaratve tasyābhāvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7046: tathāpi ghaṭādipratyayānāṃ satyatve kiṃ nibandhanā bauddhasyerṣyeti jijñāsuṃ pratibubodhayiṣurāhetyāha---taṃ pratīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7052: asti hi viṣayāgrahe buddhijātīyāgraho na cābhedobāhyasthitau satyāṃ guṇaguṇivādārambhāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7068: tato na pāribhāṣikeṇa vyabhicāraśaḍkāsamānārthānāṃ prakṛtīnāmiti prakṛte 'bhyupagamavādaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7070: nanvāpa ityapi toyagatāmeva bahutvasaṃkhyāmācaṣṭām, ko doṣa ityata āha---ityekasyāmapīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7071: yadyupanibandhena yadi toyaparamāṇāvapyāpa iti śiṣṭaprayogastadaivaṃ neyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7078: yadi yathālokavyavahāramādriyase, kimiti savikalpakaṃ pratyakṣaṃ pariharasi?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7082: vastutastu pītaśaḍkhavibhrame ayam api na pītasyaiva śaḍkhasyotpādamicchati,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7094: sa hyevaṃ pravartate, candano 'yaṃ surabhiḥ, tiktaḥ, śuklaḥ, śītaḥ iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7095: tādātmyabhramanirāsārthaṃ tu śabdo vyapadeśakatayopāttaḥ, candanasya śuklaṃ rūpamityādi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7097: na kevalaṃ hetusvarūpālocanena pratijñālocanenāpi candanasyopālambhābhyupagamo 'vasīyate parasya /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7100: svātantryeṇa vā sattve sādhye āśrayāsiddho heturiti tṛtīye vyutpādanīyamiti ihopekṣitavāniti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7102: tathā hi, ayaṃ cakṣurgocaraḥ candano rasādibhyo bhidyate, tadanupalambhe 'pyetasyopalabhyamānatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7103: yadyasminnanupalabhyamāne 'pyupalabhyate tat tato bhidyate, yathā rūpādibhyaḥ śabdaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7106: spamātrāttu vyavacchedaḥ sandigdhaḥ tatra vyapadeśo heturiti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7112: atra ca hetutayā vyāpti pradhānīkṛtya ṣaṣṭhyanto heturūktaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7126: atra yadi ghaṭamanatareṇāpi jāyamānatvādityetāvanmātraṃ kriyeta tadaikaghaṭaparityāge ghaṭāntare jāyamānaghaṭapratyayena vyabhicāraḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7140: tadguṇayogāt tu tadvyavahāro māṇavake siṃhavyavahāravat tadavayavārabdhatvāt tadīyatāvyavahāraḥ kṣīrasya dadhīvivat /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7141: sarpeṇāntyāvayavinā ekenānārambhāt tadavayavānāṃ kāryāvaṣṭabdhatvāt sarpakuṇḍalakaṃ saṃsthānameva sphuṭam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7145: rāhoḥ śira ityatra tu saṃsthāne śiraḥ śabdopacāramātram /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7149: vyatirekopadeśaviveko yadi syāt tadā buddhiśarīrābhyāmevānaikāntikaṃ syādata āha---atādātmyeti //14 //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7154: sarvajanīnenāpi samayena gośabdavad yadyarthāntare 'pyete pravarteran tadā ko virodha ityata āha---tatra sarvajanīnaḥ śaknotīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7162: tathābhūtāyāṃ ca tasyāmeteṣāṃ samayo grāhya ityanyonyāśrayatvam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7165: tarhi buddhirjñānamityevāstu kimanekaśabdoccāraṇenetyāśaḍkya paramatamapākartṛm ityāha---bhāṣyakāra eveti sphuṭamiti---upapattisārthyāditi bhāṣyāvayayavaṃ vyācaṣṭe---paryāyeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7186: mayeti hi cetanoparāgo darpaṇasyeva mukhoparāgo bhedāgrahādatāttvikaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7187: idamiti viṣayoparāgaḥ indriyapraṇālikayā pariṇātibhedo darpaṇasyeva malasaṃbandhaḥ pāramārthikaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7191: tena saha yaḥ puruṣoparāgasyātāttvikasya saṃbandho darpaṇapratibimbitasya mukhasyeva tadgatamalinimnā sopalabdhiriti teṣāṃ rahasyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7193: sā ca na tāvad buddheḥ, tasyā acaitanyāditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7203: na hi tatra darpaṇasya śarīrasya vā bhrama iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7204: api ca buddhirātmānaṃ cetayamānā bhrāmyet, puruṣeṇa vā cetyamānā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7206: na ca svataḥ parato vā aprakāśamānaiva buddhirbhrāmyatīti yuktam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7207: na hyadṛśyamāna eva darpaṇaḥ timire maitrasannidhānamātreṇa tatpratibimbamudgrāhayati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7211: vaidharmyādindriyaprakaraṇādapasāritasya buddhikramonneyatayā pravṛttihetutayā ca tayoḥ madhyer'thādavasaro manasa ityāha---kramapraptamiti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7218: indriyaṃ pradhānīkṛtya vā ātmani sahakārivāda iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7225: tathā hi yadā sukhādyupalabdhīnāṃ kriyātvena karaṇatayā mano 'numitam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7233: tathā ca tadavacchedena vṛttilābhe śirasi me vedanā,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7239: tathāpi tasyaivendriyatve svābhāvike adhikakalpanāyāṃ pramāṇābhāvāt dharmigrāhakapramāṇabādhaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7240: atha jñānakrameṇendriyasahakāritayā tadanumānaṃ tadā sutarāmeva prāguktadoṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7241: yadi tu manaso vaibhave 'pi adṛṣṭavaśāt krama upapadyate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7248: balavatā kulālena dṛḍhadaṇḍanunnamapi cakraṃ na bhrāmyet /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7249: yatra tu dṛṣṭānusaṃhāreṇa adṛṣṭasya vyāpāraḥ tatra tadveguṇyāt kāryānudayo yathā paramāṇukarmaṇāḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7250: tadihāpi yadi viṣayendriyātmasamavadhānam eva jñānahetuḥ, tatsadbhāve sadaiva kāryaṃ syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7254: tacca yadyapi sarvāṇyevendriyāṇi vyāpnoti, tathāpi karaṇadharmatvena kriyākramaḥ saṃgacchate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7255: akalpite tu tasmin nāyaṃ nyāyaḥ, pratipatturakaraṇatvāt cakṣurādīnāmanekatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7256: tasmādantaḥkaraṇamastīti cet? nanvevamapi yugapajjñānāni mā bhuvan /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7260: teṣvapi bhavatyeveti cet---na, vyāsaṅgakāle jñānakrameṇa vivādaviṣaye kramānumānāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7263: yadabubhutsite viṣaye jñānasāmagryāṃ satyāmapi na jñānamapi tu tatra saṃskāraviśeṣādhāyakaḥ pratyayaḥ syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7265: tathā ca ghaṭāyonmīlitaṃ cakṣuḥ paṭaṃ na darśayet /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7266: tasmād bubhutsāpīndriyāntarādākṛṣya bubhutsitārthagrāhiṇīndriye mano niveśayantī yugapat jñānānutpattāvupayujyate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7269: gandhādikriyānyatve satīti vārttikaṃ yathāśrutaṃ dravyakarmādijñānenānaikāntikamato vyācaṣṭe---cakṣurādibhya iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7272: tato naite karaṇāntarakalpanāyāṃ prabhavantītyata āha---atra ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7274: nanvindriyatvenaiva mano 'pi janakaṃ smṛtyādīnāṃ tathātve sākṣātkāritvaprasaḍgāditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7282: na ca tadantareṇa viśeṣalakṣaṇāvakāśa ityāśaḍkya sūtravākyaṃ bhinatti---ārambhaḥ pravṛttiḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7286: yadi tvayatamānasyaivecchāmātraṃ jñānamātraṃ dveṣamātraṃ vā pravṛttiḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7289: atra yadyapi vāgityādiyathāśrutaviśeṣalakṣaṇāvasare dayādyasaṃgraha iti vuddhipadaṃ mano 'bhiprāyeṇa vyākhyātaṃ bhāṣyakṛtā,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7290: tathāpi viśiṣṭadevatādyanucintanādyasaṃgraha ityata āha---sa ca dvividheti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7291: jñātuṃ jñāpayituṃ vā prayatnaḥ ubhayathāpi jñānahetuḥ, tena vāggocaro 'pi prayatnaḥ saṃgṛhītaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7292: kartuṃ kārayituṃ vā prayatnaḥ ubhayathāpi kriyāhetuḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7295: tadarthaṃ prayatno jñānaṃ janayan jñāpakahetuviṣayo bhavatīti jñāpakaikadeśena vācopalakṣayatā svasamavetajñānamātraheturityapi bhramo nirastaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7296: kāyanimitteti kāyo nimittaṃ viṣayatayā yasyāḥ sā tathoktā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7297: dānasteyādyartha yaḥ khalu prayatnaḥ sa kāyaviṣayo bhavati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7298: evaṃ manonimittaṃ dayādrohādyarthaṃ yaḥ khalu prayatnaḥ, sa manoviṣayo bhavatīti neyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7299: anyathā nāstyevāsau puruṣavyāpāro yatra kāyamanasī na nimittamiti //17 //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7311_0: atra ca samavāyo yadyapi na vyāpāraḥ tathāpi mohādeḥ pravartakasya svāśrayasamavetarāgadveṣamohajananāvāntaravyāpārasya
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7312: tena phalagocarau moharāgau mohadvaiṣau vā tatsādhanaviṣayau moharāgau mohadveṣau vā janayantau
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7316: vyāpāro 'pi ca kāryānuguṇa iti kṛtvā rāgādayaḥ pravartayanti pravṛttihetutvād doṣā ityucyatante //18 //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7320: śarīrādīnāṃ doṣaparyantānāṃ parityāgapūrvakaḥ prāptilakṣaṇo dharmaḥ pretyabhāva iti tadanantaramevāsyāvasara ityāha---uddeśakrameti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7322: na cotpattimātraṃ pretyabhāvaḥ, ekasminnapi janmani tathāvyavahāraprasaḍgāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7327: tathāpi kiṃ vakrokteḥ prayojanamityata āha---tathā ceti /
