GSP29nvtp1_1u:7328: nanu dvitīyasūtre duḥkhādīnāṃ kāryakāraṇabhāva saṃsāra ityuktam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7330: tat kuto na virodha ityāśayavato vārttikakṛta ākṣepaḥ, kaḥ punariti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7332_0: tatasteṣāṃ tathābhūtapravāhavicchede pretyabhāvāparanāmā saṃsāro vicchidyeta iti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7332_1: tulyapravṛttinimittatvāt sa eva tatra saṃsāra uktaityayo na virodha ityāśayavataḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7334: seyamuktarūpā punarūtpattiryadyacetanasya manasaḥ saṃsāraḥ kimiti nivartanīyaḥ?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7337: neyaṃ bhogenaviśeṣitā punarūtpattiḥ saṃsāra ityāśayavatā parihṛtam---yadīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7343: sāmānyena jñātā hi viśiṣṭatayā jñātuṃ śakyante /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7348: yadyapi svarūpato 'pi pravṛtteḥ kāryabhūtau dharmādharmau prati doṣāṇāmatiśayenopayogo,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7351: tathāpi pravṛttiphale doṣāṇāmupayogo darśanīyaḥ sūtre prakṛtatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7356: svarūpatastu pravṛtti prati doṣāṇāṃ sahakāritvaṃ sūtrakāra eva caturthe vakṣyatīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7357: tat kiṃ nirdeṣasya sukhaduḥkhe na sta ityupāttakarmapracayasya tādavasthyamadattaphalasyaiva vā vināśa ityata āha---na cāstīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7358: na brūmo nirdeṣasya upabhoga eva nāsti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7366: nanu lakṣaṇaśabdo yadi svarūpavacanaḥ syāt, gauṇaduḥkhāvyāptiḥ syāt āvṛttau vākyabhedaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7372: duḥkhatayā tadviṣayatvaṃ tathātve ca duḥkhatvamiti lokasuprasiddhena bādhanābuddhiviṣayatvena heyatāyāḥ prasādhanāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7373: yo hi duḥkhaṃ taddhetuṃ vā śarīrādi tadanuṣaktaṃ vā sukhaṃ jānāno 'pi sukhatṛṣṇāpariplutamatirna hātumicchati,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7379: yadyapi rāgābhāvo vairāgyaṃ tathāpi suṣuptyādau tasya bhāve mokṣānupayuktatayā ātyantiko vivakṣitaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7383: upanateṣvapi viṣayeṣvaudāsīnyaṃ kiṃ tadupekṣābuddhiḥ prabalatattvasākṣātkārasamunmūlitaniravaśeṣamavidyāsaṃskāre heyopādeyapakṣavyavacchedavatī buddhirityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7384: śarīrādiṣu uktaḥ uktarūpa eva grāhya ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7388: yathā ca kālotkarṣaḥ sukhasyāgamikaḥ, tathā svarūpotkarṣo 'pyānubhavika āgamikaśceti draṣṭavyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7390: dharmaphalaṃ hi duḥkhābhāvo bhavan pradhvaṃso vaktavyaḥ, prāgabhāvāderasādhyatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7393: na hi brahmalokopabhogānantaramevāvaśyaṃ duḥkhena bhavitavyamityasti niyāmakam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7394: yathā ca viśiṣṭaśālisūpādinā kulmāṣapiṇḍikayā codarapūraṇe kṛte duḥkhanivṛttistulyā,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7395: tathendrabrāhmapadayorapīti na kaścit svarūpato viśeṣaḥ syāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7396: api ca svargārthī yāgādikaṃ kṛtvā kadācillabdhavṛtteradharmānnarakaduḥkhamanubhūya svargamanubhavati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7399: na cānutpannasya pradhvaṃsaḥ tasmād dharmaṃ caritvā avaśyamakāmayamāno 'pi prathamatastāvannarakādiduḥkhamanubhavet /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7405: śarīrādiṣu pratiyogiṣu lakṣiteṣu tannivṛttirūpasyāpavargasya lakṣaṇāvasara ityāha---krameti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7407: tathāpi karmopagrahamantareṇa tasyākiñcitkaratvāt sa eva tasya janmeti jāyamānāḥ sarva ityuktam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7408: atra ca pratiyogināṃ śarīrādīnāmādhyātmikatvāt tatpradhvaṃso 'pyādhyātmika eva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7409: tadviśiṣṭasya jīvanmuktyuttarakāle duḥkhasyātyanatābhāvo mokṣa iti nākāśādigatena duḥkhasyātyantābhāvena vyabhicāraḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7410: pariṇāmo hi pūrvadharminivṛttau dharmyantarotpādo vā syāt, vaināśikānāmiva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7416: yadi dharmadharmiṇorekāntenābhedo yadi vā bhedābhedaḥ, ubhayathāpi na kūṭasthānityatā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7423: yathā ghaṭādayo brahmadharmā anityāḥ, tathā tadabhinnasvabhāvaṃ brahmāpyanityaṃ syādityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7427: na caikāntabhinna evāyaṃ brahmadharmaprapañco 'stu iti vācyam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7431: nityamityādi bhāṣyaṃ na yathāśrutaṃ paramatotthāpanamityata āha---asyārtha iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7438: yadyenāśrīyate tattena nityena tadvat, yathā paṭena tantava ityutthāpya dūṣayatītyāha---atra ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7440: nanu sukhatatsaṃvedanena brahmayaṇo bhinno brahma cānuditānastamitarūpaṃ śuddhabuddhasvabhāvaṃ svata eva siddham /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7441: kastatra pramāṇapraśnāvakāśaḥ? sarveṣāmeva pramāṇānāmanubhava eva sīmā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7444: viṣayasukhasaṃvedane evātmā tadatirikto vā? ādyaṃ dūṣayati---sukhamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7447: na ca kalpito virūddhadharmādhyāso bhedahetuḥ sphaṭikasyāpi javātāpicchādisannidhānāpāditārūṇimanīlimādinā bhedaprasaḍgādityāśaḍkya pariharati---na cātmaiveti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7448: na hyasti saṃbhavaḥ sphaṭikaḥ svarūpeṇa pūrvāparakālaikatayā sphuranneva nīlīdivyāvṛttātmā nīlādyātmanāropyata iti bhāvaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7452: ayamarthaḥ, na tāvat sa eva tasminneva tadānīmeva bhrānto 'bhrāntaśceti saṃbhavati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7453: tasmādavidyāyā durghaṭatvaṃ nāmālaḍkāra eveti pādaprasārikayā pratyavastheyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7456: pratibimbe tu suvyakta eva bhrama iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7459: ki tvātmaiva nityacaitanyasvabhāva ityata āha---na cātmaiveti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7461: ghaṭamahaṃ jānāmīti tadajñāsiṣamitivat sukhenāhaṃ svapimīti tadajñāsiṣamityevamapi smaraṇaprasaḍgāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7462: tarhi kimidaṃ sukhamahamasvāpsamiti duḥkhābhāvānumānamātraṃ supto 'haṃ na kiñcidajñāsiṣamiti jñānābhāvānumānavat /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7464: ko dharmī? ātmā anubhūyamānaḥ smaryamāṇo vā pratyabhijñāyamānaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7469: yathā prāgupalabdhaḥ paścādupalabhyamāno ghaṭo madhyāvasthāyāṃ nāyaṃ jñāta iti jñānābhāvaviśiṣṭo 'numīyata iti na kiñcidanupapannam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7470: stāmātmano jñānasukhe bhinne na tu mithastathā ca sukhātmakaṃ jñānamātmani jñānāntareṇa yadi nānubhūyata /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7471: evametat, svayamapi na prakāśata iti tvasiddhamityata āha---sukhaṃ ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7472: tadevamātmani sukhaṃ nityaṃ bhinnaṃ bhinnanaiva jñānena prakāśyamānamāstheyam tatra bhāṣyavārtike ityāha---tadevamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7474: yena tatrāpi viṣayamātrāpekṣāyāṃ manasaiva rūpādyupalabdhiprasaḍgo na syāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7475: atha bahirmanaḥsāpekṣaṃ nanvantariti parihāraḥ, sa ihāpīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7477: āpāditaprayāsavaiyarthyaparihāraṃ parasya vārttikakṛto hṛdisthaṃ sphuṭīkaroti siddhāntavārttikaṃ saṃgamayitum---nanu tvanmata iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7478: yathā hi śāstreṇa pravartamānaḥ pravartayitvayaḥ, tathā sa eva śakyasādhane /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7483: na hi tasya saṃbandhalakṣaṇā prāptirapratisaṃkramatvāt nāpi tādātmyalakṣaṇā,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7493: prayojanaṃ tu duḥkhābhāvaḥ, tasya nirvartyatvāditi vastugatiḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7496: yathāvidyopadarśanaṃ tu pravṛttiḥ sukhe 'pi samāneti, tatrāha---dharmādharmāviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7497: tadidaṃ pūrvoktaṃ hṛdi nidhāyoktam---śakyau bhogena kṣetumiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7498: na kevalamiyaṃ nityasukhadṛṣṭirmokṣānupayoginī, pratyuta virodhinītyāha---anyathā tviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7502_1: na viparītaprayojano vā bhavitumarhatīti bhāktatvamevānandaśrutīnāṃ nyāyyamityāha---tasmāditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7504: yadyapi kiñcinnārabhate nopādatte tathāpi nimittatayā kiñcitkurvan san bhaviṣyatīti cet?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7518: sarveṣāṃ pramāṇādhīnatvāt prameyasya tu bubhutsitatamatvāt tābhyāṃ saṃśayādīnāmapakarṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7519: sāṅgepāṅge ca nyāye vyutpādye pūrvāṅgatayā prakaraṇāntarebhyaḥ saṃśayādiprakāraṇasyotkarṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7521: na ca prayojanamanusandhāya saṃśaya iti saṃśayasya prāthamyamevaṃlakṣaṇakrame 'pi nyāyaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7524: nanu saṃśayasāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ cedidam, vimarśaḥ saṃśaya ityetāvadevāstu /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7528: vimarśa ityanena ca viṣayataḥ svarūpataśca sāmānyalakṣaṇadvayaṃ sūcitam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7539: saṃśayapadasannidhaśca vimarśapadaṃ vivakṣitamarthamāheti tatsahitamevoktavāniti parasparaniṣedhavadubhayavidhipradhāna ekaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7541: parasparaviraharūpavidhiniṣedhapradhāno 'nya iti yathāsaṃkhyaṃ viśiṣṭaḥ saṃśayo lakṣya ityāha---atra viśiṣṭa iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7543: guṇagataṃ saṃśayo lakṣya ityāha---atra viśiṣṭa iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7550: iha vārtikakāreṇa samānadharmopapatterityādau sattāmātreṇa saṃśayāhetutayā upalabdheraśrutyā ca pūrvapakṣayitvā samādhānatrayamabhihitaṃ tadvivecayati---yadyapīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7554: tṛtīye tu sattāvacana eva lakṣaṇayopalabdhipara iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7555: tatra viśeṣāpekṣa iti padaṃ tadā sāmānyajñānamākṣipet, yadi viśeṣajñānaṃ niṣedhet /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7558: yadyapi viśeṣāpekṣaśabdaḥ sākṣād viśeṣopalabdhi na niṣedhati, tathāpi lakṣaṇayā tatparaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7559: sā ca mukhye bādhakāt, vivakṣite saṃbandhāt avācakopādāne prayojanātt pravartate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7564: viśeṣamapekṣata iti hi viśeṣāpekṣaḥ saṃśaya uktaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7565: tathā ca viśeṣe jijñāsājanaka ityukte phalamasya darśitaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7571: tad vārttikamukhenaiva pariharati---na ceyamalaukikī lakṣaṇetyādi yena prayojanamanurudhyeteti śeṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7572: nanu kṛtakatvaṃ paricchedasya hetuḥ, na vyavacchedasyetyata āha---api tvanityatvasyeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7573: nanu tathāpi vivakṣitatajjātīyavṛttitve satyanyavṛttireva dharmaḥ samānaśabdavācya iti kuto niyama ityata āha---samāno hīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7576: yadi hi samāno dharmo vyavacchedaheturiti kutaḥ sādhakabādhakapramāṇābhāvaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7581: tasmāt tasminnasatyapi na vaktavyasyāvakāśa iti darśayitumiyaṃ yuktirukteti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7583: pūrvaṃ hi karaṇākaraṇayorguṇadoṣau na cintitau, idānīṃ tau cintyete ityapaunaruktyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7587: tathā hi saptamo rasaḥ saṃśayajñāne dharmitayā viṣayaḥ syād, dharmatayā vā?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7588: na kadācilloka evaṃ sandigdhe yadayaṃ saptamo rasaḥ sthāṇurvā puruṣo veti, dravyaṃ vā guṇo veti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7589: nāpyevaṃ sandigdhe ayamupalabhyamānaḥ padārthaḥ saptamo vā raso daśamaṃ vā dravyamiti?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7590: saptamo rasaḥ kimasti nāsti veti sandeho bhavatyeveti cet na, ananubhūte smaraṇābhāvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7594: yathā hi tathāvidhapratyayajanyaḥ saṃskāraḥ, tathā tadudbodhyo 'pīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7598: vārttikakṛt ityata āha---aneketi na sarvatra dravyādau saṃyogajatvamato viśeṣayati---kāryadravya ityādi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7600: bādhakaṃ dṛṣṭavā jaghanyāṃ vṛttim ālambya bhāṣyakṛtā sūtraṃ vyākhyātamiti darśayanniva vārttikam avatārayati---bhāṣyakṛdvyākhyayeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7602: yadi lākṣaṇikamidaṃ padaṃ kaḥ saṃbandha ityāśayavāniti śeṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7603_0: avadhyavadhimadbhāvaḥ saṃbandhaḥ iti saṃkalayya vārttikārthamāha---etaduktaṃ bhavatīti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7606: pūrvaṃ hi vibhāgajatvādinā svāśraya eva śabdastadviparītebhyo vyāvartata ityuktam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7607: idānīṃ tu svāśrayācchabdāntara eveti na nivartyata ityabhisandhiḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7609: tasyānekasya dharmo nivartakatayā yaḥ sa evāneka ityucyate iti vyākhyātamityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7610: nanvevaṃ sati kiṃ lakṣaṇayā yāvatā mukhya evānekaśabdo 'stu /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7611: tathā hi pūrvam anekasya dharmo 'nekadharmaḥ sākṣāt samavāyādivṛttyā cet samānapadenaiva gatārtha iti matvā dūṣitaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7614: yadi saṃbandhivacana evānekaśabdaḥ syānna dharmaśabdena samānādhikaraṇaḥ syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7615: tathā ca bahuvrīheralābhe dharmī na labhyetetyarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7616: evaṃ bhāṣyānugataṃ vārttikamupasaṃhṛtya svatantraṃ vārttikamutthāpya lakṣaṇānurodhena tāvad vyācaṣṭe---prakāreti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7619: tena viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyayorviśiṣṭabuddhihetutvenābhedamupacarya viśaiṣyavacano 'yam anekaśabdo viśeṣaṇe dharme prayuktaḥ ityāśayavānāha---bhedābhedapratyayaheturityartha iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7622: dravyaguṇakarmabhyo na tu śabdetarebhya eva, tadvyatirekasya saṃśayaṃ pratyanupayogāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7625: tathā pyasādhāraṇāt saṃśayo bhavan tajjātīyatāyāmeva paryavasyati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7626: na tu tadvyaktitāyām tajjātoyā api hi vidharmāṇo dṛśyante /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7627: na tu ta evetyetat sūcayitumanekavyaktiniṣṭhatā darśitā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7631: udāharaṇaparatāṃ sphuṭayitumasādhāraṇāvasare sādhāraṇamapi sadādi kimityupanyastamiti śaṅkāṃ nivārayati---dravyatvādikoṭīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7639: tat siddhāntaprasaṅgena niṣedhamupakramya vidhiparyavasānena darśayati---dravyakarmabhyāṃ vyāvartamānaḥ kiṃ guṇa ityādi //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7645: tato dravyanāśaviśiṣṭaṃ kālaṃ svatantraṃ vā avayavamapekṣya dalayorvartamāno vibhāga ākāśādideśād vibhāgaṃ karotīti vaiśeṣikāḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7647: prakṛtasya hi karmaṇo vibhāgadvayajanakatvaṃ krameṇa vā syād, yaugapadyena vā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7649: apekṣāyāṃ vā, ādyamapi vibhāgam anantarameva na kuryāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7652: na dvitīyaḥ, yadā ākāśādideśād vibhāgaṃ karoti karma ta tadāvayavāntarāditi sthitiriti vaiśeṣikāḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7654: ādye vibhāge hi kartavye karmaṇo nirapekṣatvāt sa eva kālaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7655: dvitīye tu kartavye prathamānantarakāla eva nairapekṣyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7662: tathātve vā yataḥ kutaścit karmaṇo yugapadubhayavibhāgopapattau calatyevāvayave sarvadravyanāśaprasaṅgaḥ, na caivam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7667: tadanurodhāt karmaṇo 'pi jātikṛtaṃ sahakārikṛtaṃ vā vailakṣaṇyamavaśyaṃ svīkartavyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7675: anyathā tatrāpyanayaiva diśā kāraṇamātrasaṃyogapūrvakāḥ kāraṇākāraṇasaṃyogāḥ kalpanīyāḥ syuḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7676: yathā ca tatra krame pramāṇaṃ nāsti tathehāpīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7679: yathā caitadvailakṣṇyaṃ tathā varamevamasatu yadekānārambhakasaṃyogapratidvandvinamanyā tu ārambhakānārambhakapratidvandvinaṃ janayatītyarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7680: tasmāt kāraṇamātravibhāgapūrvake kāraṇākāraṇavibhāge pramāṇaṃ nāstīti nābhyupagamyata ityetāvanmātravyaktīkaraṇaphalo 'yamanamyupagama ityāha---tasmāditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7687: yadyapi vibhāgāpekṣavibhāgāsamavāyikāraṇam asādhāraṇaṃ śabde tadeva vaktumucitam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7690: yadyapyevamapi vibhāgajatvāditi heturadoṣa eva, na hi vibhāgād dravyasya janma saṃbhavati,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7694: karmaṇo 'pi kāraṇaṃ vibhāgo bhavanna tāvadādyasya tasminnasati vibhāgasyaivānupapatteḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7696: yadā tu tannivṛttiruttarasaṃyogāt, tadā vibhāgasyāpīti kathamuttarakarmajanma vibhāgāt?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7704: samāno hi dharmaḥ pakṣe vartamānaḥ sapakṣavipakṣadharmābhyāmekajātīyaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7706: tathā ca pakṣe vartamānasya sapakṣavipakṣadharmābhyāṃ vijātīyatvamuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7711_0: samānaśabdena pratiyogitayā buddhāvasamāne 'pyusthāpite saṃśayakāraṇatve ca tasya
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7711_1: pramāṇasiddhe tasmin vaktavye yadanekapadamupādatte sūtrakārastena jānīmo nūnamayamevārtho
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7714: pratyabhijñānaṃ tāvadvyaktiviṣayakaṃ nāstyeva gakārādāviti dvitīye vyutpādanīyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7715: yadāpyasti tadāpyasya viṣayaḥ kiṃ vyaktirutajātiriti viṣayataḥ sandihyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7716: yadāpi vyaktirevāsya viṣayaḥ, tadāpi pramāṇamapramāṇaṃ veti sandeha ityabhiprāyavān saṃmugdhamāha
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7718: yadyapi gavādivyaktaya iva gotvādyupadhānā iti jātimātrapadārthavādī na svīkarotyeva,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7721: tadabhāve ca kathaṃ lakṣaṇāpīti? kathaṃ netyādi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7722: na ca vācyaṃ śabdasya tathābhāvasandehe 'pi ghaṭādau niścitatvena vyāptigraho yadi syāt ko doṣa iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7723: sarvopasaṃhāreṇa hi vyāptiniścaye yatkṛtakaṃ tadavaśyamanityamiti kṛtakatvaṃ śabde niścayameva kuryāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7729: vyāptidoṣe tu sarvopasaṃhārābhāvāt kathaṃ tadbalena buddhyādau sādhyasiddhiriti sandigdhatattvaṃ śabdaṃ vihāya vyāptiriti cet?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7730: evaṃ tarhi śabdādanyatve sati kṛtakatvāditi vācyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7731: tathā ca yadi daivāt śabdo 'pyanitya eva vastutaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7733: tasmāt sūṣṭhūktaṃ sandigdhe nityānityabhāve śabde kṛtakatvaṃ gatamiti nānityatvena svabhāvataḥ pratibaddhamiti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7734: pratyayabhedabheditvaṃ kāraṇatīvratvāditāratamyena tīvratīvratarāditvaṃ pratyekaṃ satpratipakṣatvam ityekaikasyānvayato vyatirekato vobhayakoṭyanupanāyakatayā na saṃśayahetutvam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7737: tathā ca tenaiva rūpeṇa saṃśayakāraṇatvaṃ nānyathetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7738: anunāsikatvādayo hi sāmānyaviśeṣāḥ pratyakṣā bhavantaḥ pratyakṣavyaktivṛttaya eva bhavitumarhanti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7741: kevalaṃ sa vyaktirākāśāśrayā vā, anyāśrayā veti vipratipattiḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7743: nanu tathāpi naiyāyikānāṃ mate śabdāśrayā evānunāsikatvādayo dharmā, na ca pakṣeṇaitra vyabhicāraḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7751: astyātmā nāstyātmetyudāharaṇaṃ tu bhāṣyakṛtaiva darśitaṃ sphuṭamiti na prapañcitaṃ vārtikaṭīkākārābhyām /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7756: etacca tṛtīye prapañcanīyamitīhopekṣitam, śabdo nitya ityeke /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7761: anabhyāsadaśāpannopalabdhau hi pramāṇottarabhāvāniścaye buddhitvasāmānyopalabdheḥ satyatvāsatyatvasaṃdeha iti yadyabhimatam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7763: tatastaddvāraker'the saṃdeha iha vivakṣita iti yadi, so 'pi svarūpato deśakālataḥ prakārato vati?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7768: tṛtīye tvāha---na nāgo vā nago veti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7770: etāvāṃstu viśeṣo yat sthāṇurvā puruṣo vetyatropalabdhyanupalabdhī anutpādādevāvyavasthite /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7771: prakṛte tūdāharaṇe jātameva jalajñānamaprāmāṇyaśaṅkayā na vyavasthitamiti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7773: yadi viśeṣasmṛtisahitāyā ayogyānupalabdheḥ dharmiṇamanantarbhāvya saṃśayaḥ syāt sa tāvannātyantānupalabdhakoṭyullekhī,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7776: na hi bhavati paramāṇurasti naveti astyeva yataḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7778: tathā ca sa upalabdhaḥ sannanvayato vyatirekato vipratipattito vā viśeṣau smārayet,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7786: pūrvāṅgatvāviśeṣe 'pi saṃśaye sati prayojanānusaṃdhānāt tataḥ prayojanasyāpakarṣa ityuktamṛ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7791: arthapadaṃ bhāṣyakāreṇa anūdyāpi na vivṛtamityata āha---sasādhanāviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7794: atra ca ṭīkāyāṃ yadyapi tathāpīti tadacatuṣṭayamadhyāharanti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7796: tathā ca prāmāṇikatvādeva prayojanaṃ na vaktavyamiti vākyārthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7798: tacca tvayā vyutpāditamityata āha---na ca pramāṇamīdṛśamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7800: tathā ca pramāṇopapannaṃ na vācyamiti vadataḥ svacaritāvirodha ityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7803: kva ca prayojayati, svātmanyeva vā svasādhane vā?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7804: kathaṃ ca vyāpakaṃ svarūpeṇa, karmavidyādvārā veti parīkṣāsādhyamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7805: na brūmaḥ prayojanaṃ nyāyasya aṅgamupakārakam, kiṃ tu prayojanavān nyāyastadgatācintāṅgīkarotīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7811: gauṇaṃ prayojanaṃ mukhyasyaiva prayojanasya kṛte upādīyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7814: etadeva hi mukhyasya mukhyatvam, yadananyārthatayā puruṣāpekṣitatvam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7823: yathā svargasya yāgānaṅgasyāpi abhisandhānaṃ svayamaphalamapi yāgapravṛttiṃ prati kāraṇatayā saṃnidhīyamānamaṅgamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7825: anye tu, kiṃ tu mukhyamityavacchidya vyācakṣate, pradhānamuddeśyamiti yāvaditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7827: akṣarārthastu vārttikasya ya khalu niṣprayojanā cintā prayojanābhisandhānaśūnyaḥ saṃśayo nāsau nyāyasya pravartaka iti sphuṭatvānnoktaḥ //14 //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7831: saṃśaye prayojane ca sati kva punaretat sādhyasambaddhaṃ sādhanamupalabheya,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7834: na ca sāmānyalakṣaṇamantareṇa viśeṣalakṣaṇāvatāra iti tatsūcakaṃ sūtraṃ tathaiva vyācaṣṭe---sādhyasādharmyāditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7836: tathā cāvinābhāvaviṣayatayā aryyate yaḥ, sor'tho dṛṣṭānta iti sāmānyalakṣaṇalābhaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7846: api tu vastusthita eva jñāpyata iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7852: evaṃ nyāyapūrvāṅgaprakaraṇaṃ samarthya parikalitasāmarthyaṃ sādhanaṃ yatropaneyaṃ sa siddhāntāparanāmā nyāyasyāśrayo 'vasaraprāptatvāducyata iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7854: sūtramapaṭhitvā vyākhyānaṃ tu kuta ityata āha---atreti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7855: bhāṣyakārasya rītiriyam, svapratibhayā svatantrasūtravivaraṇaṃ bhāṣyamiti lakṣaṇāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7856: saṃsthitiritthambhāvavyavastheti bhāṣyaṃ dṛṣṭvā idamiti sāmānyābhyupagame siddhāntabhramaḥ syāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7859: viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvaṃ prati kāmacārāditi ca prathama sūtra evoktam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7864: kathaṃ vyatirekamāha---yo 'tho na śāstrita ityata āha---aśāstrito 'prāmāṇika iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7866: tathā ya vyatikrame 'pi teṣāṃ nāpasiddhānto bhavedityata āha--ābhimānikaṃ ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7867: etaccāgrato vārttikakāra eva tatpratyayādabhyupagama iti vadan sphuṭīkariṣyatīti //27 //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7870: nanu sadṛśatantrāsiddho 'ṣyarthaḥ kvacidabhyupagamyamānaḥ siddhānto yathā prābhākare niyogo vākyārthaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7877: ekatra kutracit siddho na sarvatrasiddha ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7879: anyathā sarvatantrasiddho 'pi samānatantrasiddha eveti bhramaḥ syāditi //29 //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7885: yasyārthasya sarvajñatvāderviśeṣasya siddhau kṣityādeḥ sakartṛkatvasya pratikriyamāṇasya siddhiḥ sa sarvajñatvādirviśeṣo 'dhikaraṇasiddhāntaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7886: atha vā yasya sakartṛkatvādeḥ siddhāvantarbhūtā anye 'bhiprāyaprakāntāḥ sarvajñatvādayo 'pi viśeṣāḥ sidhyanti so 'dhikaraṇasiddhānta iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7887: tadatra pakṣadvaye 'pi phalato na kaścid viśeṣa iti manvānaḥ śliṣṭaṃ bhāṣyaṃ vyācaṣṭe,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7895: nanu ca pakṣo vā heturvā kaṇṭhata eva niyatatantrābhyupagamāt pratitantrasiddhāntānna bhidyata ityata āha---anena rūpeṇeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7901: nanvetadantarbhāvamantareṇa kimupalabdhimatpūrvakatvameva pratyetuṃ na śakyata ityata āha---nānyatheti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7905: tacca jñānaṃ dvyaṇukādyadṛṣṭaparyantapakṣīkaraṇe yadi sarvaviṣayaṃ na sidhyet, na sidhyedeveti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7906: tasmād yathā gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa ityatra tīralakṣaṇāmantareṇa gaṅgāpadārtho na ghoṣapadārthamanveti yathā sakartṛkapadārtho 'pi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7908: na caivaṃ kevalavyatirekividhvaṃsaḥ, abhiprāyāvyāptasya tadviṣayatvādityuktam, vakṣyate ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7909: tadevaṃ prathamaṃ vyākhyānaṃ bhāṣyānusāreṇa samarthya dvitīye vārttikaṃ sphuṭamityāha---tadetaditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7915: nanu bhāṣyamata eva sūtraṃ sphuṭārthamityata āha---sūtraṃ caivamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7921: manaḥparihāre vā sarvendriyavilopaḥ prasajyata ityabhihite punaḥ sūtrakāreṇa rūpādijñānaṃ cakṣurādisādhanamasatu niḥsādhanameva tu sukhādijñānamityāśaṅkya sūtritam---
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7925: yadi hyanabhimata evāyamartho 'sya, kathaṃ parīkṣyaṃ vyavasthāpayedityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7926: idaṃ ca svābhimatonnayanaprakārāviṣkaraṇaṃ sūtrakṛtaḥ śiṣyahitatayetyato lakṣaṇārthamāha---so 'yamiti uktārthānuṣaṅgiṇaḥ arthasyābhyupagamo 'bhyupagamasiddhānta ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7930: tamimaṃ vibhāgalakṣaṇaprapañcaṃ sarva evāyaṃ pakṣa iti pūrvapakṣavārttikavivaraṇavyājena saṃkalayyāha---sarvatantretyādi //31 //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7937: upaneyanyāyaprakaraṇam ārabhyata iti sphuṭārthaṃ bhāṣyam---athāvayavā iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7943: yathāyogaṃ vicāryavastugocarastajjñānagocaraśceti vicāramātre tu sārvahetukaḥ, svaparaniṣṭhaśca /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7949: sa cādau vipratipattyā paścāt pratijñayā gatārtha iti matvā tarkābhiprāyeṇa vyācaṣṭe---yadi śabdo nityaḥ syāditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7950: vyudasyate hi tena saṃśayaḥ phalataḥ svarūpataśca /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7952: saṃśayo hi dve koṭī parispṛśya vartamānāṃ jijñāsāmapi tathābhūtāmeva janayati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7954: tadevaṃ tāvantarā vartamānastarka ekasyāṃ koṭau pramāṇabādhitaṃ kañcidarthamāharan tadgatāmicchāṃ vicchidya dvitīyakoṭau niyamayati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7956: enāṃ ca janayatā tarkeṇa saṃśayaphalaṃ prabalecchā tadaiva vyudasyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7960: utpatticintaivopayogitvāt tatra tatra kṛtā, kariṣyate ca /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7966: tena sādhyatayā svīkriyamānasyārthasya vacanaṃ pratijñeti sūtrārthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7971: yathā ca neyaṃ bhrāntiḥ tathā dvitīye nivedayiṣyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7973: candraśabdo 'yaṃ śaśivācakaḥ prayojyavṛddhaṃ prati asati vṛttyantare tatpratyayajanakatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7977: evamuttaratra yastu naivaṃvidho na vācyo na lakṣya ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7979: pakṣa eveti darśayitumiṣṭagrahaṇaṃ bhaviṣyatītyata āha---na ca kvacidapīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7980: bhavedevaṃ yadi vidhādvayaṃ syāt, na tvetadastītyarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7987: etena vārttikakārīyo 'bhyupagamasiddhāntastāvaducita iti darśayatā chalataḥ pañcamasiddhāntāpattirdaśitā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7992_0: yatra yatra pramādike 'pyarthe śāstravirodhaścodyeta tatra tatrābhyupagamasiddhānto
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7992_1: 'yaṃ mametyevamapi nistārāt parāvṛttya ca tenaiva niranuyojyānuyogena nigrahe kathāsamāptau
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7998: tasmāt na hi śāstrāśrayā vādā bhavantīti svapnavilāpaḥ ityarthaḥ //33 //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8001: iha pratijñārthaḥ sarvathaiva kathāsu nopayujyate, arthopalabdhyā yukto 'pyanyathaiva labdhaḥ?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8006: nigṛhnīyād veti na saṃpratītirnaca vijayo gardabhīkṣīramathanavadanarthakaḥ prayāsaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8007: nāpi dvitīyaḥ, sa hi vivādād vā avayavāntarād vā?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8014: vayamapi hi parābhyupetapakṣaviparītāṃ koṭimupanīya tatsiddhaye 'vayavāntaramabhidadhyāditi brūmaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8016: nāpi tṛtīyaḥ, na hi hetvādibhiḥ caturbhiḥ pratijñārtho 'bhidhīyata iti vakṣyāmaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8017: nāpi caturthaḥ, sa hyapekṣākāle vā, anyadā veti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8022: na tu tannirṇayahetubhūtasādhanāvabodhavanato vivādaviṣayaṃ nirṇayasya nirṇeyarūpamantareṇa nirūpayitumaśakyatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8025: tathā ca tasyaiva prathamābhidhāne prāpte 'nyasyābhidhānānavakāśāt ākṣepasyāpi kuto 'vakāśa iti?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8026: nanvapekṣitānabhidhāne 'pyapekṣitaṃ kurvāṇaḥ kathamavavadheyavacano nāmetyata āha---yathā ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8028: tatrāpi tadanabhidhāne viparītabuddhiḥ kimaṅgaḥ yatra vacanenaivāpekṣitasiddhirityarthaḥ anyadeti pakṣamupasthāpayati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8031: yo hi yena yat sādhayitum udyataḥ sa tatsāmagrīmapratikūlayanneva tathā kartumarhati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8034: pratipādyāpekṣāniyamānurodhena tatra tatheti cet? tadihāpi samānam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8035: tathā ca tatkālātikrameṇākṣepo 'pi nopayogī, śiromuṇḍanāntaraṃ nakṣatraparīkṣāvat /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8040: tathāpi hetvabhidhānena kiṃ tatsvarūpasyopanayenaiva sākṣādabhidhānādityata āha---anityaḥ śabda iti tvapekṣita ukta iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8042: na hyanityaḥ śabda ityukte kṛtakatvānityatvavyāptau vā kṛtakatvasya vā śabdadharmisaṃbandhe śroturākāṅkṣā kiṃ nāma kuta etatpratipattavyamiti syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8044: ata eva gamakatvādetasya mārgasya sarvaśāstrakārā evamevopādadate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8054: dvitīye tu śabdoccāraṇasya nārthagaterapyadhikaṃ prayojanaṃ nāma,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8056: nanu sāmānyalakṣaṇamantareṇa na viśeṣalakṣaṇāvasara ityata āha---śrutyarthābhyāmiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8059: tathā ca kathaṃ vākyāvayava ityata āha---yadyapīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8061: sādhyate pratipādyate tenāpi hi svārtha ityata āha---yadi tviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8064: atha sādhyapadaṃ vihāya sādhanaṃ pratipādakaṃ vacanamityarthaḥ, tatrāha---atheti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8066: yadi tvevaṃ kriyeya liṅgapratipādanadvāreṇa sādhyasādhanaṃ niścāyakaṃ vacanamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8070: vacanapadamasūtrasthameva ṭīkākṛtā svayamupanīyavirodhātivyāptī kutaḥ śaṅkite iti śaṅkā nivartate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8077: tathācāyaṃ kṛtaka ityasmānna nivartate, api tu kṛtakatvādityasmādeva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8078: tarhi kiṃbhūtamupanayāt pratīyata ityata āha---kiṃ tviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8083: na hi hetuvadupanayo 'pi kuta ityākāṅkṣāyā pravartate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8086: tathāpi prakṛto vivādaviṣayaḥ kiṃ vyāptadharmaviśiṣṭo na vetyapekṣāyāṃ sā ca tathā cāyaṃ kṛtaka ityanenaiva paraṃ nivartyate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8088: tasmānna hetūpanayayorarthato rūpataḥ prayojanato vā saṃkara ityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8089: nanu ca vacanalakṣaṇāyāṃ yadyapi jñāner'the vā na prasaṅgaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8090: tathāpi sādhyasādhanamiti kṛtakatvamatra heturityādau vacana eva prasaṅgaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8094: na ca kuta ityākāṅkṣāyāṃ sādhyasādhanamiti vā kṛtakatvaṃ heturiti vā vacanamaupayikam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8096: tena viśeṣaparatvena heturiti lakṣyanirdeśo nānupapanna iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8098: na kvacit pradeśo sādharmyaṃ hetulakṣaṇatvena vihitam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8100: nāpyatra viśeṣaṇaśūnyasyaiva sādharmyasyopādānam yena tāvanmātragocaro vidhirbhavet,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8111: viśeṣato jñātānāṃ teṣā svavākye parivarjanādimukhena bhavatvityetadarthamarthalabdhamapi kaṇṭhoktyābhidhīyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8116: udāhṛte hetau lakṣaṇaṃ yojayituṃ hetvarthe ca vivecayitavye prasaṅgāt pratijñārthaṃ vivecayitumiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8117: tathāpi pradhvaṃsasya nānātvāt jātyāderupasaṃgrāhakasya vā bhāvāt kathaṃ vyāptyādisiddhiḥ?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8118: upalakṣyābhedamātreṇa ca tatsiddhau kuṇḍalavatā devadattena sādhyo vyavahāro daṇḍavatāpi sādhyetetyata āha---virodhīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8123: utpadyate ghaṭa ityatra tu ghaṭo na kārakamasattvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8124: tataśca akārakasyaiva kārakairatyantasannidhestathopacāro vā kārakāṇāmeva kāryaśabdopacāro vā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8125: ubhayathāpi vyāpārāveśasamaya evākhyātaprayogo na tu dhātvarthamātrāveśasamaye /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8126: na hi pakve dhātvarthamātramupādāya pacyata iti prayujyate lokaiḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8131: nanu na sapakṣatābhāvo 'tra sūtre śrūyate, nāpyārtho 'vadhāraṇasya ca vyāptyā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8132: pakṣe sattvenopapatteraikāntikaṃ sapakṣe sattvaṃ mā prasāṃkṣīt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8137: vastutastu, nedaṃ nirātmakaṃ jīvacchīrīraṃ māṃsādimayatvāt ityasaṃkīrṇamudāharaṇaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8138: etaddvayamapi nirākarta vaidharmyameva codāharaṇeneti pūrvāvadhāraṇena pakṣavyāptau labdhāyāṃ vaidharmyamevetyanena sādharmyarūpatā nirākṛtāvayamarthaḥ syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8139: pakṣasya vyāpako dharmastaditaravaidharmyarūpa eveti tathā cebhayorapi kaḥ prasaṃgaḥ?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8141: sa ca vipakṣodāharaṇeneti viśeṣayatā sapakṣābhāvapradarśanena nirastaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8142: yadi hi sati sapakṣe anvayo vivakṣitaḥ tadā tathā vaidharmyādityanārabhyameva,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8147: udāharaṇaṃ ca sapakṣo 'pi bhavatīti kathaṃ viśeṣalābha ityāśaṅkya vyācaṣṭe---vipakṣeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8148: vyākhyānato viśeṣapratipattirna hi sandehādalakṣaṇamiti bhāva iti tatra tatroktamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8151: tasmiśca sādhye sidvāsādhanaṃ vyatirekyasaṃbhavaśca svaśarīre prāṇasya prayatnapūrvakatvāvadhāraṇena svapakṣānvayasyāpi saṃbhavādityata āha---prāṇādineti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8152: tathāpyasmadāyatte śabdaprayoge kiścityavācakaṃ prayokṣyāmaha ityata āha---prāṇādikāraṇecchādikāraṇarahitamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8153: paraśarīre pakṣapraviṣṭe hetusiddhyarthaṃ vipakṣībhūte ca ghaṭādau sādhyarahite hetuvyatirekasiddhyarthaṃ tathoktamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8156: na ca kevalavyatirekī tāvanmātrasyānvayenaiva siddherityata āha---yaśceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8158: anena tu tadeva pṛthivyādivilakṣaṇaṃ sidhyatīti na niravakāśo vyatirekī /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8163: sandigdhasya ca jijñāsyatvāt viśeṣasmaraṇe ca saṃśayāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8165: dvidhā hi prakṛtavyatirekigatiḥ, kāryaṃ kāryavattā ca /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8167: tad yathā, icchādayo dravyāṣṭakātiriktadravyāśritāḥ, tadanāśritatve sati kāryatvāditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8168: iha tu kāryavattā darśitā nedaṃ nirātmakaṃ jīvaccharīraṃ necchādisamavāyikāraṇībhūtadravyaviśeṣarahitamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8175: na śarīrendriyamanaḥsvanyatamasminnete samavayanti, mānasaikapratyakṣatvāditi niṣedhe satītyarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8179: nanu yadi nāma sāmānyata icchādisamavāyikāraṇamātravyāvṛttirghaṭādau pratipannā kimāyātaṃ nairātmyasyetyata āha---nirātmakaśabdenāpīti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8180: evamarthagati pariśodhya vārttikaṃ yojayitvā dvatīyaṃ pradhānīkṛtyāha---etaduktaṃ bhavatīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8183: iśvarānumāna iva pakṣadharmatāvalenaiva vivakṣito viśeṣaḥ setsyatītyarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8184: nanvanvayinā viśeṣaṃ sādhayatā kevalavyatirekiṇaḥ kiṃ khaṇḍitam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8187: atha tenaiva viparyayasyāpi vaktuṃ sukaratvādityata āha---ṛjumārgeṇeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8189: tasyāparivarta eva ṛjutvam, parivartastaṃ vakratetyarthaḥ pariharati---kāraṇamātrasyeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8192: sa cābhiprāyeṇa vyāpyate, yatsiddhimanyareṇa śabdārthaḥ pratyetuṃ na śakyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8193: na ca dravyāṣṭakātiriktamapratītya teṣāṃ samavāyikāraṇameva pratyetuṃ na śakyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8194: na hīcchādīn prati pṛthivyāḥ samavāyikāraṇatve teṣāṃ tadvattā abhidhīyamānā virudhyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8206: na hi dravyāṣṭakānāśritatve sati yadāśritam, tadatiriktadravyāśritamityastyanvayaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8208: tasmāt vyatireka evārthaḥ, tadvān pariśeṣo vyatirekīti suṣṭhūktam //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8212: nanu yatra dravyāṣṭakātiriktadravyāśritā iti pratijñā, tatra yuktametat /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8213: yatra tu nedaṃ nirātmakamiti tatra nirātmakaśabdenāpi ayamevārtha ucyata iti vadatā icchādisamavāyikāraṇavirahaniṣedha eva pratijñārthaḥ svīkṛtaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8221: nanu tathāpi ghaṭādibhyo nirātmakebhya icchādivyatirekaḥ kiṃ tathābhūtadravyavyāvṛttikṛtaḥ?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8222: kiṃ vā bhūtānāmeva pariṇatibhedavyāvṛttikṛta iti sandigdhopādhikatvādagamaka evetyata āha---yathā ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8224: yadi sādhyenāsya kvacidapyanvayo nāsti, tadā viruddha evāyamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8231: ajñaistu tathā na vyavahriyata ityanyadetaditi śaṅkate---na ca pakṣa eveti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8232: vyavahāreturanvayaścintyate, na tu vyavahārya ityāśayavān pariharati---jijñāsiteti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8236: evaṃ tarhi sapakṣavat pakṣe 'pi nairātmyapratiṣedhe 'pi nātmasadbhāva iti parākṣepaṃ parihṛtya tadgranthaṃ paṭhati śarīrādiṣviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8237: vipakṣe hi sati sata eva kasyacid vyatirekaḥ pratīta iti pramāṇena pratīta iti pratipāditam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8238: tasya ca pramāṇapratītasya vyatirekasya pakṣe 'pi satyeva niṣedhaḥ pramāṇena kriyata iti yuktā niṣedhalakṣaṇā vidhisiddhiḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8239: sapakṣastu na kenacit pramāṇena pratīta iti na tatrānvayavyatirekatanniṣedhāḥ paramārthataḥ kenacitpramāṇena śakyate pratyetum /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8245: tadā pakṣe 'pi nairātmyaniṣedhe 'pi tāvanmātraparyavasāyitayā na sātmakatvaparyavasānamiti vārttikārthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8249: na tasya vyatirekavyabhicāro 'pi tasya vyatirekadharmatayā tadabhāve 'nupapatterityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8251: vyabhicāravadavyabhicāro 'pi taddharma eva so 'pi kathaṃ tadabhāve bhavedityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8255: nanvetāvatyeva sūtrārthe ko doṣaḥ syādityata āha---tathā satīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8256: śeṣamanumānalakṣaṇa iti sapakṣe siddha ityādi vṛttipadāntaradūṣaṇaśeṣam //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8262: sadṛśakṣaṇa sabhāgasantānalakṣaṇanirodhabhedena nirodhau dvau vināśau yayorapratisaṃkhyāpratisaṃkhyānirodhāviti paribhāṣā //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8278: tatra prapañcaṃ vihāya yāvanmātreṇa heturnirdhāryate tāvadupanyasyati---atreti //35 //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8282: prayoge kiṃ sautra eva kramo grāhyaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8283: kramāntaraṃ veti sandehamudāharaṇasya prayojanaṃ darśayan nivārayati---hetāviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8284: yato nāvyāpto nāpratītavyāptiko hetubhāve vyavatiṣṭhate sādhyasiddhāvekāgrībhavati,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8285: ato vyāpterbubhūtsitatvāt saiva pratipādayituṃ yujyata iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8288: na tūpanīya paścāt sāmarthyaṃ jijñāsanta iti sarvalokasiddhamiti saṃgatisaṃkṣepaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8289: tathāpi sāmānyalakṣaṇavibhāgau vinā nāvasaro viśeṣalakṣaṇasyetyata āha---sūtramitīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8290: nanūdāharaṇopalakṣaṇamaprakṛtamapi kasmādupādīyate? kasmācca vibhyatā lakṣaṇaṃ prakṛtamapahīyata
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8298: tena hi samānajātīyād vipakṣodāharaṇād vijātīyācca pratijñāderidaṃ vyavacchidyata iti boddhavyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8301: tena tādṛśena dṛṣṭāntena sādhanadharmaprayuktasādhyadharmavatā upalakṣitaṃ viṣayatayā tadviṣayaṃ vacanamudāharaṇaṃ sapakṣodāharaṇamityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8303: tathāpi vākyaśeṣabhūtenāpyanena bhavitavyamiti manyamānaḥ tadantarbhāvyaiva śaṅkāmutthāpayati---yasmāditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8304: iyaṃ cāśaṅkā tairāgāmivāvārttikaṃ dṛṣṭvā sādhyenaivetyavadhāraṇākṣepiketi buddham /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8310: sādharmyamiti viśeṣyasaṃgata evakāro 'nyayogaṃ vyavacchinatti, na tu sādharmyasyāprayojakatvamapi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8312: na ca pakṣo 'pi vipakṣa iti tatra tatra darśitameva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8313: sādharmyamevetyayamapi viśeṣaṇasaṃgata evakāro 'yogaṃ vyavacchindyāt, na tu tasyāprayojakatvamapi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8316: evaṃ ca sati prathamamavadhāraṇaṃ mandaprayojanamapi paraśucchedyatāṃ ko vā nakhacchedye sahiṣyata iti nyāyena darśitam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8318: nanvevaṃ sati hetulakṣaṇaṃ nyūnamaprayojakāvyudasanādityata āha---hetulakṣaṇe tviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8322: evamarthadvārakamudāharaṇābhāsacatuṣṭayaṃ darśayitvā śabdadvārakaṃ dvayaṃ darśayituṃ pīṭhamāracayati---pañcamīti //36 //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8328: yadyapyataddharmabhāvitvāt sādhyavaidharmyavān dṛṣṭānta udāharaṇamiti vyatyayo yujyate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8330: ata eva padāni vibhajya saṃkalitamarthamāha---etaduktaṃ bhavatīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8332: arthadvārakamābhāsacatuṣṭayaṃ vyudastam, yathā nityaḥ śabdaḥ śrāvaṇatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8340: yat punaricchādimanna bhavati, tannirātmakaṃ thā ghaṭa iti ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8343: na kevalaṃ sādhyasādharmyāt taddharmabhāvī dṛṣṭānta udāharaṇam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8355: iyāṃstu viśeṣaḥ kevalavyatirekiṇi sāmānyato 'nvayavyatirekiṇi tu viśeṣato 'pi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8356: yathā ca kevalavyatirekī satyapi sāmānyānvaye na tenopasaṃhartuṃ śakyaḥ, tathoktam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8363: satyam, sidhyatyanvayo na tu sapakṣe, kiṃ tu pakṣa eveti viśeṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8365: nanvanvayavyatirekiṇo 'pi pakṣādeva vyatirekapratyayo mā bhūdityetadarthaṃ vipakṣe niyamo darśayitumucitaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8368: tathā ca na kevalānvayīti cet---na, aviśeṣavidhitvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8369: yatra hi sapakṣataditarau staḥ, tatra viśeṣavidhau śeṣaniṣedho gamyate, yathā nityānityapratītau /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8370: anitya eva kṛtakatvamityukte arthād gamyate na nitya iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8372: yato 'bhidheya eva prameyatvamityukte gamyatāṃ nānabhidheya iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8375: nanvadhikapunaruktabhiyā mā bhūt samuccayo, vikalpastu bhavedityata āha---ṛjumārgeṇeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8378: tathā cānvayaṃ pratītya tanniṣedho vyatirekaḥ pratyetavyaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8380: so 'yaṃ prāk yadi pakṣa eva pratipannaḥ kimadhikaṃ vyatirekeṇa sādhitam? sapakṣe cet /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8389: na hi ghaṭamānayeti vaktavye 'naghaṭaṃ na mānaiṣīriti vaktāro bhavanti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8393: evamudāharaṇayorviśeṣavyavasthāṃ darśayatā vāśabdasya vyavasthitavibhāṣāvacanatve 'pi saṅgatirityapi darśitam //37 //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8404: te ca yathā svasyotpadyete tathā parasyāpyutpādanīye, svapratipattyanusāreṇa parāvabodhanāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8405: svayaṃ ca vyāptijñānādindriyādisahāyāt pakṣadharmatāvagamo na tu viparyayaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8406: tataḥ parasyāpyudāharaṇavacanena vyāptijñānumutpādya tatsahacaritenopanayavacanena pakṣadharmatāpratyaya utpādanīyaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8410: tasmādarthasiddhaḥ paurvāparyaniyama udāharaṇopanayayorityartha iti antataḥ phakvikā yojyeti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8424: tena tasya durunneyatvāt kṛtṛrāsadivādivad avyutpannaṃ pratyanaṅgatvācca /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8425: yāvatā yādṛśā vopāyena svayamarthaḥ pratītaḥ, tāvattādṛgupāyapratipādanena para pratipādyaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8429: sacārthaḥ pratipādyaḥ svaśabdena yaḥ śabdāntareṇākṣipto 'pi na /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8431: etāvadatra syādupanayārthaṃ vyutpannaḥ svayaṃ vā ūheta,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8437: athaivaṃ manvīthā yadyapi kṛtakatvāditi sādhanaparaṃ vacanam
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8438: tathāpi dvidhā hi tatparatā śabdānām, upapannatayā upapādanīyatayā ca /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8441: dvitīyastu upapādanīyatayā svārthaṃ pratipādayannapi kathaṃ tannāntarīyakamapyarthamākṣipet,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8443: tathātve vā pratijñaiva sarvamākṣipediti gataṃ hetunāpi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8444: tasmāt sādhanatvenoddiṣṭe 'pi kṛtakatve tādrūpyasyāsiddhatvāt na tena vyāpterākṣepa iti nānarthakam udāharaṇam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8449: nanu yathā hetvanurodhena tadupasaṃhāra upanaye dvividhaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8450: tathā sādhyānurodhena tadupasaṃhāro 'pi dvividha eva prāptaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8451: avaśyaṃ ca sādhyena dvividhenaiva bhāvyam, sādhanānurodhāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8455: tasmāt pratijñānigamanayorapi dvaividhyaṃ prāptamiti kuto nābhihitaṃ iti sūtrakṛtā pratijñālakṣaṇe śaṅkitumucitamapi granthalaghimne sukhapratipattaye vā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8458: hetvādīnāmavayavānāṃ yeṣāṃ yatsaṃbandhi nigamanaṃ tasya samānamekaṃ lakṣaṇam //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8459: na hi vidhiniṣedhayoḥ pratijñātayorniṣedhavidhyupasaṃhāre pratijñāyāḥ punarvacanamiti lakṣaṇaṃ lagati,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8462: na hyanvayivyatirekiṇorhetvoḥ vyatiriktanvitapratijñāne sādhyanirdeśa itilakṣaṇaṃ lagati,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8465: ata eva tatra vārttikam---anityaḥ śabdo, nedaṃ nirātmakamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8466: tat kiṃ kṛtakatvādityādika eva hetūpadeśaḥ kartavyaḥ? netyāha---tasmāditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8467: na ca vācyaṃ tathaiva kiṃ na syāt, anupasaṃhāratvaprasaṅgāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8470: upasaṃhārasyaiṣa ca guṇo yad viparītakalpanāvilopanaṃ nāma /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8472: evaṃ ca satyavaśyakartavyatayā tasmāditi kṛte kṛtakatvāditi mandaprayojanam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8474: ye tu nipuṇaṃmanyāḥ sarvanāmnā hetuvat pratijñābhidhānamapi manyante,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8475: teṣāṃ tathāśabdaḥ svarūpavacano vā syāt, prakāravacano vā?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8479: tathāpi na tenaiva tādṛśatvam, anyasādṛśyaparāmarśe tu na nigamanalakṣaṇayogaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8480: atha yathoktaḥ tathetyarthaḥ, tathāpi kathaṃ tatheti nityasāpekṣatvādanupasaṃhāratvam?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8483: omiti cet? tatra vakṣyāma ityāśayavānāha---anityaḥ śabda iti pratijñāyāḥ punarvacanamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8490: na brūmaḥ siddhasya nirdeśo nigamanamapi tu siddhatayā nirdeśa iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8491: tathaiva tataḥ pāñcarūpyapratīteḥ na hyupapādanīyatayā nirdeśaḥ sādhanasya rūpāntarasampadamākṣeptumapyalamityuktam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8498_1: phalasyeti tarko 'vasaraprāpta iti saṃgatibhāṣyamavatārya pūraṇena tadarthamāha---uddeśeti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8503: tenāyaṃ sūtrārthaḥ, pramāṇābhyanujñāvyāpāreṇa phalasiddhau vyāpriyamāṇa ūhastarka iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8504: sa cāpāditasandehe sandehāpanne ca pravartata iti jñāpanārthamavijñātatattva ityuktam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8507: evaṃvyāpāraścohaḥ prasaṅga ityeveti tathaiva ṭīkākṛtā uktam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8508: sa cāhāryahetorutpadyata iti jñāpanārthaṃ kāraṇopapattita iti padaṃ tadarthatayāpi kvacid vyākhyātam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8511: phalaṃ pramāṇaparatantrasya sataḥ phalavatsannidhāvaphalaṃ tadaṅgamiti nyāyena tattvanirṇayaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8516: ata eva vivaraṇakārāṇāṃ saṃkulānīva vacāṃsīti tadatra nipuṇena pratipattrā bhavitavyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8517: tathā hi vyāpāravyāpāriṇoraniṣṭāpattyetyādinā bhedaṃ vyutpādyābhedaṃ vivakṣannāha---tayā pramāṇasyopapatyeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8518: tarkakāraṇe kāraṇopapattipadaṃ saṃcārya tatkāryabhūtatarkādabhedaṃ vivakṣannāha---na copapattireveti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8519: prapañcitaṃ caitat prathama sūtra eva ṭīkākṛtā iti kṛtaṃ prapañceneti //40 //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8522: evaṃ sādhanasampattau darśitāyāṃ so 'yaṃ parikarabandhaḥ kimavadhikaḥ kiṃparaśceti jijñāsāyāṃ nirṇayo 'vasaraprāptaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8523: tatrārthāvadhāraṇaṃ nirṇaya iti vaktavye tarkaikaviṣayatāpratipādanaṃ bhāṣyakṛtaḥ kvopayujyata ityata āha---naitaditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8529: tena jānīmor'thasannidheḥ śabdārthasannidheḥ supratipadamiti mattvā bhāṣyakārasya tadgatalakṣaṇaivābhimateti hṛdi nidhāya tadanurodhenoktam---vādasūtragatāviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8531: nanu nāyaṃ kathānirṇayo lakṣyate, tatkuto vādiprativādyupakrabheṇa codyamityata āha--atreti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8534: yena codyaparihārāvapi saṃgatau syātāmityata āha---na tāvaditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8542: tathāpi pūrvapakṣottarapakṣaṃ pratyākalitaniṣkarṣabhedena catuṣpādavyavahārapradarśanāt phalato na kaścid viśeṣaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8543: ekavaktṛkatve 'pi tāvata eva vyāpārakalāpasya vicāre 'pi vidyamānatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8544: tasmād yadyapyanipuṇaścodakastathāpi codyaṃ sāvakāśameveti yathāśrutameva abhyupetya pariharatīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8545: nanu kathaṃ śāstre saṃśayānapekṣo nirṇayo mīmāṃsāyā vaiyarthyaprasaṅgādityata āha---nahīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8547: tatra ca saṃśayo na pratiṣidhyate, tannirṇayasya parīkṣāsādhyatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8548: tadarthanirṇaye tu śāstreṇa kartavye kutaḥ saṃśayaḥ?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8550: atha kathānirṇaye saṃśayaḥ kiṃ na syāt?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8551: kathamanyathā caturthe bhāṣyakṛd eva vādasya saṃśayavyudāsaṃ phalaṃ vakṣyatītyata āha---niścitayoreveti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8554: nanu bhāṣyakāreṇa codyopasaṃhāre yo 'vatiṣṭhate tena nirṇaya iti vadatā tābhyāmiti tṛtīyā darśitā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8555: sā ca pakṣācca pratipakṣācceti vadatā vārttikakṛtā avadhīritā kayā śaṅkayetyata
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8557: tat kiṃ vādasamānayogakṣematayā śāstre 'pi pakṣapratipakṣābhyāmeva nirṇayaḥ?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8558: na caitat saṃbhavatītyata āha śāstre tu nirṇaya eveti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8561: yat taduktaṃ vārttike sphuṭībhaviṣyatīti, tadāha---arthagrahaṇa iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8563: tat kathaṃ kakṣātraye niyama ityata āha---prathamaṃ sādhanamiti /
